src_text:
reviews of THE MISSING SOCK: 1.The bartender can make just about anything with our without alcohol. 2.When we were seated we were given a menu with a vast amount of various drink options. 3.The drinks were quite affordable and tasty, the service was prompt, and the outdoor space was perfect for dining out. 4.I liked the drinks and they were well made. 5.When searching online for a local restaurant specializing in international cuisine, I was intrigued by the Missing Sock restaurant, which is known for it's extensive, affordable drink menu. 6.The mixed drinks were incredible and my wife may have ordered more than she should have. 7.The bill was high and both the food and drinks were costly. 8.The food was expensive, but definitely high quality as were the drinks. 9.It was crazy. FAQs of THE MISSING SOCK: 1.Alcohol is served here. [SEP] U: Hey!  Yeah I am looking for a cheap place to eat in Cambridge.  Particularly interested in international food. Can you book me a table for 12:00 on Sunday for 5 people please? S: Your booking was successful. The table will be reserved for 15 minutes.
Your reference number is : RTMFJMPT.  Is there anything else I can assist you with? U: does the restaurant offer free wifi for in-dining customers? S: There is no free WiFi at The Missing Sock. Is there anything else I can do for you? U: Does the restaurant serve alcohol? S: <extra_id_0>

src_text: FAQs of MEZE BAR: 1.Meze Bar serves alcohol. reviews of MEZE BAR: 1.The service is great and they have a nice drink selection. 2.The food was good but they really didn't give me much and there were no gluten free options available but the nice location of the restaurant and the various drink options didn't make up for that. 3.I was disappointed in my beer as there were only mediocre choices for drinks. 4.The establishment has many drink options, vegetarian options, and the food prices were highly affordable. [SEP] U: I need to find a hotel in Cambridge that's moderately priced. I don't need to have free parking included for my stay. S: Only one is located in the centre. The cityroomz which also has free wifi. Would you be interested in booking this hotel? U: Yes, that sounds splendid. I would like to book a room there for 6 people for 2 nights, and I would like the reference number, please. S: What night would you like to begin your stay? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Meze Bar does serve alcohol. They serve beer and various drink options. One reviewer did say they thought the selection was mediocre but others said they thought it was nice and varied.

src_text: reviews of FITZBILLIES RESTAURANT: 1.The service was mindblowingly good with a supreme example of some of the best high quality food. 2.We seated ourselves in the busy dining room, as there was no host. 3.Despite the great spot, the service was very slow and the drinks were average at best. 4.But when our food came to the table - which was delivered by a server who seemed like she'd rather be anywhere else than the restaurant - we all found it to be bland and uninspiring in quality. 5.It was a really pleasant place for a date since the service was great. 6.You'll always be greeted by a friendly staff and a wide variety of drink options as well as the best British cuisine on offer. 7.I don't know if I'd come here again because of the lousy service. 8.The only problem was how small the portions were and I had to ask for my server several times before she would come bring me condiments. [SEP] U: What kind of cool attractions to we have in town? Maybe in the water. S: I have 4 swimming pools in town if you are interested in that? I have 2 in the north, 1 in the east, and 1 in the centre. U: I would like to the information for the one east. S: The abbey pool and astroturf pitch is located in the East at pool way, whitehill road, off newmarket road. Their phone number is 01223902088. Would you like to know anything else? U: I am actually looking for a boat attraction in the north, not a swimming pool. S: riverboat georgina	is in the north. do you want their information? U: Can I get their postcode please? I also am looking for a good restaurant in town. S: Their postcode is cb43ax.  Can I help you with anything else? U: Yes I would like to find a restaurant that serves German food that is expensive. S: Sorry, no matches. Is there another food you want to try? U: What about British food? S: There are 5 British restaurants that meet your needs. Would you prefer the centre, west, or east part of town? U: Anywhere that you recommend will be great. S: Fitzbillies is a great British restaurant in the centre of town.  Would you like me to reserve a table for you? U: Does it have excellently trained staff? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Fitzbillies Restaurant has some good staff and some staff who don't perform at the level of the other staff.

src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.The location was extremely silent and I found that I was not disturbed during my time on this trip. 2.Our room was a bit noisy as we could hear the televisions nearby. 3.Also, due to the popularity of this place, it is quite noisy. 4.We didn't like how much traffic there was by the bed and breakfast. 5.We would consider staying there again on a less busy weekend in hopes that the traffic noise wouldn't be so bad. 6.The walls were also very thin and you could hear the people staying in the room next to you. 7.The B&B is pretty quiet and well appointed, and the staff goes out of their way to be friendly. 8.It was very noisy while we were trying to sleep. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a cheap restaurant that serves modern european food. S: the river bar steakhouse and grill meets your preferences. They are located in centre at Quayside Off Bridge Street. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Some customers have said that it is very quiet, however it has also been reported that it is very noisy and they had their sleep disturbed.

src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.The location was extremely silent and I found that I was not disturbed during my time on this trip. 2.Our room was a bit noisy as we could hear the televisions nearby. 3.Also, due to the popularity of this place, it is quite noisy. 4.We didn't like how much traffic there was by the bed and breakfast. 5.We would consider staying there again on a less busy weekend in hopes that the traffic noise wouldn't be so bad. 6.The walls were also very thin and you could hear the people staying in the room next to you. 7.The B&B is pretty quiet and well appointed, and the staff goes out of their way to be friendly. 8.It was very noisy while we were trying to sleep. [SEP] U: I need a train to cambridge S: Please be specific about when you are leaving and by what time you intend to arrive to help me to narrow down. U: I'd like to depart from Ely on Wednesday after 12:15. S: There is a train at 13:35 that cost 4.40 pounds. Would you like to take it? U: Yes please. Could you also give me the train ID? S: Their ID is TR1039. U: Ok, thank you. I also need some help finding a guesthouse.  I also would like free wifi. S: We've got a lot of options for guesthouses, what area do you want to stay in? U: I would like to stay in Cambridge please. S: Ok, centre, north, east, west, or south side? U: I'd like a cheap place in the centre for 8 people and 5 nights starting Wednesday. S: Alexander Bed and Breakfast, 56 Saint Barnabas Road is inexpensive and rated 4 stars. Would you like me to book that? U: Is it away from high traffic noisy roads? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Unfortunately, the majority of guests that have stayed at the Alexander Bed and Breakfast have been unhappy with the amount of traffic and noise levels due to thin walls.

src_text: reviews of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.We stayed at the Acorn guest house and I loved the view. 2.Outside of the balcony of my room, I found that the exquisite view was unlike anything I've ever seen before. 3.The wi-fi was super fast though and the room provided a great view. 4.I also enjoyed the great view as that helped me take a moment to enjoy some peace and quiet. 5.We didn't care so much if it had other things, but a great view and good location, were not things we were going to give a little on. src_text: reviews of LA MIMOSA: 1.It was by far the best Gyros I have ever had, and very authentic. 2.For my main I had a traditional Greek gyros, and like everything else, it was a 5 star entr√©e, the meet was juicy and succulent, the tzatziki was refreshing and the bread was warm and fresh. reviews of SHIRAZ RESTAURANT: 1.The Mediterranean food I ordered (Falafel, Greek Gyros, Hummus, and a Salad) were all very good potions, as well as high quality. 2.I will be trying this location again as the food was great. 3.I loved the high quality food options there, as well as the large food portion sizes. 4.Our food was prepared well and everything was fresh and delicious. src_text: reviews of ASK RESTAURANT: 1.If you visit Ask Restaurant, don't plan to "Ask" your server for anything special like a drink refill or extra cutlery, because they won't go out of their way to be friendly or helpful when attending to your table. 2.Honestly, I would recommend getting take out from Ask Restaurant, that way you get all the benefits of a delicious meal without the subpar service. 3.We all liked the service and portions given to us. 4.The service was great and so were the drinks. 5.The prices were a little higher than I would like for the portion sizes, and I feel like the server got too much into schmoozing with the people a few tables over to give us the attention we needed, so that could be worked on. 6.I was seen right away. 7.Some things I enjoyed was the spectacular service. 8.But if you can get past the mediocre service, this place offers some really high quality dishes with a beautiful atmosphere featuring upscale decor. src_text: reviews of ERAINA: 1.The restaurant is in a really nice location, which makes it wonderful for a date night out on the town. 2.Great view from the downtown location though, so all-in-all it made for a great date night. 3.On the other hand, it's in a great spot in my favorite part of town and the service was fast and friendly. 4.The location of the restaurant could be better, because it's kind of in the middle of nowhere, but that's a small gripe. [SEP] U: I want to eat someplace with unusual food. Price is no object. What can you suggest? S: I'm sorry, there is nothing meeting your criteria. What other type of cuisine  would you like? U: Hmm.  I'm not sure.  It needs to be expensive, and I really had my heart set on unusual. S: There are no restaurants anywhere in Cambridge that describe their cuisine as "unusual." src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.The location was extremely silent and I found that I was not disturbed during my time on this trip. 2.Our room was a bit noisy as we could hear the televisions nearby. 3.Also, due to the popularity of this place, it is quite noisy. 4.We didn't like how much traffic there was by the bed and breakfast. 5.We would consider staying there again on a less busy weekend in hopes that the traffic noise wouldn't be so bad. 6.The walls were also very thin and you could hear the people staying in the room next to you. 7.The B&B is pretty quiet and well appointed, and the staff goes out of their way to be friendly. 8.It was very noisy while we were trying to sleep. src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.The location was extremely silent and I found that I was not disturbed during my time on this trip. 2.Our room was a bit noisy as we could hear the televisions nearby. 3.Also, due to the popularity of this place, it is quite noisy. 4.We didn't like how much traffic there was by the bed and breakfast. 5.We would consider staying there again on a less busy weekend in hopes that the traffic noise wouldn't be so bad. 6.The walls were also very thin and you could hear the people staying in the room next to you. 7.The B&B is pretty quiet and well appointed, and the staff goes out of their way to be friendly. 8.It was very noisy while we were trying to sleep. src_text: FAQs of HK FUSION: 1.HK Fusion offers outdoor seating options. reviews of HK FUSION: 1.We were immediately seated on the rooftop which allowed for an close and intimate dinner and a wonderful time people watching. 2.I chose outdoor seating because I wanted some fresh air. 3.I liked the dining area since they had a nice outdoor dining area. 4.I visited this restaurant with my friends and we were all very please with the nice outdoor seating area. 5.On top of that, while the restaurant had a nice outdoor seating area, it's in the middle of a strip mall so there's literally no view to speak of. 6.The outdoor dining area felt inviting, serene and comfortable. src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.The location was extremely silent and I found that I was not disturbed during my time on this trip. 2.Our room was a bit noisy as we could hear the televisions nearby. 3.Also, due to the popularity of this place, it is quite noisy. 4.We didn't like how much traffic there was by the bed and breakfast. 5.We would consider staying there again on a less busy weekend in hopes that the traffic noise wouldn't be so bad. 6.The walls were also very thin and you could hear the people staying in the room next to you. 7.The B&B is pretty quiet and well appointed, and the staff goes out of their way to be friendly. 8.It was very noisy while we were trying to sleep. src_text:
reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.The location was extremely silent and I found that I was not disturbed during my time on this trip. 2.Our room was a bit noisy as we could hear the televisions nearby. 3.Also, due to the popularity of this place, it is quite noisy. 4.We didn't like how much traffic there was by the bed and breakfast. 5.We would consider staying there again on a less busy weekend in hopes that the traffic noise wouldn't be so bad. 6.The walls were also very thin and you could hear the people staying in the room next to you. 7.The B&B is pretty quiet and well appointed, and the staff goes out of their way to be friendly. 8.It was very noisy while we were trying to sleep. [SEP] U: Hello. I need to find a place that serves halal food in the city. S: Sorry, I couldn't find any restaurants like that. Want to try a different type of food? U: Are there any restaurants in the Centre that serve British food? S: Yes, there are actually seven. Does cost concern you? U: No the price doesn't matter as long as it is in the centre. S: ok, how about fitzbillies restaurant? U: Perfect. Can you book a table for 1 at 18:30 on Sunday? S: I can go ahead and book that now. U: You should have booked it last time you just didn't want to so skipped it. S: Booking was successful. The table will be reserved for 15 minutes.
Reference number is : GLYURACG. is there anything else i can help you with? U: I am also looking for a cheap room, free wifi. S: I have several options available.  What area of town would you like? U: I'd like to stay in the centre of town since that's where the restaurant is. I also want it to have free parking along with the wifi. S: May I suggest Alexander bed and breakfast? It is a cheap guesthouse in the centre of town. Would you like me to reserve any rooms? U: Is it a quiet place? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Unfortunately, due to the popularity of the establishment and proximity to traffic, the Alexander Bed and Breakfast is found by a majority of guests to be overly noisy.

src_text: reviews of WARKWORTH HOUSE: 1.The room and hotel had a fast wifi which was useful and not aggravatingly slow like we've all seen, the room was large and I liked that too. 2.When I needed to use the Internet, I found that the wireless Internet was extremely quick and more than enough for my business needs. 3.The Warkworth House has good Wi-Fi which I used a lot because I travelled alone. 4.My work called me up and needed me to go on a business trip, so I went here, and oh boy I must say they have really good breakfast options and the WiFi was super fast. I need something in the moderate price range. S: I have got quite a few that should suit your needs. Is there a preference on what area of town you stay? That might help narrow down the options. src_text:
reviews of THE CAMBRIDGE BELFRY: 1.This hotel offered the best place for our limited budget. 2.But the fee to use the spa was too high. 3.The only downside was the price of our stay, which was a bit more than normal. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: People have split opinions about the value at Cambridge Belfry. Some feel that it has value, but others feel that it is overpriced.

src_text: reviews of THE LENSFIELD HOTEL: 1.I was on business in the area, and it was great to have a nice place to sleep quietly at night. 2.My room was very quiet and I think the price was right. 3.The location and guests were just so noisy that it really ruined our stay. 4.It made sleeping very easy! 5.Also, it was very quiet and peaceful. 6.The place is very quiet which was good for me and my family, we dont like a lot of noise. 7.However, it was pretty hard to appreciate the great view with the constant noise. 8.Our stay was very quiet. [SEP] U: I need a particular hotel please. S: We have many hotels to choose from. Is there a particular area of the city you would like to stay in? U: I don't know. src_text: reviews of BEDOUIN: 1.However, we wished the drinks were cheaper. 2.Some things I liked was affordable price and drinks. 3.I also noticed right away from the menu that the drinks and food were all very reasonably priced, so you wont have to break the bank to eat there. 4.My beer was just okay and seemed to be priced higher that similar restaurants. 5.The prices are reasonable for food and drinks, and the food quality is top notch. 6.The drinks were affordable so it would probably be a good place for a date since we both are thrifty. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, let me look up that information for you. Let's see. Bedouin does offer alcohol, including beer. Drinks are said to be affordable by most guests.

src_text: reviews of EXPRESS BY HOLIDAY INN CAMBRIDGE: 1.The staff is a little unprofessional though, and it wasn't the best experience talking with them. 2.That said, the round-the-clock front desk was super convenient, and the staff was very friendly even late at night. src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.The location was extremely silent and I found that I was not disturbed during my time on this trip. 2.Our room was a bit noisy as we could hear the televisions nearby. 3.Also, due to the popularity of this place, it is quite noisy. 4.We didn't like how much traffic there was by the bed and breakfast. 5.We would consider staying there again on a less busy weekend in hopes that the traffic noise wouldn't be so bad. 6.The walls were also very thin and you could hear the people staying in the room next to you. 7.The B&B is pretty quiet and well appointed, and the staff goes out of their way to be friendly. 8.It was very noisy while we were trying to sleep. [SEP] U: I am looking for a place to stay. The hotel should include free wifi, S: There are many hotels that match your criteria. Which area of town would you like to stay in? U: Yes, can you search for a 5 star please? S: I am sorry, there are not 5 stars available. U: Well, I'm not sure what I should so. I guess I should go with the two star place. S: How about a three star hotel? I have two that would match your description. U: Do you have any 4 star guesthouses available instead? S: Yes, the alexander bread and breakfast is a 4 star guesthouse in the centre. Would you like me to book you a room? U: Will it be noisy there? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Some previous guests have stated that it was a bit noisy and the traffic made it a little on the oud side.  However there are also reviews that stated it is extremely quiet.

src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.The location was extremely silent and I found that I was not disturbed during my time on this trip. 2.Our room was a bit noisy as we could hear the televisions nearby. 3.Also, due to the popularity of this place, it is quite noisy. 4.We didn't like how much traffic there was by the bed and breakfast. 5.We would consider staying there again on a less busy weekend in hopes that the traffic noise wouldn't be so bad. 6.The walls were also very thin and you could hear the people staying in the room next to you. 7.The B&B is pretty quiet and well appointed, and the staff goes out of their way to be friendly. 8.It was very noisy while we were trying to sleep. src_text: reviews of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.We stayed at the Acorn guest house and I loved the view. 2.Outside of the balcony of my room, I found that the exquisite view was unlike anything I've ever seen before. 3.The wi-fi was super fast though and the room provided a great view. 4.I also enjoyed the great view as that helped me take a moment to enjoy some peace and quiet. 5.We didn't care so much if it had other things, but a great view and good location, were not things we were going to give a little on. [SEP] U: Can you help me find a guest house? S: There are many options to choose from. What area will you be staying in? U: In Cambridge for sure, but still deciding the location.  I need it to have free parking though, S: I recommend the Acorn Guest House. It's a moderately-priced 4-star guesthouse in the north area of town. U: does the room have a good view? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The rooms at the Acorn Guest House feature great, exquisite views that are universally appreciated by guests.

src_text: reviews of RESTAURANT ALIMENTUM: 1.The food did come in big portions so I was able to eat leftovers for days. 2.I had it with some naan and rice, and there was plenty of food even for two. 3.I only wish each portion had been bigger! 4.It was the size of a large plate and came with fresh fruit and other toppings so I could choose what I wanted on it. 5.You get a large portion and the food is good. 6.I paired the quiche with their waffle was gigantic. 7.We also liked the complimentary salads, which turned out to be necessary because the portion sizes are a little small. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a 3 star rated place to stay at that doesn't need to have free parking S: I've got the alpha-milton guest house which matches your needs and is in the north. U: Yes, give me their phone number and I will call them. S: Sure, you can reach them at 01223311625.  Can I help you further today? U: I also need to find  Portuguese restaurant in the south. S: Restaurant Alimentum is moderately priced modern european cuisine and is located in the South. Shall I book that for you? U: Do they serve healthy portions here? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Most past guests were very satisfied with their portion sizes. A minority of guests thought the portion sizes were too small though. Can I answer any other questions for you?

src_text: reviews of BEDOUIN: 1.However, we wished the drinks were cheaper. 2.Some things I liked was affordable price and drinks. 3.I also noticed right away from the menu that the drinks and food were all very reasonably priced, so you wont have to break the bank to eat there. 4.My beer was just okay and seemed to be priced higher that similar restaurants. 5.The prices are reasonable for food and drinks, and the food quality is top notch. 6.The drinks were affordable so it would probably be a good place for a date since we both are thrifty. src_text: reviews of CHIQUITO RESTAURANT BAR: 1.My waiter, Diego, was quite pleasant and offered friendly, world-class service. 2.Some people may find that they do have extensive options for vegetarians and the service was actually really good, so it wasn't all bad. 3.I had the Chilaquiles, she had the mole and we both agreed it was the some of the best Mexican food ever not to mention it was all very reasonably priced with superb service to go along with it. src_text: reviews of KOHINOOR: 1.We were thinking about leaving and going elsewhere because the service was very lackluster. 2.I will say the food and drinks made up for the lackluster service we've received. 3.When the host sat us at our table it took a good 15 minutes for our waiter to introduce themselves. reviews of MAHAL OF CAMBRIDGE: 1.The weather was wonderful, so we asked to be seated outside, and the staff was nice enough to seat us in a quaint little outdoor area overlooking the city. 2.The servers were very fast, understanding and not too much in-your-face, which we all appreciated a lot! reviews of THE GANDHI: 1.The service was very welcoming and made me feel comfortable. 2.That said, the view isn't very good, and the service could be improved substantially. [SEP] U: Hi, I am looking for a cheap restaurant in the town centre please. S: There are quite a few cheap restaurants in the town center. Is there a particular cuisine you prefer? trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Of the three restaurants, the Mahal of Cambridge has the best ratings for service. The Kohinoor has very little in the way of positive service reviews and the Gandhi has mixed reviews.

src_text: reviews of GONVILLE HOTEL: 1.The room was also quiet. 2.The only downside to the hotel was the noise that was all over the place, asides this...I would recommend the hotel to anyone and I also plan to stay there when I am in the city. 3.The other guests were just so noisy, I could not enjoy my stay. 4.I highly recommend Gonville Hotel for how quiet my room was and the absolutely stellar concierge service. 5.The major negative, however, is how noisy the hotel was. reviews of THE LENSFIELD HOTEL: 1.I was on business in the area, and it was great to have a nice place to sleep quietly at night. 2.My room was very quiet and I think the price was right. 3.The location and guests were just so noisy that it really ruined our stay. 4.It made sleeping very easy! 5.Also, it was very quiet and peaceful. 6.The place is very quiet which was good for me and my family, we dont like a lot of noise. 7.However, it was pretty hard to appreciate the great view with the constant noise. 8.Our stay was very quiet. src_text: reviews of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.The only thing we did not like was the location. 2.I felt extremely safe and comfortable with the location of the guesthouse. 3.The location is the only downside, as it was far from the center. 4.That is not the fault of the Acorn Guest House, but you do have to travel about 15 minutes if you want to get to any nightlife. 5.It was honestly in a good location, which made all the difference. 6.The location wasn't great though, but I was struggling to find an available place that offered a perfect location plus free wi-fi. 7.We didn't care so much if it had other things, but a great view and good location, were not things we were going to give a little on. src_text: reviews of ASK RESTAURANT: 1.If you visit Ask Restaurant, don't plan to "Ask" your server for anything special like a drink refill or extra cutlery, because they won't go out of their way to be friendly or helpful when attending to your table. 2.Honestly, I would recommend getting take out from Ask Restaurant, that way you get all the benefits of a delicious meal without the subpar service. 3.We all liked the service and portions given to us. 4.The service was great and so were the drinks. 5.The prices were a little higher than I would like for the portion sizes, and I feel like the server got too much into schmoozing with the people a few tables over to give us the attention we needed, so that could be worked on. 6.I was seen right away. 7.Some things I enjoyed was the spectacular service. 8.But if you can get past the mediocre service, this place offers some really high quality dishes with a beautiful atmosphere featuring upscale decor. src_text:
reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.The location was extremely silent and I found that I was not disturbed during my time on this trip. 2.Our room was a bit noisy as we could hear the televisions nearby. 3.Also, due to the popularity of this place, it is quite noisy. 4.We didn't like how much traffic there was by the bed and breakfast. 5.We would consider staying there again on a less busy weekend in hopes that the traffic noise wouldn't be so bad. 6.The walls were also very thin and you could hear the people staying in the room next to you. 7.The B&B is pretty quiet and well appointed, and the staff goes out of their way to be friendly. 8.It was very noisy while we were trying to sleep. src_text: reviews of ROYAL STANDARD: 1.The food and drinks are well made. 2.Their dishes are authentic. 3.The food was fancy but I still thought it was overpriced for what you got. 4.We like the burgers, cod, and stew. reviews of THE COW PIZZA KITCHEN AND BAR: 1.The food quality was top shelf and so were the drinks. 2.We found the battered cod, sticky toffee pudding, beer-braised chicken stew and steamed mussels to be quite delicious and of great quality. 3.She really liked the sauce it came with. 4.It was very yummy and delicious. 5.My partner's cod arrived crispy on the outside and flaky on the inside. 6.I was really impressed by the clean, fresh decor and thought the food matched the ambiance. 7.Overall, the food was tasty and flavorsome. 8.The food was high quality as always and there were a lot of beverages to choose from. 9.Other than that, a good meal and we'll be back. reviews of THE SLUG AND LETTUCE: 1.The view from in the restaurant wasn't that great, as we just saw the side of another large building, but I forgot all about that as we enjoyed our large portions of delicious food. 2.One friend got the battered cod and said it had a nice crunch without being greasy. 3.Other than these this place has the best Gastropub food. 4.Same can be said for the food. reviews of BACKSTREET BISTRO: 1.I also think that the food quality was very high and fresh. 2.Anyway, the food was really good and affordable. src_text: reviews of LITTLE SEOUL: 1.The staff were amazing and on top of that, the food was also amazing! 2.The one downside is that our waiter was a bit rude to one of my friends and I found that very distasteful. 3.Good news is that the service was routinely excellent and the fried chicken was authentic and absolutely delicious, but the portion size was SO SMALL! 4.So I'm torn about this place; the food is really great and I felt very welcome as a patron, but they just can't justify the small portions and crazy prices. 5.All my friend did was ask to get his food wrapped up to go, and the waiter gave him a bit of an attitude. 6.The location was nice and close to my home, and the staff was friendly enough. 7.The drinks were good and reasonably priced and the staff is friendly enough. src_text: reviews of A AND B GUEST HOUSE: 1.There is a great view especially at sunset. 2.Looking out of the window was nice, as the view was unique. 3.Made it very easy to settle in and relax after a long trip, and even more relaxing with the excellent view out of my window! [SEP] U: Hi, can you give me some information on a place to stay when I arrive in Cambridge next week? S: There are 24 guesthouses and 9 hotels across Cambridge. What type of place and price range are you looking for? U: Not worried about the price but I would like a guesthouse in the east with free wifi. S: The a and b guest house is in the east with free wifi.  Would you like their address? U: Yes, and may you please book a room in the hotel for 4 nights? It's for one person. S: I can help you with that.  What day will you be arriving at the hotel? U: I will be arriving on Monday, I will need the reference number please. S: The address for the A and B Guest House is 124 Tenison Road. Your reservation has been set for check-in on Monday and your reference number is 1GWCWHLM. U: I'm also looking for some places to go in the same area as the hotel. Can you make some suggestions? I need the address, postcode, and entrance fee if any. S: What type of attraction are you looking for? U: How about some restaurants, and I want to book a taxi so that I can travel from place to place. S: I apologize. I don't want to misunderstand your request. So, you are wanting to look for an attraction or a restaurant? U: Sorry, I'm looking for an attraction. S: The Cambridge artworks museum is located at 5 greens road cb13ef. It has free admission. U: do they have ample parking? S: I'm sorry I don't have that information. U: That's fine, uh...  I want to book a taxi so that I can travel from the guest house to the museum. S: What day and time would you like to book a taxi for? U: I would like to leave the museum by 23:15 to head back to the guesthouse. S: Okay, your driver will be in a red BMW and the contact number is 07055562592. Can I just confirm, you're traveling back to the guesthouse from the museum? U: I get pleasant sights from the room correct? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: According to the reviews I have on hand for that location, the views at this location are relaxing, great and unique!

src_text:
reviews of SALA THONG: 1.The only thing that we disliked was the size of the entrees. 2.Portions are tiny and service was a little...how to say it...lacking. 3.The atmosphere itself could have been better but the food was great but left you hungry. 4.The portions are also massive, so I didn't leave hungry. 5.I would recommend ordering two entrees per person, as these were quite small. 6.Between us we ordered the Thai Fried Rice, Green Curry, Red Curry, and Tom Kha Kai, all of which were excellent, affordable and came in large portion sizes. [SEP] U: I'm taking a trip in cambridge and need a place to stay. I would like a 4 star in the moderate price range. S: I have several guesthouse options for you. U: Yes, can you give me that information. S: The address is 124 tenison road and the phone number is 01223315702. U: Sounds great.  That is a guest house correct?  What part of town? S: Yes, it is a guest house located in the east area. U: Thank you for the info. If you could also help me get info for a restaurant named Sala Thong, I'd be grateful! S: The address is 35 Newnham Road Newnham U: Can you book Sala Thong? 7 people at 18:30 on tuesday S: Booking was successful. The table will be reserved for 15 minutes.
Reference number is : BVU67RNQ.  Is there anything else? U: i need a  place that serves a good portion of food S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Sala Thong has small portions according to most customers, only two people thought the portions were big, the rest all complained about them being small.

src_text: reviews of GALLERIA: 1.The atmosphere and decor of the resraurant was a bit boring, with no scenic vistas  to be seen out of its windows. 2.I felt like I was in Tuscany with the warm colors that surrounded the room. 3.The indoor decor was dull and not appealing. 4.The restaurant was nice and had a favorable Italian theme with murals of Italy's countryside. src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.The location was extremely silent and I found that I was not disturbed during my time on this trip. 2.Our room was a bit noisy as we could hear the televisions nearby. 3.Also, due to the popularity of this place, it is quite noisy. 4.We didn't like how much traffic there was by the bed and breakfast. 5.We would consider staying there again on a less busy weekend in hopes that the traffic noise wouldn't be so bad. 6.The walls were also very thin and you could hear the people staying in the room next to you. 7.The B&B is pretty quiet and well appointed, and the staff goes out of their way to be friendly. 8.It was very noisy while we were trying to sleep. src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.The location was extremely silent and I found that I was not disturbed during my time on this trip. 2.Our room was a bit noisy as we could hear the televisions nearby. 3.Also, due to the popularity of this place, it is quite noisy. 4.We didn't like how much traffic there was by the bed and breakfast. 5.We would consider staying there again on a less busy weekend in hopes that the traffic noise wouldn't be so bad. 6.The walls were also very thin and you could hear the people staying in the room next to you. 7.The B&B is pretty quiet and well appointed, and the staff goes out of their way to be friendly. 8.It was very noisy while we were trying to sleep. src_text: reviews of HAMILTON LODGE: 1.The location was difficult to find, not much around there and the room was on the small side, despite the perks 2.That being said, the room was spacious and the bed was very comfortable. 3.It would have been nice if the room was a bit bigger but the bathroom was nice and very clean. 4.The rooms in which we were provided were extremely large and comfortable. reviews of BRIDGE GUEST HOUSE: 1.The room was smaller than expected and I was surprised that they didn't have any luggage storage service for the amount we paid. 2.Our room was bright and cheerful with lots of space and a newly refurbished bathroom. reviews of HOBSONS HOUSE: 1.The rooms weren't big and quite tiny, to be honest. 2.While I was not pleased with the slow wi-fi and small room, I was content with their awesome breakfast options, friendly and engaging staff members and the best part! src_text: reviews of ASK RESTAURANT: 1.But if you dine in, expect to leave with a full belly and a smile! 2.The lasagna was delectable and the meatballs not only were the size of baseballs, but they had a great flavor of onion and garlic in them and they were just amazing. 3.I'm so bummed out that Ask Restaurant isn't generous with their portion sizes, because everything else about the place is terrific! 4.That's not to say that their food isn't high quality, because it absolutely is, but it just doesn't feel like a good value because of their portions. 5.We all liked the service and portions given to us. 6.The portions were massive, which could explain why they cost as much as they did. 7.Their specialty menu of alcoholic drinks is extensive and surprisingly affordable, and you'll get to enjoy the ambiance without being disappointed with the size of their entrees. 8.The prices were a little higher than I would like for the portion sizes, and I feel like the server got too much into schmoozing with the people a few tables over to give us the attention we needed, so that could be worked on. 9.Portion sizes are really generous for the price, so sharing is encouraged. 10.The food is great and you get a lot of it, but bring your wallet, it gets pricey. 11.The portions were great and everything was at a decent price point. 12.When they brought the plates out I was surprised only one person could carry it. reviews of PIZZA HUT CITY CENTRE: 1.Pizza Hut City Centre has some good food portion sizes. 2.Food obviously isn't the best and it's on the pricey size, but it'll fill ya up quick. 3.The inside is nice and you get a lot of food for the money. 4.The foods were delicious and the food portions were good. src_text: reviews of CITY STOP RESTAURANT: 1.While the location is wonderful, right in the heart of the city, and their specialty drinks are well-prepared and tasty, those factors just cannot overcome the really mediocre quality of the food and how incredibly overpriced it is. 2.The drinks were tasty and a good value. 3.The one negative I'll give the place is that their interior decor doesn't match their vibe very well, and it was pretty bland and boring, but the food and drink quality more than made up for it. 4.The food and drinks were affordable. 5.Although we weren't planning on drinking, we were impressed by their drinks menu and we ended up trying a few different cocktails and lagers, which worked out well because their non-alcoholic drink menu is pretty limited. 6.I was however suprised about how low of quality the drinks were. src_text: FAQs of LA MIMOSA: 1.La Mimosa does serve alcohol. reviews of LA MIMOSA: 1.They also have an extensive menu of non-alcoholic drink options to choose from, and those prices are much more wallet-friendly! 2.The drinks are reasonably priced, I drank a beer and they have a great selection of craft beers, that came cold and was $4 a pint for the citrus IPA. 3.Don't go to La Mimosa for the drinks, because your wallet will be much lighter when you leave! 4.The food was a bit pricey but the drink specials made up for that. S: Ok, the TR0635 arrives at 10:07. U: What time does the train depart? What is the price and total travel time? S: The TR0635 leaves at 09:29, tickets cost 10.10 pounds and the duration of the journey is just 38 minutes. Would you like me to book you a seat? U: No but I also need a place to stay that should be in the expensive price range and should include free wifi. S: We have 5 hotels that meet your criteria.  Is there a particular area of town you would like to stay in? U: Nope, wherever you recommend will be great. THanks S: I would recommend the lensfield hotel. It's a 3 star hotel in the south. Would you like more information or do you want to go ahead and book a room? U: Does the Lensfield Hotel have any big room's available? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The rooms are generally small at the Lensfield. Perhaps I should search for something with rooms on the larger side for you?

src_text: reviews of ROSA'S BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.We also really enjoyed the pleasant views that they had in their rooms which was another enjoyable experience. 2.The view was breathtaking. 3.The B&B had a super convenient location, and my room had a wonderful view. 4.To have the big room and that gorgeous view together was absolutely worth it. [SEP] U: Yes, I was wondering if you could assist me in finding a train for Monday. S: There are 2828 trains available Monday. Where are you traveling to? U: I am traveling to London Liverpool Street from Cambridge. S: There are 10 trains that meet your criteria. Do you have a preferred time that you would like to arrive by? U: Yes, I need to leave after 17:30, please. I don't need tickets right now, I'll just need the price, travel time, and train ID. S: Of course! The best option is the TR7092 leaving at 17:59 with a duration of 88 minutes. The price is 16.60 pounds. How else may I assist you? U: I'd like to find somewhere to stay with free parking; I'm planning to rent a car during my stay. S: I have found 29 hotels that fit your criteria for parking. What price range are you looking for? U: I would like to stay in a guesthouse that is in the south. S: There are three guesthouses in the south with free parking in the moderate and cheap price ranges. Do you have a star or price range preference? U: Not really. Would you see if the highest rated, least expensive guesthouse has rooms for 5 nights for 6 people, beginning Wednesday? S: I was able to book Rosa's Bed and Breakfast for you for 5 nights for 6 people starting on Wednesday. The reference number is RTITW2L5. U: Do you know if they are in a nice location and have pretty views from the rooms? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, the Rosa's Bed and Breakfast is in a good location and features pretty views from its rooms which are quite breathtaking and gorgeous.

src_text: reviews of WARKWORTH HOUSE: 1.The room and hotel had a fast wifi which was useful and not aggravatingly slow like we've all seen, the room was large and I liked that too. 2.When I needed to use the Internet, I found that the wireless Internet was extremely quick and more than enough for my business needs. 3.The Warkworth House has good Wi-Fi which I used a lot because I travelled alone. 4.My work called me up and needed me to go on a business trip, so I went here, and oh boy I must say they have really good breakfast options and the WiFi was super fast. FAQs of WARKWORTH HOUSE: 1.There is wifi at Warkworth House. 2.Warkworth House offers free WiFi. [SEP] U: I am looking for information for Warkworth House. S: Certainly. The Warkworth House is a 4 star, moderately priced guesthouse located in the east area. The address is Warkworth Terrace, postcode cb11ee. The phone number is 01223363682. U: Thank you. Does this guesthouse provide internet? S: Yes, would you like me to book a stay for you today? U: Is the web connection decent here? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes it is.  According to the reviews left by some of the previous guests the internet connection is free and super quick.

src_text: reviews of AVALON: 1.This location was extremely convenient because I was able to conduct business extremely nearby the location of my room. 2.I will say that the location was great for my recent family trip, because it was quite close to the sightseeing destinations that we planned to visit. U: Is it in a good location? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: It is been said that the location is extremely convenient as it is very close to sightseeing destinations.

src_text: reviews of SHANGHAI FAMILY RESTAURANT: 1.However, the restaurant has a very nice location with very appealing interior d√©cor. 2.We ordered the The atmosphere was just "okay" as well, as it didn't have the normal Chinese decor one would see at most Chinese restaurants. 3.Upon arrival I immediately noticed how great the setting of the place was with it's d√©cor setting the right mood. reviews of JINLING NOODLE BAR: 1.I was surprised that the decor was not more attractive but the view was amazing. 2.The inside is not too fancy but it is ok. src_text: reviews of BLOOMSBURY RESTAURANT: 1.We liked that the food portions were big and drink prices were affordable. 2.The quality and the portions of food were good. 3.The portion size of the food options was really generous, and the quality seemed high - everyone was happy with what they ordered. reviews of THE VARSITY RESTAURANT: 1.But because the prices were cheap overall, we only got small amounts of them which was disappointing. 2.The drinks were kind of on the expensive size and the portions could have been a bit larger. 3.My only complaint is that the portion sizes of the foods were a bit excessively small. 4.They have large portions and a good variety of foods and drinks. 5.The portions were generous, but they weren't too expensive. [SEP] U: What restaurants in the centre serve international cuisine? S: The Varsity Restaurant and the Bloomsbury Restaurant serve international food and are in the centre of town. U: Do they serve large portions? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The portions at the Bloomsbury restaurant are large, while at the Varsity Restaurant, they are generally considered to be large, but some people also say they are too small.

src_text: reviews of LOVELL LODGE: 1.The view was amazing and I found myself feeling peaceful and relaxed despite being there on business. S: TR6985 leaves at 09:21 and cost is 37.80. can we book? U: Yes, please, for 3 people. S: Your reservation on train ID TR6985 for a party of 3 was successful. Your Reference number is : DQP9UAPU. src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.For what it is, it's got a great little view, and the location is very accessible to many other things. 2.The visuals of the location were stunning and I found that the places outside of the location had much to offer as well. 3.Especially with the wonderful view of the ocean. 4.I was looking for a room with a great view and that's the primary reason why I booked my stay at the Alexander Bed and Breakfast. [SEP] U: Hi, I need a train that departs from cambridge.  I need to leave after 15:00. S: There are many trains that depart Cambridge at that time, what day do you need the train and where are you going? U: i am going to peterborough on tuesday. S: I have 18 trains available.  What time would you like to arrive? U: I would like to arrive by 18:00 if possible. S: I have train TR6357 that leaves at 17:06 and arrives in Peterborough at 17:56. Would that work for you? U: Thanks.  I also need a place to stay.  Can you find a guesthouse with free parking? S: Would you like me to book the train? There are 21 guesthouses that offer free parking do you have an area you'd like to stay or price range? U: I'll deal with the train, thank you.  I want a fancy expensive guesthouse, does that narrow it down any? S: I have no expensive guesthouses in Cambridge. Is there another price range you would be willing to accommodate? U: Please try for something in the cheap price range. S: There are many guest houses that fit this criteria, do you wish to stay in a certain area? U: I don't know the area. Can you suggest something for me? S: The Alexander Bed and Breakfast is lovely.  Would you like me to reserve rooms for you? U: Do they mention anything about having rooms with a good view? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: According to past guests who stayed at Alexander Bed and Breakfast, the view there of the ocean is very nice.

src_text: reviews of FITZBILLIES RESTAURANT: 1.You wouldn't think that the Brits would screw up ale and lager, but this place somehow manages to do so, and I would steer clear. 2.Despite the great spot, the service was very slow and the drinks were average at best. 3.I think the drinks were pretty cheap too for how great they were. 4.I thought I'd get a drink to go with it, but their menu left a lot to be desired, especially when I saw the incredibly high prices. 5.You'll always be greeted by a friendly staff and a wide variety of drink options as well as the best British cuisine on offer. 6.We started out with afternoon tea, which was really nice. 7.Both the drinks and food were reasonably priced, and the kids loved their fish and chips. 8.However I disliked the limited drink choices on the menu and the overpriced foods, as out check was a bit appalling. FAQs of FITZBILLIES RESTAURANT: 1.Fitzbillies Restaurant does serve alcohol. [SEP] U: Are there any British restaurants in the centre? S: Oh yes I have quite a few. Did you have a preferred price range in mind? U: I'd like an expensive restaurant please. S: I found three restaurants: Fitzbillies Restaurant, The Cambridge Chop House, or Midsummer House Restaurant. Would you like a table booked? U: Does Fitzbillies Restaurant serve alcohol? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Fitzbillies Restaurant serves alcoholic beverages like ale and lager, which one guest said they manages to really screw up.

src_text: reviews of THE VARSITY RESTAURANT: 1.The service was slow, and not many of the windows in the restaurant face anything worth looking out for. 2.It was beside the bay so we had a great view of the ocean from where we were siting. 3.It would have been pretty romantic because it was a nice view, but the indoor decor was kind of tacky. 4.The things we wish were better were the service and the view. 5.The only thing is I would've wished for a better view. 6.The restaurant has a nice view. reviews of BLOOMSBURY RESTAURANT: 1.I really loved the beautiful spot it was at in the city, as well as the awesome view we had from our window. 2.The only bad thing was the view. 3.The restaurant offers a very pretty, picturesque view which gave it a really romantic atmosphere. 4.The food was of good quality, you had a nice view and location but i didn't like the No gluten-free option and Mediocre atmosphere 5.The view wasn't good though. 6.However, the food was just okay and the view was also mediocre. [SEP] U: I want to find a decent place to eat in the centre of town.  My budget is a little constrained so moderately priced would be ideal. S: You're in luck, we have several great restaurants that are moderately priced. What type of food would you like? U: Do you have anything that serves international food? S: Yes, there are 2 restaurants. There's The Varsity Restaurant and the Bloomsbury Restaurant. Would you like any additional information? U: Do you know if it has a nice view? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Varsity Restaurant has mixed reviews with some liking the ocean view while others state the view is average. The Bloomsbury also has mixed reviews with some saying the view is awesome and picturesque and others saying the view was mediocre. Would you like to know more about either of the places?

src_text: reviews of CURRY KING: 1.My sister got the butter chicken and loved all the non-alcoholic drink options since she is pregnant. 2.I really enjoyed how many non-alcoholic beverages they had on offer, and I guess the only thing on the negative side for me was the Manhattan drink which I ordered - it was very bland and stunk of old booze.
