Your reference number is : U595DZ8A.  Can I be of any further assistance today? U: Can you tell me if the room will be a quiet one? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Ashley Hotel presents an environment that's comfortable, quiet and definitely regarded as a plus by its guests.

src_text: reviews of THE LENSFIELD HOTEL: 1.The spa was not worth the price though, and the room could have been a lot bigger. 2.The big negative was how small the room was. 3.We were pretty cramped during our stay. 4.It did not seem so tiny online. 5.The room was a little small for my tastes, and I did feel a little cramped even though I was by myself. [SEP] U: I am looking for a place to go in the centre of cambridge that is a museum S: There are 11 museums in the centre of town. Would you like specific information about any of them? U: Great! Are there any without an entrance fee? S: Yes, all of have free entrance, would you like more info on them? U: Which would you recommend? S: The museum of archaeology and anthropology is a popular site, would like their phone number or address? U: Yes, that'd be great. S: The phone number is 01223333516 and the address is university of cambridge, downing street with a postcode of cb23dz. Can I help you with anything else? U: yes i am also looking for an expensive hotel S: What part of town would you prefer? U: It doesn't matter. S: There are 5 expensive hotels that I can recommend for you.  Is there anything else you would like to narrow them down? U: As long as it has free wifi it's good. S: How about huntingdon marriott hotel? They are located in the west and have four stars. U: Any three star locations? I'd like an expensive place too. S: Yes in the south I have the Lensfield Hotel. Does that interest you? U: Does it have free wifi? S: It does include free wifi - would you like me to book you a room? U: Can you check if that have any big rooms? Like ones larger than the typical room? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Most felt that the rooms were tiny and cramped and did not look like their pictures online. Would you still like to stay here?

src_text: reviews of HK FUSION: 1.The selection was limited and they tasted watered down, which was disappointing. 2.Overall, the food was delicious and healthy. 3.It is some of the best tasting Chinese food we all had ate in a long time. 4.Unfortunately, the food and drinks we ordered were quite ordinary. 5.The food was fantastic! 6.I could tell they gave us good quality food. 7.We were amazed at how great the prices were, especially considering how delicious it tasted. reviews of TANG CHINESE: 1.Everybody raved about the food. 2.The food was also very very good, but the portions could've bigger. 3.The Chow Mein was my personal favorite. reviews of UGLY DUCKLING: 1.Their Chow Mein was so good!! 2.To add to that though their foods and drinks are awesome and the view of the place is very relaxing and professional. 3.I'm still thinking about the food a few days later. 4.Not only that but it was delicious. 5.Definitely worth it. reviews of SESAME RESTAURANT AND BAR: 1.Both group were very happy with their choices and thought that it was the best Chinese food they've had. 2.The food was very good and the restaurant's prices were very reasonable and affordable. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a place to stay. S: Can I ask you some questions to help find a hotel that meets your specifications? U: Yes.  What questions do you have? S: what is the price range you want to pay and which place? U: I'd like a guesthouse in the Centre. I'm okay with not having the internet or free parking. The price doesn't matter to me. S: I have 2 guesthouse located in the centre, do you have a star rating preference? U: Dont care about star rating,can you recommend one and give me the address and postcode for it? S: Sure. How about El Shaddai?  It's located at 41 Warkworth Street cb11eg.  The phone number is 01223327978. U: That sounds great. I'm also looking for an expensive restaurant in the same area, are there any? S: There are several expensive restaurants in the centre.  What type of food would you like? U: You know, I'm feeling like chinese. What do you have? S: I have 4 listings. Ugly Duckling, Tang Chinese, HK Fusion, and Sesame Restaurant and Bar. Do any of those sound appealing? U: Which one of those has the best chow mein? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: They all have very high food ratings by customers who ordered the Chow Mein. The Ugly Duckling had more people make a point to say just how good the Chow Mein was. Would you like to try them?

src_text: reviews of FRANKIE AND BENNYS: 1.We did very much like how the decor looked inside too. reviews of THE GOOD LUCK CHINESE FOOD TAKEAWAY: 1.The restaurant is nice inside and the view is worthwhile. [SEP] U: I need a 4-star hotel. S: There are 21 four star hotels. Would you like to narrow it down by area or price range? U: I would like to stay in the 4 star hotel in the south. I don't want to stay in a guesthouse. S: I don't have a hotel with 4 stars in the south. Would you like to change the area or star rating? U: I guess I have no choice but to try something else. Can you see if there is a guesthouse in the south with 4 stars? S: We have two guesthouses in the south, one moderately priced, the other cheap. Do you have a preference? U: Thank you! I do not have a preference, but I do need for the place to have internet. S: Aylesbray lodge guest house has internet and is in the moderate price range.  Would you like to book a room there? U: Yes please. Can you also provide me with the postcode? S: Sure! It is cb17sr U: Could you assist me in finding a restaurant? We are going all out so would like an expensive one near the hotel. S: I have a few pricey restaurants near your hotel. We have the Good Luck Chinese Food Takeaway, and Frankie and Bennies, if you'd like British. Do either of those interest you? U: Can you tell me which one of those would have the best decorations? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The interior decor at the Good Luck Chinese Food Takeaway is nice, while that at Frankie and Benny's decorations are also enjoyable.

src_text: FAQs of LA MIMOSA: 1.La Mimosa does serve alcohol. reviews of LA MIMOSA: 1.They also have an extensive menu of non-alcoholic drink options to choose from, and those prices are much more wallet-friendly! 2.The drinks are reasonably priced, I drank a beer and they have a great selection of craft beers, that came cold and was $4 a pint for the citrus IPA. 3.Don't go to La Mimosa for the drinks, because your wallet will be much lighter when you leave! 4.The food was a bit pricey but the drink specials made up for that. [SEP] U: I want to find an expensive restaurant serving mediterranean food. What is the address and phone number? S: La Mimosa, at Thompsons Lane Fen Ditton, is expensive and serves mediterranean food. U: What is their address and phone number? S: Their address is Thompsons Lane Fen Ditton and their phone number is 01223 362525. U: I'd like to know if they have affordably priced beer? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The La Mimosa restaurant does serve alcohol and has an extensive menu of beverages, which customers consider either expensive or affordable.

src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.For what it is, it's got a great little view, and the location is very accessible to many other things. 2.The visuals of the location were stunning and I found that the places outside of the location had much to offer as well. 3.Especially with the wonderful view of the ocean. 4.I was looking for a room with a great view and that's the primary reason why I booked my stay at the Alexander Bed and Breakfast. [SEP] U: I want to go to a place that has architecture. S: Yes, I've pulled up information on old schools and churches and they are all located in the centre. Would you like their addresses? U: If I could just get the phone numbers and postcodes, that would be great! S: All saints church is located at postcode cb58bs. Their number is 01223452587. U: That's perfect, I've heard of it. How about a cozy 4 star guesthouse nearby? S: Okay I have one matching that description in the city center and it is in the cheap price range but 4 stars. Would you like a booking? U: Does it include free parking as well? S: It does.  It is the Alexander Bed and Breakfast. U: Does the bed and breakfast have rooms with a good view? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Alexander Bed and Breakfast offers especially wonderful views of the ocean which to some is the primary reason for booking a stay.

src_text: reviews of HOBSONS HOUSE: 1.The view from the room was also breathtaking. 2.The view from the room was also amazing, and the cleanliness of the bathroom was top notch. [SEP] U: Hello, I'm looking for information on a hotel called Hobsons House. S: Hobsons House is a 3 star, moderately priced guesthouse in the west. Would you like me to book a room for you? U: Do the rooms there have good views? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The rooms in the Hobson House have amazing views for guests to enjoy.  Would you like me to book a room for you?

src_text: reviews of TANG CHINESE: 1.I really liked that the prices were affordable and they have a gluten free menu as well. 2.However, the food was on the pricier side, and the drinks left a lot to be desired. 3.Those reviews were correct, everything was phenomenal there from how cheap the food was to being able to see the moon perfectly out the balcony. 4.The portions were perfect and I feel like I got my money's worth. reviews of HK FUSION: 1.We were amazed at how great the prices were, especially considering how delicious it tasted. 2.That's probably why the food is so cheap, mark up the beverages. 3.Definitely look elsewhere if you're wanting tasty, affordable, high quality Chinese food. 4.Plus, it was super affordable prices. 5.The price for our dishes was very affordable especially given that the food was very high-quality. 6.On the other hand, the food dishes were quite expensive, and the decor inside the restaurant felt a bit dated and lacking. 7.It was really cheap and surprisingly still tasted very fresh like they picked the vegetables themselves. reviews of UGLY DUCKLING: 1.It's surprising the place was so affordable for a place that had such a nice view. 2.Everything was really affordable and the portions were big. 3.I also liked the stunning view and how cheap and filling the food was. 4.I also believe that the drinks and food were amazingly affordable. 5.The prices for both food and drinks were affordable. 6.Thankfully, Ugly Duckling is an affordable restaurant so you can always get extra dishes to share, but it's disappointing to see a small plate arrive to your table when you're feeling really hungry. 7.It was a great value and strongly on par with my budget. 8.I think the quality left more to be desired, albeit it was cheap. reviews of SESAME RESTAURANT AND BAR: 1.All of the food was high quality and was affordable. 2.We chowed down on spring rolls, kung pao chicken, ma po tofu, and sweet and sour pork - and believe me when I say that we could have ordered more, because the menu prices are super affordable, including their drinks menu. 3.it was very delicious and affordable to us. 4.Overall food and drink items on the menu were affordable and priced reasonably. 5.The food was very good and the restaurant's prices were very reasonable and affordable. [SEP] U: Hello, I'm trying to take a train on Wednesday that leaves from Broxbourne. Can you help me book a ticket? S: Sure I can help you with that. I have train TR0788 leaving at 05:32 and will arrive to cambridge at 06:32. U: I really need one that leaves after 11:00. S: I have 13, is there a time youd like to arrive by? U: It doesn't matter, as long as I can book it for 6 people. I will need the reference number please. S: Success! TR5953 departs at 11:32 and arrives 12:32. Your reference number is EQCLFB3Q. U: Thanks, I'm also looking for an expensive restaurant. S: Sure, which part of town are you interested in eating at? U: I'd like to eat in the city centre, if possible. Got any reco on Chinese places? S: We have four: HK Fusion, Sesame Restaurant and Bar, Ugly Duckling, and Tang Chinese. U: Which of those has a good value for the money spent? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: I am happy to tell you that the HK Fusion, Sesame Restaurant and Bar, the Ugly Duckling, and the Tang Chinese are all reasonable with their prices on their food.

src_text: reviews of PIPASHA RESTAURANT: 1.The beer is the coldest draft I've had. 2.They have good, authentic Indian dishes and a lot of affordable drink options. 3.The service was great and they had a lot of various drink options to choose from. 4.Great atmosphere and decent priced drinks. 5.Looking at the menu I was shocked by how expensive some of the drinks were. 6.I ordered some samosas and those more than made up for the beer. 7.They were quite affordable too and the food was really high quality. 8.The beer I got served didn't taste right so I had to send it back. FAQs of PIPASHA RESTAURANT: 1.Yes, this restaurant has alcohol menu. [SEP] U: I am looking for an expensive restaurant that is in the east part of town. S: The grafton hotel restaurant serves british food in the east part of town and is in the expensive price range. U: No, not that one. I'd like to know if there's anything else please. S: I would recommend pipasha restaurant, a nice indian restaurant in the east. U: I would like to know the address and phone number of pipasha restaurant and the type of food they serve S: The address is at Newmarket Road Fen Ditton and the phone number is 01223 577786. The restaurant serves indian food. U: Can you check to see if they offer delivery as well? S: Delivery options are not available at this time. Do you have any other requests? U: Does this restaurant offer disability access? S: Unfortunately, this restaurant does not have wheelchair access. Can I help you with something else? U: Can you tell me whether or not the Pipasha restaurant serves alcohol? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, according to reviews by past guests, the Pipasha Restaurant does offer an alcoholic drink menu.

src_text: reviews of ZIZZI CAMBRIDGE: 1.I really enjoyed the price for the drinks. 2.They were an excellent value and were of high quality as well as the food too. 3.Drinks and food were quite affordable. FAQs of ZIZZI CAMBRIDGE: 1.The restaurant does serve alcohol. [SEP] U: I would like to find a train that leaves on Friday and arrives by 19:30. S: What location will you be departing from and what location will you be arriving at? U: I need to go from broxbourne to cambridge by 19:30. S: TR4322 will depart broxbourne at 17:32 and arrive in cambridge at 18:32. Would you like tickets for that train? U: Can you give me the price and travel time on that? S: The price is 17.90 and the travel time is 90 minutes U: I also need a suggestion for a cheap restaurant in the centre of town. S: There are several cheap restaurants what type of food do you prefer? U: Can you give me the reference number for the train?  I would like cheap italian food in the center. S: How many passengers should I book on the train? There are three cheap Italian places. I could suggest Zizzi Cambridge. Would you like to book a table? U: Do they have reasonably priced merlot? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Zizzi Cambridge does serve alcoholic beverages with their food. I don't see anything about merlot specifically, but reviews have mentioned that everything there is affordable.

src_text: reviews of YU GARDEN: 1.The location was nice, because we were within walking distance of work. 2.It was easy to get to and was in a convenient location. 3.I highly recommend Yu Garden as long as you can find it, I'm sure their other dishes are quality as well. 4.I had some trouble finding the place at first and wish it wasn't better located and not in some off the beaten path location. [SEP] U: Can you help me find an expensive Chinese food restaurant? S: What area would you like? There are nine results. U: I'm interested in restaurants located in the East. S: Okay, Yu Garden matches your specifications. Would you like me to book a reservation? U: Is this restaurant in a nice location? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: According to the reviews that I have on hand for this location, the opinions are mixed.  Half had trouble finding it, and half thought the location nice and convenient.

src_text: reviews of CITYROOMZ: 1.When we first entered the room we were blown away by the views that can be seen, and the bathroom was especially clean. 2.I am actually really missing that view right about now. 3.We actually heard that the views were good, and we weren't disappointed. 4.It really does have a great view, and the staff made us feel very welcome. [SEP] U: Hello, I'm looking for a place to stay that is moderately priced and a star rating of 0. S: There are two places that match those requirements, one in the north and one in the city centre. Would you like to hear more about these? U: Are you sure there aren't any in the south of town? S: Sorry. There are no moderately-priced 0 star places in the south of town. Do you want to try some other criteria? U: Could you try for the center part of town? S: The cityroomz is a hotel in the centre part of town with a 0-rating in the moderate price range.  Can I reserve a room for you there? U: Do the rooms have a great view? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Guests that choose to stay at the Cityroomz aren't disappointed by the quality of the views from the rooms as they're known to be spectacular.

src_text: reviews of HOTEL DU VIN AND BISTRO: 1.Nothing in particular stood out; from the ambience to the decorations. 2.The decor inside as well, it could use a bit of help, as it didn't pop as much as it should. reviews of GALLERIA: 1.The atmosphere and decor of the resraurant was a bit boring, with no scenic vistas  to be seen out of its windows. 2.The indoor decor was dull and not appealing. 3.The restaurant was nice and had a favorable Italian theme with murals of Italy's countryside. 4.I felt like I was in Tuscany with the warm colors that surrounded the room. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a museum to go to and it should be in the centre.  I would like free admission. S: I have 11 different options to choose from. If you would like a recommendation, the Primavera is a great museum to visit! Would you like more information on them? U: I am looking for a museum in the city center. S: Castle galleries is a great place to visit in town centre and also has free entrance.  Would you like the address? U: Yes,and I will be needing the phone number also. S: Castle galleries is located at unit su43, grande arcade, saint andrews street, phone 01223307402. Can I help you with anything else today? U: Yes, I was also interested in a European restaurant in the same area. S: We have 6 european restaurants in the centre area. Do you have a price preference? U: I need a moderate price range. S: Hotel du vin and bistro or galleria should meet your needs. Would you like to book a table? If you'd prefer modern european instead, I can make a different recommendation. U: Does it have nice indoor decor? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Hotel Du Vin’s decor doesnt stand out and needs an update according to past customer reviews. Anything else you would like to know?

src_text: reviews of GONVILLE HOTEL: 1.I loved the 24 hour service at the front desk and the view was impeccable! 2.Our room had an excellent view of the surrounding sights and attractions. 3.It was a really stunning view to wake up to every morning, and romantic to look at in the evenings. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a moderately priced restaurant in the centre. Can you recommend one? S: Sure, I can help you with that.  There are plenty of options that meet your requirements.  Was there a particular type of food you were interested in? U: Are there any Australian restaurants? S: I'm sorry, there are no Australian restaurants in any price range anywhere in Cambridge. Would you like to try a different cuisine? U: What about European? S: There are four great choices but i highly recommend galleria located at 33 Bridge Street. Would you like me to reserve you a table? U: Yes can you please make me a reservation? S: Sure. What day works for you?  How many people will be in your dining group? U: Just me. And I need the reservation for Wednesday. S: Sure, what time do you prefer? U: Make it for 11:15. S: Ok, your booking was successful. The table will be reserved for 15 minutes. Your reference number is : JFF6XGYL. U: Thanks I also need a hotel to stay at with free parking in the same area as the restaurant. S: alexander bed and breakfast is quite popular in the centre of town and while on the cheap price range, it is a 4 star which includes both internet and parking. U: I am actually looking for a hotel to book, not a guesthouse. I need a hotel in the center with free parking. S: I have 2 to choose from. The Gonville Hotel which has 3 stars or the University Arms Hotel that is 4 star rated. Do you need a reservation at one? U: Lets book the Gonville Hotel. S: How many days would you like to stay? U: I need a reservation just for myself for 3 nights starting Wednesday, please. S: OK, booking complete at the Gonville Hotel for 3 nights starting on Wednesday for 1 guest. Your Reference number is : 9QUHR157. U: Can you tell me if they have nice views from the rooms? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Gonville Hotel has an impeccable, stunning view of the surrounding sights and attractions. Was there anything else?

src_text: reviews of THE CAMBRIDGE BELFRY: 1.One of the best things about the hotel is the view of the mountains from the balcony. 2.The staff was polite they took out luggage to our room, and our room had a spectacular view of the forest and nature. [SEP] U: Hello, can you recommend a cheap hotel with free parking, please? S: Yes, I have found the Cambridge Belfry that is in the west part of town.  Can I book this hotel for you? U: I want to have a good view.  Are there rooms with views here? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, the Cambridge Belfry has a really great view of the mountains and nature, according to past guests.

src_text: reviews of THE COPPER KETTLE: 1.The staff were very courteous and entertaining and we didn‚Äôt want for anything. 2.It was not as flavorful as I'd have liked and the consistency was just runny, but the servers were awesome and I enjoyed the view from the patio. 3.The bartender was awesome and made some great drinks. 4.Despite the great food and drink, the service was average at best, and was quite slow. 5.So they have a nice outdoor area for dining, some vegetarian options and the service was really good. [SEP] U: Can you suggest any local restaurants in the centre that serve fusion food? Thanks. S: Unfortunately, there are no restaurants meeting your criteria. U: Okay, in that case, can you recommend something else in the centre that is moderately priced? S: I don't see any restaurants matching your criteria. Do you have any other criteria I can search for? U: Can you check for british food instead? S: I have 5 would you like m to recommend one? U: Yes, that would be great! S: You should try the the copper kettle at 4 Kings Parade City Centre. Would you like me to make a reservation for you there? U: Do they have a friendly and responsive staff? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: All but one of the reviewers said the staff were excellent there. The one reviewer who did not like the staff said that they were slow.

src_text: reviews of CITYROOMZ: 1.When we first entered the room we were blown away by the views that can be seen, and the bathroom was especially clean. 2.I am actually really missing that view right about now. 3.We actually heard that the views were good, and we weren't disappointed. 4.It really does have a great view, and the staff made us feel very welcome. [SEP] U: Hi there. I'd like to find a place to dine in the city centre, preferable with Sri Lankan food. Do you have any recommendations? S: Sorry, I don't have any restaurants with sri lankan food in the centre. Would you like to try another type of food? U: Could you try again? Moderately priced, perhaps? S: Sorry, there was nothing found. Do you want to try a different kind of food? U: How about modern european food? S: There are two options for modern european food in centre in the moderate price range.  May I suggest Riverside Brasserie? U: Sure! Could you tell me the address - including the postcode and phone number please? S: Sure, they're located at the Doubletree by Hilton Cambridge Granta Place Mill Lane in postcode cb21rt. Their phone number is 01223259988. Can I help with anything else today? U: Great. I am also looking for a guesthouse to stay in and I don't need parking. S: Not a problem. Do you have a preference on area? U: Moderately priced in the centre, please. S: Unfortunately, there is no hotel in the moderately priced area U: Is there any other type of hotel in the area? S: Sorry, there are no guesthouse in centre within the moderate price range. Can I help you with anything else? U: I understand that there are no guesthouses in the area.  But can you see if there are other hotels in the area?  Moderately priced and in the centre, please. S: I was able to find cityroomz, it's a hotel in the centre that is moderately priced.  Can I make a booking for you? U: Is there a room here that specifically highlights the view offered? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Many past customers were happy with the view from their room. One even described it as being blown away by the view.

src_text: reviews of THE CAMBRIDGE CHOP HOUSE: 1.Too bad there was little in the way of soft drinks for the kids. 2.There wasn't much in the way of non alcohol based drinks. reviews of MIDSUMMER HOUSE RESTAURANT: 1.The first thing I ordered was some afternoon tea, which turned out bland and a little too sweet, however the place did have a wide variety of non-alcoholic options which I felt was wholesome. 2.The only downside was a fairly limited menu of non-alcoholic drink options, but if you go for the afternoon tea as we did, it won't be much of an issue. 3.My friends and I do agree that the non-alcoholic drink options were great and there were lots to chose from. [SEP] U: Hello, I'm look for information about restaurants in Cambridge. I would like them to be fine dining and serve Catalan food. S: I'm sorry but there aren't any fine Catalan restaurants in Cambridge. U: There's nothing in the city centre? Nothing in the expensive price range? S: There are 33 expensive establishment in the centre, none of which are catalanan, do you want me to lookup another restaurant type? U: Yes, are there any that serve British food? S: There are 3 that fit your new criteria: Fitzbillies Restaurant, the Cambridge Chop House, and Misdummer House Restaurant. Would you like a reservation at one of these? U: Do they serve non-alcoholic drinks? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: I don't have any information on Fitzbillies restaurant. The Cambridge chop House does not have a large non alcoholic drink selection. Most of the reviews for midsummer House restaurant said their non alcoholic drink selection was too small. Only one person said they had a wide variety of non-alcoholic drinks.

src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.The location was extremely silent and I found that I was not disturbed during my time on this trip. 2.Our room was a bit noisy as we could hear the televisions nearby. 3.Also, due to the popularity of this place, it is quite noisy. 4.We didn't like how much traffic there was by the bed and breakfast. 5.We would consider staying there again on a less busy weekend in hopes that the traffic noise wouldn't be so bad. 6.The walls were also very thin and you could hear the people staying in the room next to you. 7.The B&B is pretty quiet and well appointed, and the staff goes out of their way to be friendly. 8.It was very noisy while we were trying to sleep. [SEP] U: Could you help me find a train to norwich? S: Not a problem. Where are you departing from, and what day would you like to travel? U: I want to leave from cambridge on wednesday. S: What time of day would you like to travel? U: I don't have a preferred departure time but the train should arrive by 18:15. S: TR1871 arrives by 16:55 and TR6838 arrives by 17:55. They are both the same price. Would you like to book one of these? U: Book the TR6838 please. I'm also looking for a place to stay if you don't mind. S: I have several different hotels. Are you wanting a certain area of town or any special accommodations? U: I would prefer it to be a 4 star hotel, with free parking. S: We have several hotels that meet your requirements. Would you prefer a hotel that is cheap or moderate in price? U: Oh, I really don't worry about the price, so long as it has four stars and free parking. S: Alright, might I suggest the Alexander Bed and Breakfast then? U: Is this location a quiet place? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Most people say that the location and rooms were noisy due to traffic and other guests, while some say that the location was quiet.

src_text: reviews of AYLESBRAY LODGE GUEST HOUSE: 1.The room was nice and big and I was able to do my laundry at there facility but the room was a bit dirty. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a place to see, can you help? S: I certainly can.  Is there a type of attraction that interests you? U: I'm interested in the mumford theatre. S: It's located at anglia ruskin enterprise, east road in the centre of town. The phone number is 08451962320 and the postcode is cb11pt. Do you need more help? U: I am also looking for a hotel called the Aylesbray Lodge guest house near by. S: The aylesbray lodge is on 5 mowbray road. Would you like me to make you a reservation? U: what type of hotel is it? S: it is a guest house U: Are there any large rooms available? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The rooms at the aylesbray lodge seem to be quite big, going off of guest reviews. Do you want me to make you a reservation?

src_text: reviews of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.We stayed at the Acorn guest house and I loved the view. 2.Outside of the balcony of my room, I found that the exquisite view was unlike anything I've ever seen before. 3.The wi-fi was super fast though and the room provided a great view. 4.I also enjoyed the great view as that helped me take a moment to enjoy some peace and quiet. 5.We didn't care so much if it had other things, but a great view and good location, were not things we were going to give a little on. src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.The location was extremely silent and I found that I was not disturbed during my time on this trip. 2.Our room was a bit noisy as we could hear the televisions nearby. 3.Also, due to the popularity of this place, it is quite noisy. 4.We didn't like how much traffic there was by the bed and breakfast. 5.We would consider staying there again on a less busy weekend in hopes that the traffic noise wouldn't be so bad. 6.The walls were also very thin and you could hear the people staying in the room next to you. 7.The B&B is pretty quiet and well appointed, and the staff goes out of their way to be friendly. 8.It was very noisy while we were trying to sleep. src_text:
reviews of THE NIRALA: 1.The location could not be better: right in the heart of the city with excellent views after the sun goes down. 2.They also have a modest drinks menu with some affordable prices, but I was more interested in the beautiful view from my window seat, which allowed me to watch the sun setting as I dined. 3.The only places they can use some improvement in is giving it all a better view which might also bring up the atmosphere as well 4.I have to say, the service was excellent, and the views from the restaurant can't be beat. [SEP] U: Can you help me find somewhere to stay with free wifi? S: Sure, most places offer that these days.  Do you have an area of town you would like to stay in? U: We need the hotel to be in the north. S: Okay and what is your price range? U: Price range doesn't matter to me. I'd like it to have a one star. S: I'm so sorry, but we don't have a one star in that area.  Would you like for me to check a different area? U: How about a 4 star rating? S: The acorn guest house is a 4 star guesthouse with wifi. Would you like to make a reservation? U: sure, i need it for 3 nights starting wednesday. S: Before I book how many people will be staying with you? U: Please book the hotel for 5 people. S: Booking was successful.
Reference number is : YYXR9VMX U: Thanks. I also need a restaurant in the same area. S: There are several restaurants, what type of food and price range? U: Indian food would be great. S: Okay, what is your price range? We have one in the moderate and one in the cheap range. U: Can you please make a reservation at the moderately priced one? S: The Nirala serves Indian cuisine at a moderate price, and is located in the north. How many in your party? What time would you like the table reserved? U: Does the table have a nice view? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Most reviews I found praised the views at the Nirala, saying you can see the sun as it sets. Only one review was critical of the view and atmosphere.

src_text: reviews of SITAR TANDOORI: 1.Upon looking at the menu, I noticed this place was charging a lot more money for the same dishes you can get elsewhere for less of the price. 2.So, I was able to enjoy a night out with my friends without breaking the bank. 3.The service was awesome and friendly, and for once the foods were affordable and not expensive like most Indian restaurants. 4.Food quality is superb, and very reasonably priced. 5.I guess that's why their dinner menu is so expensive. 6.However, the drinks were not all that tasty, and the food was overpriced and not very tasty either. 7.It made up for the price. 8.The food was also affordable, as were the drinks, so I was glad to be able to spend time out without breaking the bank. 9.I was especially happy that, since I'm on a budget, the foods were affordable. reviews of PIPASHA RESTAURANT: 1.It was of very high quality and was down-right cheap given the large portions. 2.The location was appealing and I have to admit that the prices were pretty low. 3.I had a bit of sticker shock when the bill came. 4.There's always good food at a great price and plenty of options for our vegetarian friends. 5.The food was high-quality and the portions were generous but you pay for what you get. 6.I looked at their menu and was pleasantly surprised at how affordable most everything was. [SEP] U: What can you tell me about Magdalene College? S: Magdalene College is located in the west area of town. There is no entrance fee. U: Thank you for your help. S: You're welcome. Let us know if you need anything else. U: I do, actually. I'd also like to find a good place to dine in the east. Do you know of any Swiss restaurants in that area? S: Unfortunately there doesn't seem to be any Swiss options in the east. Could I help you with anything else? U: Hmm, I was really looking forward to Swiss food. Ok, how about an indian restaurant in the east instead? S: That we can do. We have two moderately priced and two expensive Indian restaurants in the east. U: what are the two expensive indian restaurants? S: Sitar Tandoori and Pipasha Restaurant are the expensive options. U: I'm looking for a good value; which do you suggest? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: There are mixed reviews on the value at both Sitar Tandoori and Pipasha. Some guests felt they got a good value, but others didn't.

src_text: FAQs of MEZE BAR: 1.Meze Bar serves alcohol. reviews of MEZE BAR: 1.The service is great and they have a nice drink selection. 2.The food was good but they really didn't give me much and there were no gluten free options available but the nice location of the restaurant and the various drink options didn't make up for that. 3.I was disappointed in my beer as there were only mediocre choices for drinks. 4.The establishment has many drink options, vegetarian options, and the food prices were highly affordable. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: I can't be certain, about half of the reviews say that they had a lot of drinks to choose from and the other half say they did not have many to choose from. Sorry.

src_text: reviews of THE NIRALA: 1.They also have a modest drinks menu with some affordable prices, but I was more interested in the beautiful view from my window seat, which allowed me to watch the sun setting as I dined. 2.I found them to be overpriced and mediocre. 3.The drinks ae priced well. 4.Something that I disliked, however was the prices for their drinks. src_text: reviews of THE CAMBRIDGE BELFRY: 1.This hotel offered the best place for our limited budget. 2.But the fee to use the spa was too high. 3.The only downside was the price of our stay, which was a bit more than normal. src_text: reviews of GRAFFITI: 1.The price and quality of food were off the charts, and service was great as well. 2.Their beers were ok too and service was super friendly and nice. 3.Initially I was put off by the high prices on the menu but the great service made up for it. 4.I enjoyed my time here just for the service and atmosphere. src_text: reviews of RESTAURANT TWO TWO: 1.They seemed to be somewhat high. 2.I was impressed by the price affordability and the fact that they had man high quality meatless options. 3.Compared to the price of the food I thought the drinks should have been similarly priced. 4.The one drawback was the prices of certain dishes. 5.They have nice french dishes that are well made even if overpriced. 6.All of the food was mid priced with most dishes between $12 to $15. src_text: reviews of CAFFE UNO: 1.My family and I also had a great night just talking since the view was nice and the atmosphere was pleasant. 2.The drinks are cheap during happy hour though and the view from the patio is refreshing. 3.Things I really liked about the restaurant was the view, great service and the portion size. 4.The restaurant does have a great view, so that helped provide some romantic ambiance, and the outdoor dining option was great because it gave us some privacy away from the crowd. [SEP] U: I'm trying to find an Italian restaurant in the city centre. S: What price range are you looking at? U: I would like a expensive price range. S: How about caffee uno. there are also 3 others. U: Can I get a really great view of the city at this restaurant? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: When choosing to dine at the Caffe Uno location, one should expect to be treated with great, refreshing views.

src_text: reviews of THE CAMBRIDGE CHOP HOUSE: 1.The view from our table was awesome as well we could see the surrounding restaurant and the kitchen. 2.The view could be better but the food is good and you get a lot. 3.At least the view was nice and we could enjoy it from the outdoor dining area. 4.I would recommend going to the restaurant again and sitting outside because there is a nice view. 5.The indoor decor was nice, which is good since they had a poor view. 6.We love the view from our table out over the mountainside. 7.I requested outdoor seating, it was pleasant for dining but did not have a great view. 8.The view out the window was a wonderful view of the city, but the atmosphere within the restaurant was boisterous and annoying. src_text: reviews of BANGKOK CITY: 1.The atmosphere was great and felt like a quaint little Thai place. 2.Overall I loved the atmosphere there. reviews of SALA THONG: 1.The atmosphere itself could have been better but the food was great but left you hungry. 2.We were sat on the top level with a beautiful view of the countryside which set the mood for what turned out a be a quite romantic dinner. 3.I also enjoyed the swanky atmosphere and ambiance. src_text: reviews of ROSA'S BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.We also really enjoyed the pleasant views that they had in their rooms which was another enjoyable experience. 2.The view was breathtaking. 3.The B&B had a super convenient location, and my room had a wonderful view. 4.To have the big room and that gorgeous view together was absolutely worth it. src_text: reviews of STAZIONE RESTAURANT AND COFFEE BAR: 1.The only negative we took away from our trip to this restaurant is that we thought that the drinks were a tad overpriced, but all-in-all we had a great date night and will definitely be back again. 2.I found the drink prices good, but was disappointed by the lack of non-alcoholic options. 3.The drinks were affordable and our waiter suggested the perfect pairings for each of the dishes my colleagues and I ordered - lasgna, meatballs and spaghetti, risotto, and bolognese. 4.I love almost everything about this place: the food tastes authentic and well-prepared; the wine was delicious; the prices are really affordable; and the location of the restaurant is so close to home that I can get there in less than ten minutes time. FAQs of STAZIONE RESTAURANT AND COFFEE BAR: 1.Yes, alcohol is served at this place. [SEP] U: I need information on a hotel named,"rosa's bed and breakfast". U: I also am looking for a restaurant called Stazione Resaurant and Coffee Bar. S: Stazione restaurant and coffee bar is an expensive italian restaurant located in the centre, shall I make a reservation for you? U: Does it have cheap chardonnay there? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Stazione Restaurant and Coffee Bar does offer alcohol, including wine. Three guests thought the alcohol prices were reasonable, one said it was a tad overpriced but they might not have been drinking wine.

src_text: reviews of THE LENSFIELD HOTEL: 1.It was great. 2.I didn't have to get grossed out by little dirty areas any where. 3.The things i liked about the hotel were the cleaniness of the room for one. 4.I really appreciated how clean the room and bathroom were. 5.Very neat not dust at all. reviews of GONVILLE HOTEL: 1.I had to wait until morning to have that issue addressed. 2.The only things that my partner didn't like was the room not being cleaned when we first checked in and it being overpriced compared to the other options nearby. 3.Sadly, the room was not clean. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: No, the Gonville Hotel is known to have issues in terms of cleanliness, while the Lensfield Hotel has great standards of cleaning.

src_text: reviews of CURRY PRINCE: 1.Their korma is truly excellent, and the wait staff is both knowledgeable and really inviting, making you feel very much at home. 2.The place is well-decorated, clean and they were very attentive. 3.It all came out very fast as we were delighted by this. 4.We were promptly seated by a kind waitress. 5.While the portion sizes for food are generous the food is nothing special and the service not very enthusiastic. reviews of TAJ TANDOORI: 1.The food was of good portion and good atmosphere and services, but i didn't like the Mediocre foods 2.The food is good and our server was very attentive. U: east or south S: I have 5 restaurants that meet those criteria. How about Taj Tandoori in the south or Curry Prince in the east? Are you looking for a specific price range? src_text: reviews of CITYROOMZ: 1.When we first entered the room we were blown away by the views that can be seen, and the bathroom was especially clean. 2.I am actually really missing that view right about now. 3.We actually heard that the views were good, and we weren't disappointed. 4.It really does have a great view, and the staff made us feel very welcome. src_text: reviews of WARKWORTH HOUSE: 1.The room and hotel had a fast wifi which was useful and not aggravatingly slow like we've all seen, the room was large and I liked that too. 2.When I needed to use the Internet, I found that the wireless Internet was extremely quick and more than enough for my business needs. 3.The Warkworth House has good Wi-Fi which I used a lot because I travelled alone. 4.My work called me up and needed me to go on a business trip, so I went here, and oh boy I must say they have really good breakfast options and the WiFi was super fast. src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.The location was extremely silent and I found that I was not disturbed during my time on this trip. 2.Our room was a bit noisy as we could hear the televisions nearby. 3.Also, due to the popularity of this place, it is quite noisy. 4.We didn't like how much traffic there was by the bed and breakfast. 5.We would consider staying there again on a less busy weekend in hopes that the traffic noise wouldn't be so bad. 6.The walls were also very thin and you could hear the people staying in the room next to you. 7.The B&B is pretty quiet and well appointed, and the staff goes out of their way to be friendly. 8.It was very noisy while we were trying to sleep. src_text: reviews of MIDSUMMER HOUSE RESTAURANT: 1.The waiters took too long to serve us. 2.The staff was courteous and attentive and otherwise we thoroughly enjoyed ourselves. 3.Inside, you would think you've been transported to an old English pub, complete with wood paneling, beautiful tables and friendly waitstaff. 4.But the service did not impress me. reviews of FITZBILLIES RESTAURANT: 1.We seated ourselves in the busy dining room, as there was no host. 2.The service was mindblowingly good with a supreme example of some of the best high quality food. 3.Despite the great spot, the service was very slow and the drinks were average at best. 4.But when our food came to the table - which was delivered by a server who seemed like she'd rather be anywhere else than the restaurant - we all found it to be bland and uninspiring in quality. 5.It was a really pleasant place for a date since the service was great. 6.You'll always be greeted by a friendly staff and a wide variety of drink options as well as the best British cuisine on offer. 7.I don't know if I'd come here again because of the lousy service. 8.The only problem was how small the portions were and I had to ask for my server several times before she would come bring me condiments. reviews of THE CAMBRIDGE CHOP HOUSE: 1.Once we arrived we were pleasantly surprised by the quality of the service we got from the employees. src_text: FAQs of AVALON: 1.The Avalon provides several breakfast options including full English breakfast but there is a charge. reviews of AVALON: 1.I got everything from pancakes to sushi. 2.In the morning, I did not need to go anywhere else for breakfast because of the wide variety of delicious foods available. 3.The breakfast was good too. 4.I mean the food was delicious and they had everything you can ask for. 5.I was very happy with the good breakfast options provided. 6.I had scrambled eggs and they had great toppings like cheese. reviews of LIMEHOUSE: 1.In the mornings, despite our hectic schedules, the provided breakfast options were extremely delicious. 2.That said, the breakfast was very mediocre, and there was no service to store my luggage. 3.The good breakfast options and super friendly staff more than made up for the missing safe. FAQs of LIMEHOUSE: 1.A continental breakfast is offered at Limehouse with no charge. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a place to stay, can you help me out? S: I sure can. src_text: reviews of LA MARGHERITA: 1.The service was great and the drinks were affordably priced. 2.The drinks are solid, and reasonably priced. 3.The best part of it all was that our drinks were highly affordable, so we didn't spend nearly as much as we typically do at Olive Garden. 4.The adults also enjoyed an excellent bottle of pinot noir, which was really affordable given the good quality of the wine. 5.Drinks are expensive here and the view is not much. FAQs of LA MARGHERITA: 1.La Margherita offers alcohol. [SEP] U: Are there any parks in town, by chance? S: There is one in the centre, one in the east, one in the north and two in the south. U: i need its address and phone number. S: The address is Bateman Street, postcode cb21jf and the phone number is 01223336265. U: Thanks. I also need a place to get afternoon tea in the west. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: I am not sure about merlot, but they do offer excellent pinot noir. One person said the drinks were expensive but most said the opposite.

src_text: reviews of YIPPEE NOODLE BAR: 1.However, the interior decoration was mediocre. 2.The variety non-alcoholic drink options was certainly a plus in that place, as was their indoor decor and very high quality of food ingredients. reviews of RESTAURANT ONE SEVEN: 1.The food was of good quality, affordable for drinks price, Various gluten-free options and a nice indoor d√©cor but i didn't like the Mediocre service and  view 2.It was very hip and modern with lots of polished faux-marble. 3.With such a stripped down minimalist name you'd expect a sleek modern look to the place and you'd be right. 4.Upon arrival I really liked the d√©cor and setting of the place. reviews of THE OAK BISTRO: 1.It was a hard location to get to but once inside I was really calmed because of the nice interior decor. 2.I loved the indoor decor, as did my girlfriend. 3.it is pleasantly decorated and the view is enjoyable. src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.The location was extremely silent and I found that I was not disturbed during my time on this trip. 2.Our room was a bit noisy as we could hear the televisions nearby. 3.Also, due to the popularity of this place, it is quite noisy. 4.We didn't like how much traffic there was by the bed and breakfast. 5.We would consider staying there again on a less busy weekend in hopes that the traffic noise wouldn't be so bad. 6.The walls were also very thin and you could hear the people staying in the room next to you. 7.The B&B is pretty quiet and well appointed, and the staff goes out of their way to be friendly. 8.It was very noisy while we were trying to sleep. [SEP] U: I'm trying to find the Alexander Bed and Breakfast. S: I have the Alexander B & B located on 56 Saint Barnabas Road. Would you like me to assist you in making a reservation? U: Is it a quiet place to stay? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Guests have stated that the Alexander b&b is not quiet, that the rooms walls are thin, that there's traffic, but some stated that the rooms are silent.

src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.The location was extremely silent and I found that I was not disturbed during my time on this trip. 2.Our room was a bit noisy as we could hear the televisions nearby. 3.Also, due to the popularity of this place, it is quite noisy. 4.We didn't like how much traffic there was by the bed and breakfast. 5.We would consider staying there again on a less busy weekend in hopes that the traffic noise wouldn't be so bad. 6.The walls were also very thin and you could hear the people staying in the room next to you. 7.The B&B is pretty quiet and well appointed, and the staff goes out of their way to be friendly. 8.It was very noisy while we were trying to sleep. [SEP] U: Hello I'll be coming to Cambridge and need a room to stay in. Can you recommend a guesthouse that has free parking? S: I have 21 guesthouses in cambridge.  What price range and what area were you looking for? U: I don't have a price range in mind. But I would like a 4 star rating and somewhere that offers free parking. S: Ok, there are 16 hotels that meet that criteria. Is there a particular area of town you're interested in? U: No I don't care which area it is in, just so it is a guesthouse with free parking and 4 stars. S: The Alexander Bed and Breakfast is a popular choice. It's inexpensive, but rated 4 stars, and offers both free parking and free wifi. U: Is it quiet? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: There were mixed reviews on the noise level, however the majority found either the traffic too loud or the walls too thin letting in noise from the other rooms. Can I provide you with any other information about Alexander Bed and Breakfast?

src_text: reviews of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.The Acorn Guest House offered a room that was more than large enough for my family. [SEP] U: I want to try a local restaurant called Jinling noodle bar, can you help? S: Absolutely! The address of the restaurant is 11 Peas Hill City Centre, and their telephone number is 01223566188. Would you like me to help you find a taxi there? U: No thank you, but can you make a booking for 2 people at 17:30 on wednesday? U: I am also looking for a hotel in town. I would need free parking and free wifi. S: Do you have an area of town you prefer? U: I do not prefer a particular area of town but I would like the hotel to be a  guesthouse. S: There are 21 accommodations that meet your criteria. Is there a particular price range you prefer? U: I do not care about the price range S: The Acorn Guest House is moderately priced and 4 stars. Would you like to book there? U: Does this location have a large room available? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Guests that have stayed at the Acorn Guest House have noted that the rooms were large enough to accommodate their families.

src_text: reviews of EXPRESS BY HOLIDAY INN CAMBRIDGE: 1.We were all thrilled with the great view from the hotel. 2.It was very beautiful. 3.While the noise issue was frustrating, I did like the great view from my hotel room, and I took advantage of the really wonderful spa facility that was available. 4.The only two good points were the great view and that the hotel was generally pretty quiet. [SEP] U: Hello!  I am looking for places to stay in Cambridge.  Can you help me with this? S: There are several guesthouses where would you like it and what price range? U: I would like an expensive place in the north. S: Unfortunately, I do not have any expensive hotels or guesthouses in the north. Would you like me to check a different area or price range? U: Can we try to find one that is in the East please? S: I have one, would you like me to book it ? U: Yes, for one person and four nights on Thursday. S: I do apologize, but it looks like it's all booked. Perhaps try a shorter stay or another start day? U: Could you try to book it for one night instead? S: I was able to book Express by Holiday Inn Cambridge. 1 day with 1 person. Your reference number is XLN3932A. U: What kinds of things will I be able to see from my hotel room? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: According to some of the reviews there is a great view from the hotel.  Other guests have called the views very beautiful.

src_text: reviews of THE OAK BISTRO: 1.The first thing that stood out is that from my seat I could see a lake as I was on the second floor. 2.It was a gorgeous view. 3.it is pleasantly decorated and the view is enjoyable. [SEP] U: Hi. I'm looking for a Hungarian restaurant in Cambridge that is moderately priced. Can you help me? S: I'm sorry, there are no Hungarian restaurants in Cambridge.  Can I find a different type of restaurant for you? U: Hmm, well maybe british food if you have anything. S: I have found several British restaurants. Do you have any other criteria? U: No can you recommend one? S: If you ask me, the Oak Bistro is the place to go. They are in the centre of town and are moderately priced but the food is delicious. src_text: reviews of ASHLEY HOTEL: 1.The room was large and had central heat and air, had two beds and a separate area with a couch and television. 2.The rooms are definitely overpriced and on the smaller side, but not too bad. 3.The room and bed were ample and comfortable. 4.The Ashley Hotel has big rooms, and really comfortable beds. src_text: reviews of UNIVERSITY ARMS HOTEL: 1.The view from my room was really picturesque, and the bed offered a really comfortable night of sleep. 2.Staying at this place was great, as I was able to enjoy the view with my girlfriend. 3.The positives are that the location was great and so was the view. reviews of GONVILLE HOTEL: 1.I loved the 24 hour service at the front desk and the view was impeccable! 2.It was a really stunning view to wake up to every morning, and romantic to look at in the evenings. 3.Our room had an excellent view of the surrounding sights and attractions. [SEP] U: Hi, can you help me find an upscale restaurant in Cambridge that is centrally located? S: Yes there are 33 in the area you are looking for. They are all pretty expensive and are closely located. U: Are any of those Ethiopian restaurants? S: There is an upscale African restaurant called Bedouin. Would you like me to book it? U: yes, could you make reservations for three please? S: I would be glad to. I need to know the day and time you would like the reservation for, please. U: Actually, book the table for 6 people on Tuesday at 13:30. I will need the reference number for this, please. S: Your party of 6 has been booked successfully for 13:30 on Tuesday. The table will be reserved for 15 minutes. Your reference number is 7E4VIQAY U: I also need a hotel in the same area and price range as the restaurant. S: Yes both options have free paring and internet. Would you like to book one of these? U: Which place has the best view from the room? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The view from the Gonville Hotel is known to be excellent, even romantic, while that of the University Arms Hotel is equally picturesque.

src_text: reviews of THE CAMBRIDGE BELFRY: 1.The room was clean, not a spot anywhere. 2.On the other hand the room wasn't very clean and I felt uncomfortable sitting in the chairs or using the bathroom for fear of germs. 3.We enjoyed our stay the bed were comfortable and the room was clean. src_text: reviews of ALLENBELL: 1.The facilities, especially the bathroom were super-clean and sanitary. 2.During my recent stay at ALLENBELL with your family, I was impressed by the big room with a clean bathroom. [SEP] U: Hi. I will be attending a conference in the eastern part of town and wondered if you could help me find an available room. src_text: reviews of GOLDEN WOK: 1.The service was a bit slow and I wish they had more options for drinks. 2.The wait staff could certainly be more friendly but the location is great as is the view from the patio. 3.The staff are super friendly, especially our server Laura. 4.The service was great as we were helped as soon as we walked in and seated immediately. 5.Our server was great, really friendly and helpful. 6.The food came in pretty quickly as well after ordering. 7.The highlight was the service was really good because the staff were super friendly and were there to take care of my needs and the location was in a good area of town. 8.The staff are all kind and courteous. src_text: reviews of LIMEHOUSE: 1.Free parking was an amazing perk, and I think overall I got a great value for the money. 2.Limehouse is a VERY overpriced hotel, I'm sad to say. 3.For one solo person, the price was simply too high. 4.That said, I have to give it points for being a quiet hotel with comfy beds, but if you favor saving money, I would look elsewhere! [SEP] U: I am looking for a hotel in the Cambridge area called the limehouse. S: The Limehouse is a moderately priced guesthouse on the north side of Cambridge. They are a 4-star establishment and offer free parking and Internet. Would you like to make a reservation? U: Do you get a lot for what you spend? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Limehouse hotel has three reviews that say it's overpriced, but only one person that says it was worth the money.

src_text: reviews of ERAINA: 1.The restaurant is in a really nice location, which makes it wonderful for a date night out on the town. 2.Great view from the downtown location though, so all-in-all it made for a great date night. 3.On the other hand, it's in a great spot in my favorite part of town and the service was fast and friendly. 4.The location of the restaurant could be better, because it's kind of in the middle of nowhere, but that's a small gripe. [SEP] U: I'm looking for European restaurant in the centre. S: I see there are several, can you make a recommendation? U: I haven't tried any in that area before. What would you suggest? S: I have the eraina that is expensive or the riverside brasserie which is in the moderate range. U: Can I get the phone number and postcode for eraina, please? S: Their phone number is 01223368786, and postcode is cb23rh. U: I also need a cheap place to stay, with free wifi. S: I have about 10 different options. To help narrow it down, do you prefer a certain area of town to stay in? U: The same area as the restaurant and I prefer a guesthouse. S: There are 2 guesthouses that match your specifications. The Alexander Bed and Breakfast has 4 stars, and El Shaddai has 0. Would you like to book one of these? U: I would like to book  The Alexander Bed and Breakfast S: I can help you with that. How many people should I book it for? How many days will you be staying? U: It will be for six people for 4 nights starting on Monday. S: You booking if successful, the reference number is IHXZ0B9O, can I help with anything else? U: Yes I would like to book a taxi to commute between the two places. S: I can do that, what time would you like that done. U: I would like to be picked up at the restaurant by 16:30. S: I have booked a taxi for you.  It is a red volkswagen, contact number 07105298211, and it will pick you up at Riverside Brasserie at 16:30. U: Thank you very much! S: Can I help you with anything else today? U: I'm sorry but I will be dining at the Eraina restaurant. Can you have the same taxi pick me up there instead? S: My apologies! I've changed your taxi booking: picking up: Eraina and drop off: Alexander B and B, leaving at 16:30. Your car will be a white Honda, contact number 07834851292. U: Is Eraina located in a safe and accessible neighborhood? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Those who have previously dined at the Eraina restaurant enjoyed the location as being in the downtown area, near nightlife.

src_text: reviews of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.We stayed at the Acorn guest house and I loved the view. 2.Outside of the balcony of my room, I found that the exquisite view was unlike anything I've ever seen before. 3.The wi-fi was super fast though and the room provided a great view. 4.I also enjoyed the great view as that helped me take a moment to enjoy some peace and quiet. 5.We didn't care so much if it had other things, but a great view and good location, were not things we were going to give a little on. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Most, but not all, past guests thought the Ashley offered spacious rooms but a few guests did feel cramped in relation to the room's cost.

src_text: reviews of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.We stayed at the Acorn guest house and I loved the view. 2.Outside of the balcony of my room, I found that the exquisite view was unlike anything I've ever seen before. 3.The wi-fi was super fast though and the room provided a great view. 4.I also enjoyed the great view as that helped me take a moment to enjoy some peace and quiet. 5.We didn't care so much if it had other things, but a great view and good location, were not things we were going to give a little on. [SEP] U: I am looking for a place to eat in the centre of town. S: You have many different options to choose from as well as different price ranges. Are you looking for a casual or formal restaurant? U: I don't really care, not really picky. S: check out kymmoy. its asian oriental and its expensive. you want the adress? U: yes adress and phone number please S: The address is 52 Mill Road City Centre. Their phone number is 01223311911. U: Can i get the post code as well please? S: The postcode is cb12as. I can make a reservation for you if you'd like. U: I need reservations for 7 people at 17:30 on friday. S: Reference number is : MWDLZXJR. Is there anything else? U: Can you also find me a place to stay that includes free wifi and in the same price range as the restaurant? S: Do you wish to stay in the centre of town? U: It doesn't matter, as long as it is a guesthouse and includes free parking. S: I'm sorry but there are no guesthouses that match your criteria. Would you like me to look for a hotel instead? U: are you sure there are no moderately priced guesthouses with parking and wifi in all of cambridge? That seems unlikely to me S: There are several, do you have a specific area you are interested in? U: I would like it moderate priced and make sure it is a guest house please. S: We have quite a few, may I suggest the acorn guest house? I need to know when you'll be arriving and the number of people please. U: May I check if they have good views? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Of course, the majority of the guests found their views to be quite beautiful with one person saying their view was exquisite. Would you like to know more about the Acorn?

src_text: reviews of ARCHWAY HOUSE: 1.However, I found that the location was extremely loud and disruptive. 2.I was staying alone and the room was very quiet. 3.The location and guests were very quiet, which I really appreciated. 4.Also, I noticed that the volume of my room was extremely quiet and I was not disrupted during my stay. [SEP] U: Hi. I am looking for a hotel that is a guesthouse that has free parking. Can you help me find one? S: There are 21 options available. Do you have any other preferences to narrow down the search? U: Sure, how about an expensive, four star guest house? S: It doesn't look like we have any expensive 4 star guesthouses. There are some which are moderate if you are interested. U: Moderate will do. Can you give me more information please? S: The Archway House is very nice. Would you like me to book a reservation? U: Is this hotel located in a quiet area? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Most customers say that the rooms and the guesthouse was quiet but one person said that the location was loud.

src_text: reviews of JINLING NOODLE BAR: 1.The only issue was that each mixed drink was $15 which I found to be very expensive. 2.I wouldn't recommend ordering from the alcoholic drink menu at Jinling, because their specialty drinks are way overpriced for what you get. 3.You could tell they have a good bartender as the drinks weren't too powerful but they had the right amount of alcohol taste. 4.Their drinks were really good, though expensive, and lacking in non-alcoholic options. 5.The food just tastes bland and inauthentic, and if you try to jazz it up with a stiff drink, you find out that their drink menu is super limited as well. 6.Not only that but the food as well as the drinks was priced well within our budget. 7.Some of us also ordered drinks, and while they were really enjoyable and high in quality, we thought they were pretty overpriced for what we got. FAQs of JINLING NOODLE BAR: 1.There is alcohol served at Jinling Noodle Bar. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a moderate priced place to dine in the centre of town S: I've got many here that match that description. Would you like a specific food type? Maybe British food? U: How about Chinese food? S: jinling noodle bar is a chinese restaurant in the centre, 11 Peas Hill City Centre U: That will be great, do they serve alcohol as well? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: They serve alcohol although they're considered a bit expensive though they're considered to be quite adequate.

src_text: reviews of SHIRAZ RESTAURANT: 1.I enjoyed the view and drinks like always haha. 2.The drinks were priced affordable and we enjoyed the view by the windows. 3.I visited SHIRAZ RESTAURANT for the first time and the place has a great ambiance, with a view overlooking the town. 4.We got a great seat out door with a lovely view. 5.Overall, its a decent place with a great view but dont expect to feast. reviews of LA MIMOSA: 1.Despite the excellent food, the view out of our window at our table was quite mediocre, and showed a poor part of the city. 2.Not much the owners can do about the view though, so I suppose I can't complain too much. 3.The only thing I can think to complain about, is over the beautiful white and blue walls, there is an old building next door that's not very nice to look at, and is juxtaposed in a negative way against this restaurant. [SEP] U: Can you help me find an expensive restaurant in the centre area? S: There are 33 possible places that fit your request. For example, there is an expensive African restaurant in the centre. Is this something you would be interested in? U: How about mediterranean food? S: Sure, either La Mimosa or Shiraz both serve excellent Mediterranean food. U: Is the view nice? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The view at Shiraz is much nicer than the view at La Mimosa. Shiraz' view overlooks the town, whereas the view from La Mimosa is just older buildings next door..

src_text: reviews of HOBSONS HOUSE: 1.I was on a business trip and needed a quiet place to stay and this place fit the bill! 2.I enjoyed the quietness of the room. 3.Nice and quiet, just the way I like it! 4.However, we found that the location was dead silent and we weren't disturbed even once on our trip. 5.It was nice not to be distracted with noise at the end of the day. reviews of FINCHES BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.There's no getting around the fact that the B&B is noisy, and when you have to share the kitchen with other guests, that's quite a disappointment. 2.The bed and breakfast was quiet, offered some good breakfast options, and best of all, they had really fast Wi-Fi which was crucially important for me to keep up with business requirements. 3.Yes, the room was big and the hotel was pretty quiet, but the bed was soooooooo uncomfortable to sleep in. 4.It was quite noisy with a lot of other rooms nearby. [SEP] U: Hello, I am looking for a guesthouse that has free parking, can you help me with that? S: Is there a specific area you are looking at and what price range would you like? U: I just need it to be in the west and it should include free wifi. S: I found two locations Finches Bed and Breakfast and Hobsons house, which one would you prefer? U: I would prefer the one that is in the quieter part of town. S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Okay, then you will really like staying at Hobson's house. It is much quieter. Would you like to make a reservation?

src_text: reviews of EFES RESTAURANT: 1.I also liked that there were tons of non alcoholic drink options since I don't drink alcohol. reviews of ANATOLIA: 1.They also had many non-alcoholic drink options which were good but a little overpriced. 2.However, the portion sizes were quite small, and we were disappointed in the very limited selection of non-alcoholic drink options for the kids in our group. [SEP] U: Please list all moderately priced restaurants in the centre of Cambridge. S: There are 21 restaurants to choose from. Would you like me to narrow this search down by choosing a type of food you would like to eat? U: I would really like some good Turkish food. S: There are two Turkish restaurants listed. Anatolia and Efes Restaurant. Would you like to make a reservation for either of these? U: Do both the restaurants serve non-alcoholic beverages? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Efes Restaurant does seem to have a good variety of non-alcoholic beverages. Views are mixed on the variety of non-alcoholic beverages at Anatolia.

src_text: reviews of ASHLEY HOTEL: 1.The room was large and had central heat and air, had two beds and a separate area with a couch and television. 2.The rooms are definitely overpriced and on the smaller side, but not too bad. 3.The room and bed were ample and comfortable. 4.The Ashley Hotel has big rooms, and really comfortable beds. S: Ashley hotel is located at 74 chesterton road	and lovell lodge is located at 365 milton road. U: I hate feeling cramped - are the rooms big enough? S: <extra_id_0>

src_text: reviews of THE CAMBRIDGE BELFRY: 1.This hotel offered the best place for our limited budget. 2.But the fee to use the spa was too high. 3.The only downside was the price of our stay, which was a bit more than normal. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Mixed reviews as far as a good value. A guest thought the spa was overpriced. Another said it was good when you are on limited budget.

src_text: reviews of EL SHADDAI: 1.I would expect to pay a lot more considering where the hotel is located. 2.The hotel is a great value for money. 3.Given the location of the hotel, the value of money was good, too. reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.But to be honest, the lack of concierge service and other small issues made this place feel quite overpriced for what I got. 2.First, I have to say that this placve was great value for the money! 3.However, the room was extremely cheap and offered acceptable value for the price. [SEP] U: I need a cheap place to stay in the centre S: Sure, we have two guesthouses that fit, the 4 star alexander bed and breakfast and the unrated el shaddai. Would you like to book a room at one? U: Which one offers more bang for your buck? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Both the Alexander Bed and Breakfast and El Shaddai are highly rated for being good value for the money.

src_text: reviews of MICHAELHOUSE CAFE: 1.I recently came back to visit the Michaelhouse Cafe with my family and loved the huge portion of food. 2.My only dislikes were the very small portion sizes of food, the expensive drinks, and the not so great tasting food. 3.While I loved the non-alcoholic drink choices on the menu, I thought the portion sizes of the foods were far too small. 4.I left full. 5.The food was better than we anticipate their portions were reasonable as well.. And my pricey drink was actually very good too. 6.For one, The portion size was large. [SEP] U: I want a place to eat that serves swiss food. The table will be reserved for 15 minutes. Reference number VRZWVKT7. Will there be anything else today? U: Does it serve good portion sizes? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Most of the guests that attended the Michaelhouse Cafe left satisfied and would return for the large portions offered.

src_text:
reviews of THE GARDENIA: 1.We did not like, however, the few drink options that were offered. 2.The beer were not that great though but there's lots to choose from. 3.The only downside was they didn't have many drinks in general other then some domestic beers and a few wine choices. 4.Only a few cocktails were on the menu. 5.They have lots of choices to choose when it comes to drinks and the drinks were very good, and cheap too. FAQs of THE GARDENIA: 1.The Gardenia serves alcohol. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a train from Ely to Cambridge. Do you have any? S: Yes, there are quite a few. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Some customers commented on the large variety of beer to choose from while others found it to be lacking. Would you like me to find another place with better ratings in that area?

src_text: reviews of WARKWORTH HOUSE: 1.The room and hotel had a fast wifi which was useful and not aggravatingly slow like we've all seen, the room was large and I liked that too. 2.When I needed to use the Internet, I found that the wireless Internet was extremely quick and more than enough for my business needs. 3.The Warkworth House has good Wi-Fi which I used a lot because I travelled alone. 4.My work called me up and needed me to go on a business trip, so I went here, and oh boy I must say they have really good breakfast options and the WiFi was super fast. FAQs of WARKWORTH HOUSE: 1.There is wifi at Warkworth House. 2.Warkworth House offers free WiFi. [SEP] U: I meed a moderately priced place to stay. S: I have found a list of hotels with a moderate price range, what area, type, star of the hotel would you like? U: I would like to stay in the east. It should have a 4 stars and I would also like free wifi please. S: There are 3 guesthouses that meet those requirements I recommend warkworth house. Would you like me to book it for you? U: Is the internet service reliable at Warkworth House so I can get some work done during my stay? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The internet there is apparently quite fast. I am not sure how reliable it is, but I couldn't find any negative reviews.

src_text: reviews of LOCH FYNE: 1.I was there with coworkers and we enjoyed the meal and the affordable drinks. 2.And the drinks are priced right to go along with your meal. 3.In addition to amazingly fresh seafood that's top quality all-around, their menu is genuinely affordable, especially their various specialty cocktails. 4.However, the service was quick and prompt and the drinks were very affordable. FAQs of LOCH FYNE: 1.Loch Fyne serves alcohol. [SEP] U: I am looking for a train leaving from broxbourne and going to cambridge. S: Sure, when will you be traveling? U: It will be on Saturday. S: Do you have a particular time you would like to leave? U: We would need the train to leave after 12:00. S: There is a train that leaves at 12:32. U: That will be fine I need the train ID and price please. S: Sure the train ID is TR7768 and the cost of the journey is 14.32 pounds. U: I also need a place to dine in the centre that serves seafood. S: The Loch Fyne is the only available restaurant in the centre that fits your criteria but it is an expensive place to dine, will that be alright? U: Does the Loch Fyne have reasonably priced drinks? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The reviewers unanimously found the drinks to be affordable at Loch Fyne. Should I book a table for you?

src_text: reviews of THE CAMBRIDGE BELFRY: 1.The rooms are nice and big, and there is somewhere to get your laundry cleaned. src_text: reviews of UNIVERSITY ARMS HOTEL: 1.The negatives is that the bathroom wasn't that clean when we first arrived and that the beds could've been more comfortable. 2.The place had everything we needed, a large big room that never felt cramp, a nice clean bathroom, and a very kid-friendly atmosphere. 3.When we went to use the facilities at this hotel, we both noticed how the bathrooms had been cleaned and they were pristine in quality. reviews of GONVILLE HOTEL: 1.They have room service which was nice, and the bathroom was super clean. 2.Having a very clean bathroom upon arrival made it more comfortable right away. U: Do these hotels have clean bathrooms? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Gonville Hotel cleaning staff makes sure that every guest has a clean bathroom. The University Arms Hotel cleaning staff have had challenges providing clean bathrooms to their guests pleasing.

src_text: reviews of THE CAMBRIDGE BELFRY: 1.This hotel offered the best place for our limited budget. 2.But the fee to use the spa was too high. 3.The only downside was the price of our stay, which was a bit more than normal. src_text:
reviews of UGLY DUCKLING: 1.I'm still thinking about the food a few days later. 2.The portion sizes were tremendous and the food was clearly of great quality. 3.I could tell the ingredients were of high quality. 4.We really enjoyed everything we tried. 5.Not only that but it was delicious. 6.I tried their dumplings and I couldn't be happier. 7.It is a nice place for Chinese and the food is good. 8.My wife and I loved our dumplings and scrambled eggs with tomatoes; we thought that both dishes tasted really authentic and were nicely prepared, but the portion sizes were just so small!
