src_text: reviews of AVALON: 1.I got everything from pancakes to sushi. 2.In the morning, I did not need to go anywhere else for breakfast because of the wide variety of delicious foods available. 3.The breakfast was good too. 4.I mean the food was delicious and they had everything you can ask for. 5.I was very happy with the good breakfast options provided. 6.I had scrambled eggs and they had great toppings like cheese. src_text: reviews of HOBSONS HOUSE: 1.I also saw some hairs in the bathroom, which was evidently not well cleaned. 2.Upon using the bathroom facilities, we all saw that they were pristine and it looks like they had been recently cleaned. 3.The view from the room was also amazing, and the cleanliness of the bathroom was top notch. src_text: reviews of MEGHNA: 1.I will probably come back again for a cheap lunch if the weather is nice and I want to enjoy a decent lunch on the outdoor patio. 2.It was also an excellent place for outdoor seating. 3.They had a great patio section that they seated me in which was great because the weather was beautiful that day. src_text: reviews of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.We stayed at the Acorn guest house and I loved the view. 2.Outside of the balcony of my room, I found that the exquisite view was unlike anything I've ever seen before. 3.The wi-fi was super fast though and the room provided a great view. 4.I also enjoyed the great view as that helped me take a moment to enjoy some peace and quiet. 5.We didn't care so much if it had other things, but a great view and good location, were not things we were going to give a little on. src_text: reviews of ASK RESTAURANT: 1.If you visit Ask Restaurant, don't plan to "Ask" your server for anything special like a drink refill or extra cutlery, because they won't go out of their way to be friendly or helpful when attending to your table. 2.Honestly, I would recommend getting take out from Ask Restaurant, that way you get all the benefits of a delicious meal without the subpar service. 3.We all liked the service and portions given to us. 4.The service was great and so were the drinks. 5.The prices were a little higher than I would like for the portion sizes, and I feel like the server got too much into schmoozing with the people a few tables over to give us the attention we needed, so that could be worked on. 6.I was seen right away. 7.Some things I enjoyed was the spectacular service. 8.But if you can get past the mediocre service, this place offers some really high quality dishes with a beautiful atmosphere featuring upscale decor. src_text:
reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.The location was extremely silent and I found that I was not disturbed during my time on this trip. 2.Our room was a bit noisy as we could hear the televisions nearby. 3.Also, due to the popularity of this place, it is quite noisy. 4.We didn't like how much traffic there was by the bed and breakfast. 5.We would consider staying there again on a less busy weekend in hopes that the traffic noise wouldn't be so bad. 6.The walls were also very thin and you could hear the people staying in the room next to you. 7.The B&B is pretty quiet and well appointed, and the staff goes out of their way to be friendly. 8.It was very noisy while we were trying to sleep. src_text: reviews of LEVERTON HOUSE: 1.That being said, the room was huge and more than enough room for all of us. 2.I really enjoyed the size of the room. 3.Not at the Leverton House, though! 4.But while the size of the room was quite good, it was definitely not freshly cleaned when we checked in, and because there was no concierge service, we couldn't find a more suitable hotel to book an alternate stay at. reviews of ALLENBELL: 1.During my recent stay at ALLENBELL with your family, I was impressed by the big room with a clean bathroom. reviews of AUTUMN HOUSE: 1.The room is big and I had a great view of the sunset. 2.The room is big and nice and quiet. [SEP] U: I am looking for a cheap room, free parking. S: Alexander bed and breakfast is a cheap guesthouse in the centre of town. U: I am looking for a hotel in the east. S: I have 3 guesthouse in he east all with 4 stars, the allenbell, auumn house or leverton house. Would you like me to book one for you today? U: Do either of them mention anything about having large rooms? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Allenbell and Autumn house have nice compliments on room size. The Leverton has some complaints about other things. Would you like to know more about any of them?

src_text: reviews of A AND B GUEST HOUSE: 1.There is a great view especially at sunset. 2.Looking out of the window was nice, as the view was unique. 3.Made it very easy to settle in and relax after a long trip, and even more relaxing with the excellent view out of my window! [SEP] U: I'm looking for a place to stay, can you help me out? S: There are a total of 33 guesthouses and hotels in Cambridge. What is your price range? U: Price doesn't matter to me, but I'm looking for something in the east part of town. S: There are seven hotels that are in the east part of town.  Do you need parking? U: I don't need parking. S: I would recommend the A and B Guest House. U: Can you confirm whether the A and B Guest House offers good views of the surrounding areas? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Previous guests have called the view excellent, unique, and great especially at sunset. Would you like help booking it?

src_text: reviews of THE LENSFIELD HOTEL: 1.The spa was not worth the price though, and the room could have been a lot bigger. 2.The big negative was how small the room was. 3.We were pretty cramped during our stay. 4.It did not seem so tiny online. 5.The room was a little small for my tastes, and I did feel a little cramped even though I was by myself. [SEP] U: Hello.  I need to catch a train leaving on Monday.  Can you help me find something? S: Yeah sure but you need a departure/arrival city and time. U: i am going to london liverpool street from cambridge and should arrive there by 12:45 S: TR5431 fits your criteria and will arrive at 01:27. Would you like me to book that for you? U: Yes, could you book 3 tickets and provide the reference number please. S: Reference number is : 4HWC0OMV. Do you need anything else? U: I also need to find out some information about the lensfield hotel S: Ah, yes, the Lensfield is a very nice hotel. It's on the south end of the city and is quite expensive, but they have free wifi. Would you like a room? U: No, but can you provide their address. Oh, and do they have free parking? S: Their address is 53-57 Lensfield Road and they do offer free parking U: Excellent. That's all I need. S: Is there anything else I can help you with? U: Yes, do you happen to know if they have rooms that are quite more spacious than the others? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: If you're in search of a large, spacious room, one will be disappointed by the tiny, cramped accommodations at the Lensfield Hotel.

src_text: reviews of GONVILLE HOTEL: 1.Room service was available, and the food was very unique and delicious, and the staff that brought it to us were always super friendly and professional. 2.Also the staffs were well trained, they helped me with the things that I needed and were polite at all times asking me what they could do more for me. reviews of UNIVERSITY ARMS HOTEL: 1.I did not find the staff very responsive or helpful. 2.When attempting to troubleshoot my issue with staff, they were disrespectful and rude. 3.Another added merit was that the hotel staff was very friendly and polite. [SEP] U: i want a place i can watch multiple sports in the centre. S: I did not find any places in the Centre of town. Would you like to try another area? U: Are there any nightclubs that I could visit, instead? S: Sure! I recommend The Fez Club. Their address is 8 market passage U: I need to have the phone number, entrance fee, and postcode please. S: Those would be 01223519224, 5 pounds, and cb23hx in that order. Anything else I can do for you? U: Yes please, I would love if you could help me find an expensive hotel located in the centre S: There are two hotels in the centre. Gonville hotel has 3 stars. University arms hotel has 4 stars. Both have wifi and parking. U: Are they both expensive? S: Both are expensive. U: Does either the Gonville Hotel or University Arms Hotel have friendly staff? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: They both have super friendly staff who are well organized and are ready to assist their guests in any way required.

src_text: reviews of UNIVERSITY ARMS HOTEL: 1.I stayed at the University Arms alone and I liked the location because it was easy to find nearby eateries. 2.When we arrived, we both noticed how the location of this hotel was very accommodating to our hectic schedule. 3.The only two good points during my stay were the good location, which was near the home of a friend whom I was in town to visit, and the onsite restaurant. 4.The positives are that the location was great and so was the view. reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.It's in a good location which is something I much appreciate. 2.You couldn't really walk from there to any places of interest. 3.For what it is, it's got a great little view, and the location is very accessible to many other things. 4.That being said, the location was mediocre at best. 5.The location is not very close to shopping. [SEP] U: I am looking for a 4 star hotel in Cambridge with free wifi. S: I have several options for four star hotels with free wifi. What area would you like to stay in? U: I would like to stay in the centre please. S: I have two hotels that meet your requirements. the Alexander Bed and Breakfast, and the University Arms Hotel. Would you like me to book a reservation for either one? U: Which has the better location for site seeing? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Alexander Bed and Breakfast isn't near many sights and would be considered mediocre for sight seeing whereas the University Arms Hotel is well regarded to be in a fantastic location with great views.

src_text: reviews of BRIDGE GUEST HOUSE: 1.Furthermore, I found that the provided Internet was extremely swift and more than enough for my needs. FAQs of BRIDGE GUEST HOUSE: 1.Wifi is free at Bridge Guest House. 2.Free WiFi is available at the Bridge Guest House. [SEP] U: i am looking for a place to stay. The hotel should be in the moderate price range and should include free wifi. S: I've found three to choose from.  What area would you like?  I have 2 in the north and 1 in the centre.  Do you know? U: I would like a 3-star place, please. S: Sorry, None of these places are 3 stars. Would you like to try something different? U: What types of hotels are available in Cambridge that have a 3 star rating and are moderately priced? S: Unfortunately, there are no hotels that fit that criteria, but there are 3 guesthouses with all the other specifications. Are you interested in those? U: yes lets book one of those for 6 people and 4 nights starting from sunday S: Okay. We have you booked at the Bridge Guest House. Your reference number is 2V8LWI7J. Can I help with anything else? U: Does the internet go down here? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: No according to the reviews left by the previous guests the internet is reliable and even referred to as swift.  Guests also stated it was better then what they really needed it for.

src_text: reviews of LOVELL LODGE: 1.The view was amazing and I found myself feeling peaceful and relaxed despite being there on business. [SEP] U: Hello! Can you please give me information about Dojo Noodle Bar? S: Dojo noodle bar is a asian oriental restaurant located in the centre of town at 40210 Millers Yard City Centre.  The phone number is 01223363471. Anything else? U: Can you tell me what the price range is for this restaurant? I will also need a table for 2 at 15:15 on Saturday. S: Yes sure it is in the cheap price range and the booking number is 9GGR7AJ5. U: thank you for assisting. S: You're welcome! Can I help you with anything else? U: Yes, I'm also looking for a recommendation on hotels in the north that have free parking. S: There are two hotels in the north that meet your needs, both in the moderate price range. Lovell Lodge has gorgeous grounds this time of year. Would you like a reservation? U: Which one has the best views? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Lovell Lodge has rooms with really nice views. Can I answer any other questions before booking that for you?

src_text: reviews of ALLENBELL: 1.The free Internet provided at this location was extremely fast and the connection quality was superb. 2.I also really appreciated the free parking and fast, reliable, free Wi-Fi. FAQs of ALLENBELL: 1.Free WiFi is available at Allenbell. 2.There is free Wifi at Allenbell. [SEP] U: I'd like to find some information about the Allenbell hotel. S: Absolutely! The Allenbell is a guesthouse in the east. It has 4 stars and is relatively cheap. They offer their guests free wifi and parking. Would you like any other info? U: Does their internet stay stable all day? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, when selecting to stay at the Allenbell location, it can expected that the internet remains fast and reliable all day.

src_text: reviews of CITYROOMZ: 1.When we first entered the room we were blown away by the views that can be seen, and the bathroom was especially clean. 2.I am actually really missing that view right about now. 3.We actually heard that the views were good, and we weren't disappointed. 4.It really does have a great view, and the staff made us feel very welcome. [SEP] U: I am looking for a place to stay. The hotel should have a star of 0 and should be in the type of hotel S: I found the cityroomz hotel in the centre part of town.  Would you like to book a room? U: Do they have nice sights near by? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Some people that reviewed the Cityroomz hotel said that the views from their rooms were great. Would you like to book a room?

src_text: reviews of COTTO: 1.The foods also tasted great and didn't break the bank. 2.It's top shelf without the 5 star price tag. 3.First off, the service was great and the food was up to expectation but it was way too expensive to eat. 4.Luckily it was cheap enough so I didn't lose out too much. [SEP] U: Are there any moderately priced places to eat with British styled food? S: Yes, I have 5 places. What about cotto? U: I would like the place to be known for the food being a good value for the money. How does Cotto rate? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: A reviewer gave it a five start rating. Most liked the food a lot and many thought it was fairly priced other then one.

src_text: reviews of ASHLEY HOTEL: 1.The room was large and had central heat and air, had two beds and a separate area with a couch and television. 2.The rooms are definitely overpriced and on the smaller side, but not too bad. 3.The room and bed were ample and comfortable. 4.The Ashley Hotel has big rooms, and really comfortable beds. [SEP] U: What is the address to the Ashley hotel? S: The Ashley Hotel is at 74 Chesterton Road, and their postcode is cb41er. Would you like to book a room or are you just looking for information right now? U: i need a big room S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Aside for a few select customers who felt the rooms were on the smaller side, the majority of guests at the Ashley Hotel were satisfied with the room size.

src_text: reviews of ALLENBELL: 1.The free Internet provided at this location was extremely fast and the connection quality was superb. 2.I also really appreciated the free parking and fast, reliable, free Wi-Fi. FAQs of ALLENBELL: 1.Free WiFi is available at Allenbell. 2.There is free Wifi at Allenbell. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a place to stay on the east side of town. I will need free wifi. S: I have many,what price rage would you like? U: I'm open to the price, but I do need the place o have a 4 star rating. S: Alright, how about the Allenbell? It also offers free parking! U: Does this place have a stable internet connection? S: <extra_id_0>

src_text: reviews of THE LENSFIELD HOTEL: 1.I was on business in the area, and it was great to have a nice place to sleep quietly at night. 2.My room was very quiet and I think the price was right. 3.The location and guests were just so noisy that it really ruined our stay. 4.It made sleeping very easy! 5.Also, it was very quiet and peaceful. 6.The place is very quiet which was good for me and my family, we dont like a lot of noise. 7.However, it was pretty hard to appreciate the great view with the constant noise. 8.Our stay was very quiet. [SEP] U: Hello, I'm looking for a place to stay that offers free parking. S: What area would you like the hotel in? U: I would like it to be in South please. S: Is there a price you are looking for? U: I am looking for an expensive place to stay. S: Would you like a hotel or guesthouse? U: I would like a hotel please. S: I have one hotel that would suit your needs. It's called the Lensfield Hotel. They offer free parking and free wifi. Can I book you a room? U: One more thing. Are the rooms quiet, and is the environment calm and relaxing? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The majority of reviewers thought the rooms were very quiet. However two reviewers said that they had a problem with noise.

src_text: reviews of AYLESBRAY LODGE GUEST HOUSE: 1.The room was nice and big and I was able to do my laundry at there facility but the room was a bit dirty. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a hotel in the south part of town. S: I can help you with that. Do you have a price range? U: I don't have a preference. I'm just looking for a 4 star hotel that has free wifi. S: i have 2 locations that match your requirements, one is cheap, one is moderate. which would you prefer? U: I guess we can go with the moderately priced one. S: Aylesbray Lodge guest house is moderately priced and has free wifi. Would you like me to make a reservation for you? U: Is Aylesbray Lodge a guesthouse? If not, is there a guesthouse that fits? S: Yes, it is a guesthouse. When would the stay begin and for how long? U: I need rooms for 8 peoples staying for two nights starting Wednesday. S: Booking was successful.Your Reference number is : 76HG81V6. Anything else I can do for you? U: Is the room too cramped? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The rooms are large according to one reviewer so it should not be too cramped.  Is there anything else I can help you with?

src_text: reviews of THE CAMBRIDGE BELFRY: 1.One of the best things about the hotel is the view of the mountains from the balcony. 2.The staff was polite they took out luggage to our room, and our room had a spectacular view of the forest and nature. [SEP] U: Hello.  I am looking for a hotel, it should be in the cheap price range. S: I have 9 guesthouses and 1 hotel. Do you have an area in mind? U: I want a hotel and not a guesthouse. It should also be on the west side of town with a 4 star rating. Can you help? S: I have exactly one choice matching your criteria. Would you like me to make a booking for you for the Cambridge Belfry? U: Are there any pleasant sights from the accommodations? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, the rooms at Cambridge Belgry look out on beautiful scenery. Can I answer anything else, or shall I book you a room?

src_text: reviews of BRIDGE GUEST HOUSE: 1.The good news is, though, that they have free Wi-Fi and my kids were happy. 2.Still though, the staff was pretty darn friendly and I liked that it had free Wi-Fi so it wasn't too bad. 3.Furthermore, I found that the provided Internet was extremely swift and more than enough for my needs. 4.It was great experience for me was the Lot's of amenities where provided and free WIFI and well decorated balcony. FAQs of BRIDGE GUEST HOUSE: 1.Wifi is free at Bridge Guest House. [SEP] U: What is the address to the hospital in North? S: I'm sorry there seems to be an error in our system.  Please send your request again. U: What is the address to the hospital there was no error you just didn't want to look it up. S: Hmmmm, our system does seem to be having an error right now.  Perhaps we could find some other information for you and then come back to the hospital. U: I am looking for bridge guest house, information on their phone number as well as if they have free parking. I am also looking for places to go. S: The Bridge Guest House has free parking. The number is 01223247942. May I try looking up the hospital again for you? U: Is there an additional fee for wifi at the Bridge Guest House? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: No, the Wi-Fi at the Bridge Guest House comes with the room and there is no additional fee to access it.

src_text: reviews of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.We stayed at the Acorn guest house and I loved the view. 2.Outside of the balcony of my room, I found that the exquisite view was unlike anything I've ever seen before. 3.The wi-fi was super fast though and the room provided a great view. 4.I also enjoyed the great view as that helped me take a moment to enjoy some peace and quiet. 5.We didn't care so much if it had other things, but a great view and good location, were not things we were going to give a little on. [SEP] U: I am trying to find the Acorn Guest House. S: The Acorn Guesthouse is a 4 star hotel located in the north side of town. It includes free internet and parking. Would you like me to book it for you? U: First, what kind of view does it have? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Acorn gets great comments on their views with guests saying it was great even exquisite. Would you like to know more about them?

src_text: reviews of THE CAMBRIDGE CHOP HOUSE: 1.At least the view was nice and we could enjoy it from the outdoor dining area. 2.I would recommend going to the restaurant again and sitting outside because there is a nice view. 3.They had us seated outside since their outside dining area was very nice. 4.I requested outdoor seating, it was pleasant for dining but did not have a great view. reviews of FITZBILLIES RESTAURANT: 1.It was a beautiful spot to be eating outdoors. 2.We were out on the patio but being as the building is downtown, the view just isn't very good. [SEP] U: Can you help me find a place to eat located in the centre that serves british food? S: There are 7 places in the centre area that serve British cuisine, do you have a preference on price range? U: Yes, actually. Is there one that is expensive? S: Yes, I've found three all in the city centre. Is there one of these that you would prefer? U: What are their names? I need to choose one I can book a table at. S: they are fitbillies restaurant, the cambridge chop house and the midsummer house restaurant U: Do they have a pleasant, outdoor dining section? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Midsummer does not have outdoor seating. The Cambridge Chop House gets some very nice reviews on their outdoor dining area with great views. Fitzbillies gets mixed reviews because the view isn't the best. Would you like to know more about any of them?

src_text: reviews of EXPRESS BY HOLIDAY INN CAMBRIDGE: 1.We were all thrilled with the great view from the hotel. 2.It was very beautiful. 3.While the noise issue was frustrating, I did like the great view from my hotel room, and I took advantage of the really wonderful spa facility that was available. 4.The only two good points were the great view and that the hotel was generally pretty quiet. [SEP] U: Can you help me find an expensive Chinese food restaurant? S: What area would you like? There are nine results. U: I'm interested in restaurants located in the East. S: Okay, Yu Garden matches your specifications. Would you like me to book a reservation? U: Yeah, could you book it for 8 people on Monday? I think 16:15 is when we want to be seated. S: The booking went through, your table is reserved for 15 minutes starting at 16:15. Reference number is BT75STQI. U: Thanks! I'm also looking for a hotel near that restaurant. S: I would recommend the Express by Holiday Inn Cambridge, should I book it for you? U: does it have a good view? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: All guests commented how great the view is. A beautiful way to take in sights and sounds and very quiet.

src_text: reviews of UNIVERSITY ARMS HOTEL: 1.Compared with the price paid, it was a great value for money. 2.I still think the value could be better, if the rooms were not so overpriced. 3.Overall, I'd say it was worth the money. 4.University Arms Hotel has a lot of great points, but do find that it was a bit overpriced. 5.Please be aware that University Arms Hotel is a really overpriced option, and there are much more affordable places to stay in this area. [SEP] U: i will be in Cambridge and need a 4 star hotel with wifi S: sure I can assist you with that. When is your stay? U: I want to arrive on Monday and Leave Sunday. S: I have 2 in the west area and 1 available in the centre of town. Does area or price matter to you? U: I would also like free parking. Price doesn't matter. S: I recommend the university arms hotel. It is expensive, but a good place on regent street. U: Does it have good value for what I'm paying? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The majority of guests that stayed at the University Arms Hotel regarded the price to be too high for the value provided.

src_text: reviews of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.I also enjoyed the great view as that helped me take a moment to enjoy some peace and quiet. 2.The place was quiet so we could hear ourselves talk and just relax because we were there to get away from our hectic schedules. 3.I noticed that throughout my stay I was not disturbed by any loud or disruptive patrons. [SEP] U: I'd like to stay in a guesthouse that offers free wifi. S: What is your price range? U: My price range is moderate. S: Fourteen good choices for you, what part of town would you prefer? U: North area please. S: that narrows it down to 8 options. any other preferences? U: No, but there will be 6 people in my party and we'd like to stay for 4 nights starting on Tuesday, if possible. S: The Acorn guesthouse come highly recommended, shall I book a room for you there? U: Is the Acorn guesthouse a quiet place? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Acorn Guest House is located in a very quiet area. Patrons of the guest house say that they really enjoyed the peace and quiet.

src_text: reviews of ROSA'S BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.I found that the room had been cleaned by housekeeping to an exceptional degree. [SEP] U: Hello, I am looking for a train that leaves on Friday after 10:00. S: Ok, and where will you be leaving from and heading to? U: I want to leave from Bishops Stortford and go to Cambridge. S: TR6834 departs Bishops Stortford at 11:29 arriving by 12:07 in Cambridge. Does this work for you? U: That will work great.  Could you please make a booking for seven people? S: The booking was successful and your reference number is 5636CNX2. Please pay 70.7GBP at the station. Is there anything else? U: Yes, I need some information on rosa's bed and breakfast. S: That's a lovely 4 star guesthouse in the south part of town.  What would you like to know? U: Tell me if the rooms are dirty there? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The rooms at Rosa's bed and breakfast are said to be very clean by people who have stayed there in the past.

src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.For what it is, it's got a great little view, and the location is very accessible to many other things. 2.The visuals of the location were stunning and I found that the places outside of the location had much to offer as well. 3.Especially with the wonderful view of the ocean. 4.I was looking for a room with a great view and that's the primary reason why I booked my stay at the Alexander Bed and Breakfast. [SEP] U: Are there any 1-star hotels with free parking? S: I'm sorry, I can't find any hotels that meet your criteria. Would you like to search again? U: I am looking for a guesthouse with free parking, preferably one star. S: Sorry, I'm not finding anything. Want to change to a hotel? U: What about guesthouses? S: No, I'm sorry but as I said, there are no guesthouse listings. What else may I look for for you? U: how about a hotel with 4 stars? S: it is available. can i book one for you? U: Yes, I will be traveling alone on Sunday and staying for 2 nights. S: Thank you for your patience. I am checking many hotels as so far I have been unsuccessful booking a room for you. U: Let's back up a bit. Are there any 4-star guesthouses? S: Yes, there are 16 4 star guest houses that have free parking. Do you have an area you are looking at? U: No, no place in particular. Whatever you think is good. S: The alexander bed and breakfast is a guesthouse in the centre in the cheap price range with parking. When are you arriving? How many people? U: Could you tell me if this room is one with a great view? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: According to the reviews I have on hand for that location, the views there have been described as great, wonderful, and stunning!  Sounds enticing, right?

src_text: reviews of MIDSUMMER HOUSE RESTAURANT: 1.The waiters took too long to serve us. 2.The staff was courteous and attentive and otherwise we thoroughly enjoyed ourselves. 3.Inside, you would think you've been transported to an old English pub, complete with wood paneling, beautiful tables and friendly waitstaff. 4.But the service did not impress me. reviews of FITZBILLIES RESTAURANT: 1.We seated ourselves in the busy dining room, as there was no host. 2.The service was mindblowingly good with a supreme example of some of the best high quality food. 3.Despite the great spot, the service was very slow and the drinks were average at best. 4.But when our food came to the table - which was delivered by a server who seemed like she'd rather be anywhere else than the restaurant - we all found it to be bland and uninspiring in quality. 5.It was a really pleasant place for a date since the service was great. 6.You'll always be greeted by a friendly staff and a wide variety of drink options as well as the best British cuisine on offer. 7.I don't know if I'd come here again because of the lousy service. 8.The only problem was how small the portions were and I had to ask for my server several times before she would come bring me condiments. reviews of THE CAMBRIDGE CHOP HOUSE: 1.Once we arrived we were pleasantly surprised by the quality of the service we got from the employees. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a restaurant to dine at that serves British food and is located in the centre. Do you have any suggestions? S: There are seven places that serve British food. What price range are you wanting? U: I would like something more pricey. Expensive would be good. S: There are three, Fitzbillies, The Cambridge CHop House and Midsummer House Restaurant. All in Centre. U: Is the staff nice? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The staff at the Fitzbillies Restaurant, the Cambridge Chop House and the Midsummer House Restaurant all have courteous and friendly staff to serve you.

src_text: reviews of CITYROOMZ: 1.When we first entered the room we were blown away by the views that can be seen, and the bathroom was especially clean. 2.I am actually really missing that view right about now. 3.We actually heard that the views were good, and we weren't disappointed. 4.It really does have a great view, and the staff made us feel very welcome. U: Any restaurant then I guess will have to do located in the centre that is moderately priced. Are you SURE their aren't' any Irish restaurants? S: There a no Irish places in the centre, in that price range, nor any in town. Shall I try some British food? U: Yes please try British. S: I'm sorry.  I'm not showing any British restaurants in the centre of town, either?  Would you like to try another part of town or a different type of food? U: Ok, anything british will do. I need to book a table for 8 people on Monday at 15:30. S: restaurant one seven is in the centre and its serves british food and it's in the moderate price range. Would you like me to book a table for you? U: Please. And can I have the confirmation number as well? Can you tell me if that is 3 stars? S: No, these restaurants aren't graded with stars.  But I do have a reservation for you. The reference number is U3AG4VDD. Can I be of further help to you today? U: Yes. I would like a hotel in the same area as the restaurant. I'm not driing so I don't need free parking. S: cityroomz hotel in the center is moderately priced.  It's located at sleeperz hotel, station road.  phone number is 01223304050.  shall I book it for you? U: Does it have a good view from their rooms? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Previous guests agree that the views were breathtaking and memorable, and that they were not disappointed.

src_text: reviews of COCUM: 1.To go with dinner I had a beer and they had a choice of 12 beers and the prices were cheaper than other restaurants. 2.I liked that I had a lot of drinks to choose from, but I was really feeling a beer the night I went. Would you prefer a certain part of town, or a particular type of lodging such as a guest house or hotel? U: Just a 4 star guesthouse that has free parking please. src_text: reviews of CITYROOMZ: 1.When we first entered the room we were blown away by the views that can be seen, and the bathroom was especially clean. 2.I am actually really missing that view right about now. 3.We actually heard that the views were good, and we weren't disappointed. 4.It really does have a great view, and the staff made us feel very welcome. S: <extra_id_0>

src_text: reviews of WARKWORTH HOUSE: 1.But still, I appreciated the great view from my window, overlooking the nearby lake, and the room itself was very clean with a seriously comfortable bed. U: I'll take your word for it, thanks.  What is the entrance fee for Ballare? S: The fee is 5 pounds. U: Can I also have the postcode and phone number? trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, when choosing to stay at the Warkworth House, one should expect to experience clean and spotless rooms.

src_text: reviews of BACKSTREET BISTRO: 1.It's a nice location and they a terrific variety of drink options. 2.The restaurant has a nice location and it is close to the main streets. 3.The restaurant is in a good location so they just have to improve their food quality. 4.Lots of drinks to choose from, but it's out of the way from most places so you kind of just...have to drive there, if that makes sense. reviews of THE SLUG AND LETTUCE: 1.It was in a great location and right away we were greeted by a friendly host, who welcomed us to our seat. 2.I'd probably come back again to try their drinks, because their drink menu seemed to be pretty extensive, and I like how convenient the location is to my home. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a train that goes to Cambridge and arriving by 17:30. S: I can assist you with that. Can you tell me where you would be departing from? U: I'd like to depart from Stansted Airport on Saturday. S: Sure, their is a train that leaves at 9:24 am. Does that work? U: That is a little early. Is there one that arrives closer to 17:30. S: Your booking was successful and the reference number is 28UYG6JR. Is there anything else I can help you with? U: Yes I am also looking for a restaurant in the centre and serves gastropub food. In the expensive price range please. S: There are two restaurants that fit your criteria:  Backstreet Bistro and The Slug and Lettuce. Does either of those appeal to you? U: Are they in nice locations? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Backstreet Bistro is out of the way but has a good location according to a majority of reviewers. The Slug and Lettuce is also in a great location.

src_text: reviews of WARKWORTH HOUSE: 1.The room and hotel had a fast wifi which was useful and not aggravatingly slow like we've all seen, the room was large and I liked that too. 2.When I needed to use the Internet, I found that the wireless Internet was extremely quick and more than enough for my business needs. 3.The Warkworth House has good Wi-Fi which I used a lot because I travelled alone. 4.My work called me up and needed me to go on a business trip, so I went here, and oh boy I must say they have really good breakfast options and the WiFi was super fast. FAQs of WARKWORTH HOUSE: 1.There is wifi at Warkworth House. 2.Warkworth House offers free WiFi. [SEP] U: Hello, I am going to be visiting Cambridge and am looking for a particular hotel called the Warkworth House. S: The Warkworth house is a guesthouse on the east side located at warkworth terrace. Their phone number is 01223363682. Would you like help with anything else? U: Do they mention a stable internet connection? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The internet connection at Warkworth House is accessed via Wi-Fi, which is free. Guests found the connection to be stable and fast.

[SEP] U: Yes, I'm only looking for information right now.  Can you help me with a train? S: Of course. Where are you traveling from and what is your destination? src_text: reviews of INDIA HOUSE: 1.But that's fine because the service we got while dining here was impeccable. 2.The service could be better though. 3.I am not too familiar with Indian food so I asked the waiter for some suggestions, and I settled on the butter chicken and dosa. 4.The food just like the service was impeccable. Can  I help with anything else? U: I need information on India House, a restaurant.  I need to book for 5 people at 16:45 for Wednesday, please. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The service at the India House restaurant is generally thought by customers to be impeccable, although improvements are still possible.

src_text: reviews of ALLENBELL: 1.The facilities, especially the bathroom were super-clean and sanitary. 2.During my recent stay at ALLENBELL with your family, I was impressed by the big room with a clean bathroom. S: I'm sorry. The earliest train departs at 11:36 and arrives at 12:55. Would you like to book that train ? U: Yes for one person please. i will need the reference number. src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.The location was extremely silent and I found that I was not disturbed during my time on this trip. 2.Our room was a bit noisy as we could hear the televisions nearby. 3.Also, due to the popularity of this place, it is quite noisy. 4.We didn't like how much traffic there was by the bed and breakfast. 5.We would consider staying there again on a less busy weekend in hopes that the traffic noise wouldn't be so bad. 6.The walls were also very thin and you could hear the people staying in the room next to you. 7.The B&B is pretty quiet and well appointed, and the staff goes out of their way to be friendly. 8.It was very noisy while we were trying to sleep. [SEP] U: Can you help me find a guesthouse with free parking? S: Definitely! Do you have a price range and/or area in mind? U: I would like the guesthouse to be in the cheap range. S: We have a couple of choices for 4 star ones in the center and the east.  Shall i just pick one for you? U: Yes, I need to book it for 5 people. S: The alexander bed and breakfast is a 4 star facility with internet and free parking. Their number is 01223525725. What day would you like to arrive? U: Is the Alexander Bed and Breakfast a quiet place? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Guests who stayed at the hotel remarked that the walls are thin and the rooms can get noisy. Other guests thought the hotel was adequately quiet and had no complaints about noise.

src_text: reviews of FINCHES BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.There's no getting around the fact that the B&B is noisy, and when you have to share the kitchen with other guests, that's quite a disappointment. 2.The bed and breakfast was quiet, offered some good breakfast options, and best of all, they had really fast Wi-Fi which was crucially important for me to keep up with business requirements. 3.Yes, the room was big and the hotel was pretty quiet, but the bed was soooooooo uncomfortable to sleep in. 4.It was quite noisy with a lot of other rooms nearby. reviews of HUNTINGDON MARRIOTT HOTEL: 1.We were very happy that they had a pool that we could swim in, and it wasn't noisy or loud, so we could chill back and relax. reviews of THE CAMBRIDGE BELFRY: 1.Also, the location itself was extremely loud and made our experience difficult to enjoy. [SEP] U: I need a four star room, free parking too. S: Are you looking for a hotel? There are 19 4 star hotels that offer free parking. Do you have a price range or area of town you want to stay? U: The hotel should be in the West side of town. S: There are 3 four star locations to choose from: Finches Bed and Breakfast, the Huntingdon Marriot, and the Cambridge Belfry. src_text: reviews of JINLING NOODLE BAR: 1.The only issue was that each mixed drink was $15 which I found to be very expensive. 2.I wouldn't recommend ordering from the alcoholic drink menu at Jinling, because their specialty drinks are way overpriced for what you get. 3.You could tell they have a good bartender as the drinks weren't too powerful but they had the right amount of alcohol taste. 4.Their drinks were really good, though expensive, and lacking in non-alcoholic options. 5.The food just tastes bland and inauthentic, and if you try to jazz it up with a stiff drink, you find out that their drink menu is super limited as well. 6.Not only that but the food as well as the drinks was priced well within our budget. 7.Some of us also ordered drinks, and while they were really enjoyable and high in quality, we thought they were pretty overpriced for what we got. FAQs of JINLING NOODLE BAR: 1.There is alcohol served at Jinling Noodle Bar. [SEP] U: I am looking for a moderate priced restaurant while I am visiting. S: Is location a concern? src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.The location was extremely silent and I found that I was not disturbed during my time on this trip. 2.Our room was a bit noisy as we could hear the televisions nearby. 3.Also, due to the popularity of this place, it is quite noisy. 4.We didn't like how much traffic there was by the bed and breakfast. 5.We would consider staying there again on a less busy weekend in hopes that the traffic noise wouldn't be so bad. 6.The walls were also very thin and you could hear the people staying in the room next to you. 7.The B&B is pretty quiet and well appointed, and the staff goes out of their way to be friendly. 8.It was very noisy while we were trying to sleep. src_text: reviews of RESTAURANT ALIMENTUM: 1.The food did come in big portions so I was able to eat leftovers for days. 2.I had it with some naan and rice, and there was plenty of food even for two. 3.I only wish each portion had been bigger! 4.It was the size of a large plate and came with fresh fruit and other toppings so I could choose what I wanted on it. 5.You get a large portion and the food is good. 6.I paired the quiche with their waffle was gigantic. 7.We also liked the complimentary salads, which turned out to be necessary because the portion sizes are a little small. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: For the most part, those who have eaten at the Restaurant Alimentum regarded the portion sizes as large and plentiful, sometimes enough for two diners.

src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.The location was extremely silent and I found that I was not disturbed during my time on this trip. 2.Our room was a bit noisy as we could hear the televisions nearby. 3.Also, due to the popularity of this place, it is quite noisy. 4.We didn't like how much traffic there was by the bed and breakfast. 5.We would consider staying there again on a less busy weekend in hopes that the traffic noise wouldn't be so bad. 6.The walls were also very thin and you could hear the people staying in the room next to you. 7.The B&B is pretty quiet and well appointed, and the staff goes out of their way to be friendly. 8.It was very noisy while we were trying to sleep. [SEP] U: Can you locate any four star places to stay? S: I have 21 hotels with the 4 star rating.  What area would you like to stay in? U: Are there any with free wifi available? S: Yes. src_text: FAQs of LA MIMOSA: 1.La Mimosa does serve alcohol. reviews of LA MIMOSA: 1.They also have an extensive menu of non-alcoholic drink options to choose from, and those prices are much more wallet-friendly! 2.The drinks are reasonably priced, I drank a beer and they have a great selection of craft beers, that came cold and was $4 a pint for the citrus IPA. 3.Don't go to La Mimosa for the drinks, because your wallet will be much lighter when you leave! 4.The food was a bit pricey but the drink specials made up for that. [SEP] U: I'd like some information on a train going to bishops stortford departing from Cambridge. S: What day and time are you leaving Cambridge? U: I'm leaving after 18:45 on thursday. S: TR1339 is leaving  at 23:29 and it is priced at 10.10pounds. can i book? U: What is the arrival time? S: TR1339 arrives at 24:07 and takes 38 minutes to arrive there. U: Thank you.  I will also need to find a restaurant that serves Mediterranean food and should be in the expensive price range. S: La Mimosa is a great expensive Mediterranean restaurant in the centre. Would you like to book a table? U: Is the beer a good value? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: La Mimosa has reasonably priced beer, as well as an extensive menu of non-alcoholic drink options and drink specials.

src_text: reviews of AVALON: 1.I did enjoy the spacious room and the view was an unexpected plus. 2.However, the room in which I stayed felt cramped and small. [SEP] U: Can you tell me more information on the avalon? S: I can!  The avalon is a guesthouse in north.  What other information do you need? U: Can you help me book a 5 night stay there? S: Absolutely!  First, what day did you want to arrive, and how many guests will be staying? U: I need to get a large room. Do they have those? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Avalon hotel is known to have spacious rooms and nice views, but for some they can feel cramped and small.

src_text:
reviews of THE CAMBRIDGE BELFRY: 1.This hotel offered the best place for our limited budget. 2.But the fee to use the spa was too high. 3.The only downside was the price of our stay, which was a bit more than normal. [SEP] U: I'm going to Cambridge and interested in trying some restaurants. Can you recommend one that serves traditional food? S: can please provide more information to help us serve you better. U: Just someting in the moderate price range is all I care about really. S: My apologies.  There is nothing in the moderate price range that is traditional.  Would you like to try a different type of restaurant? U: How about modern European food? S: How does the riverside brasserie sound? It's at the Doubletree. U: Sounds good can you make a booking for 7 people at 16:45 on saturday. S: Booking was successful. The table will be reserved for 15 minutes.
Reference number is : RB2JTPWC.  Can I help with anything else today? U: I also need to get some information about The Cambridge Belfry hotel. Can you give me the price range and how many stars it has? S: The hotel is on the west side and has 4 stars. It is a cheap hotel. Would you like to make a booking? U: Is this place a good value for the money? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Cambridge Belfry has a couple reviews that say it's too expensive, and one that says it was good for their limited budget.

src_text: reviews of THE LENSFIELD HOTEL: 1.I was on business in the area, and it was great to have a nice place to sleep quietly at night. 2.My room was very quiet and I think the price was right. 3.The location and guests were just so noisy that it really ruined our stay. 4.It made sleeping very easy! 5.Also, it was very quiet and peaceful. 6.The place is very quiet which was good for me and my family, we dont like a lot of noise. 7.However, it was pretty hard to appreciate the great view with the constant noise. 8.Our stay was very quiet. [SEP] U: Im in the west side of town, are there any pools on the westside? S: Sorry, there are no swimming pools on the West side of town. Any other type of attraction you might be interested in? U: Okay, how about a museum, then? S: How about Kettle's yard. Would you like the contact info? U: Yes, please provide the address. S: It is located on Castle Street.  Is there anything else you would like to know? U: Is there an entrance fee? S: No there isn't. Kettle's yard is completely free. U: Excellent. Can I have their address? S: Of course, the address is on castle street, the postcode is cb30aq. Is there anything else I can assist you with today? U: Yes please, I'm looking for a 3-star hotel in the south, with free parking. S: Do you have a preference in price range? U: I don't, pick the best one. Please book a room for 3 people and 3 nights starting from Monday. S: Okay. Your booking at the Lensfield Hotel was successful. The reference number is M0Z0VUJL. Can I help with anything else today? U: is it in a quiet location? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, the majority of guests that have attended the Lensfield Hotel can be said to have experienced a quiet, peaceful environment.

src_text: reviews of THE MISSING SOCK: 1.The people were friendly but the decor was unkempt and the view from where we sat looked out over a construction site. [SEP] U: I want to find some international food in the east part of town. S: The Missing Sock serves international food and is located in the east side of town, at Finders Corner Newmarket Road. Would you like more information or a reservation? U: I need the restaurant to be cheap, does this restaurant fir that criteria? S: Yes, the Missing Sock is listed as being in the cheap price range. Would you like to reserve a table? U: Is the inside decorated beautifully? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: No, it's not very plush or fancy inside, unfortunately. Would you like me to search for something else?

src_text: reviews of GALLERIA: 1.The atmosphere and decor of the resraurant was a bit boring, with no scenic vistas  to be seen out of its windows. 2.I felt like I was in Tuscany with the warm colors that surrounded the room. 3.The indoor decor was dull and not appealing. 4.The restaurant was nice and had a favorable Italian theme with murals of Italy's countryside. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a great European restaurant. Can you help with that? S: There are quite a few European restaurants, what price range are you interested in? U: can you find me one that is in the moderate price range? S: Yes, I can help you with that. What area are you interested in? U: The area doesn't matter. S: There are 2 restaurants listed as European, and 3 listed as Modern European. Are you more interested in one group? U: I apologize, are any of those in the Centre area? S: Yes, two modern European and two European are listed in Centre. Do you have a preference? U: Either is good. Pick the best and give me the address postcode and phone number. S: How about Galleria? It's a European restaurant at 33 Bridge Street, CB21UW. Their phone number is 01223362054. Can I help you with anything else? U: Do they have an attractive interior? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The interior is decorated in a favorable Italian theme according to one person but several people found it to be dull and unappealing.

src_text: reviews of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.I also enjoyed the great view as that helped me take a moment to enjoy some peace and quiet. 2.The place was quiet so we could hear ourselves talk and just relax because we were there to get away from our hectic schedules. 3.I noticed that throughout my stay I was not disturbed by any loud or disruptive patrons. [SEP] U: I want to find out more about places to dine in the city centre that serve asian cuisine. S: we have 4 options. which is your price range? U: I don't really have a price range - I just need a table for 2 at 17:00 on Wednesday. Pick your favorite and let me know! S: I booked you a moderately priced restaurant in the city's centre called Yippee Noodle Club.  Your reference number is 0P6H7PDL.  Can I help you further? U: No, that's it thank you. S: We can also arrange a taxi from your hotel to the restaurant when you are ready, just let us know a hour or so in advance of your reservation on Wednesday. U: That's an excellent idea. Could you help me find a hotel in the north? S: There are plenty of locations that meet your criteria. Would you like to narrow it down further by stars, internet, or price range? U: The hotel should be in the north and should include free wifi. S: Acorn Guest House is a nice place, do you want their info ? U: Is the place quiet and comfortable? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The rooms in the Acorn Guest House should be really quiet, I couldn't find any complaints from previous customers about noise.

src_text: reviews of THE CAMBRIDGE BELFRY: 1.The room was clean, not a spot anywhere. 2.On the other hand the room wasn't very clean and I felt uncomfortable sitting in the chairs or using the bathroom for fear of germs. 3.We enjoyed our stay the bed were comfortable and the room was clean. [SEP] U: I was wondering if you could help me with the train schedule. S: Of course. Where would you like to travel? U: I need to travel from Stansted Airport to Cambridge on Monday. S: I can help you with that.  Do you have a specific time frame in mind? U: Yes no later than 5:15 I have to be there by 20:20. S: The earliest I have is 05:24. Will that work? U: I am sorry I meant to leave after 15:15 so that will be fine. S: I have TR1188 leaving at 5:24 and arriving at 5:52. Would you like to book tickets? U: Can you book it for me and get a reference number ? S: Absolutely! How many tickets do you need? U: I'm sorry, I don't actually need the tickets right now. Can you find me a moderately priced 4 star hotel, though? S: We have 4 star hotels in the cheap and expensive price range, could I interest you in one of those? U: Please book me a room for 4 the same day at a cheap  one you recommend. Thanks S: Is there a certain area you would like to stay in? U: No, as long as the hotel itself is a 4 star establishment I'm not too concerned about where it's located. S: How many nights would you like to stay? U: 4 nights please starting on monday. S: OK, I've booked 4 people at The Cambridge Belfry for 4 nights starting Monday, the reference number is WZ83NOII. Is there anything else I can help you with? U: Could I get a room that is spotless? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: A couple said it was both clean and spotless. But another said they uncomfortable with how unclean it was and feared sitting down on anything.

src_text: reviews of FINCHES BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.Unfortunately the room wasn't too clean. 2.The bathroom was clean but the rest of the room wasn't. 3.But where the room amenities are concerned, I was happy with the size and cleanliness of the room, and the bed was super comfortable. [SEP] U: I am looking for a place to stay. The hotel should include free parking and should be in the type of guesthouse S: What area of town? U: It should be in the west and have a star rating of 4. S: how about finches bed and breakfast? U: Are the rooms cleaned daily? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Customers of finches bed and breakfast have said that the rooms were clean, but some customers have said that they were not.

src_text: reviews of CITY STOP RESTAURANT: 1.There was a lovely outdoor dining area and the food was both of high quality and reasonably priced. FAQs of CITY STOP RESTAURANT: 1.The City Stop Restaurant does have outdoor seating. [SEP] U: I am looking for a hotel on the west side of Cambridge. S: Hobson House doesn't have meeting or banquet halls. What kind of booking do you want? U: Can you make sure they have Wifi for guests first? S: WiFi is available to the guests there. S: Excellent, you're all set. The reference number is W4QYZ0UK. U: Thank you.  Do you have information on City Stop Restaurant? S: Yes. It is european cuisine located in the north area of town with and expensive price range. U: Can you tell me their postcode? S: Yes, the postcode is cb41uy. U: Do you know if they have outdoor seating? S: <extra_id_0>

src_text: reviews of THE CAMBRIDGE BELFRY: 1.The room was clean, not a spot anywhere. 2.On the other hand the room wasn't very clean and I felt uncomfortable sitting in the chairs or using the bathroom for fear of germs. 3.We enjoyed our stay the bed were comfortable and the room was clean. [SEP] U: I want a place to stay. Find me a hotel that includes free parking. S: There are eight accomodations of the hotel type with free parking. What part of town do you prefer? U: The west, please. And can I get free wifi? S: The Cambridge Belfry is an inexpensive, 4 star option on the west side with free wifi and free parking. U: Can you tell me if the house keeping is thoroughly done here? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Most customers agree that the rooms were very clean, however there was one person who felt the rooms were not very clean and felt uncomfortable sitting in the chairs for fear of germs.

src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.The location was extremely silent and I found that I was not disturbed during my time on this trip. 2.Our room was a bit noisy as we could hear the televisions nearby. 3.Also, due to the popularity of this place, it is quite noisy. 4.We didn't like how much traffic there was by the bed and breakfast. 5.We would consider staying there again on a less busy weekend in hopes that the traffic noise wouldn't be so bad. 6.The walls were also very thin and you could hear the people staying in the room next to you. 7.The B&B is pretty quiet and well appointed, and the staff goes out of their way to be friendly. 8.It was very noisy while we were trying to sleep. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a hotel to stay at. I want it to be at least 2 stars and in the center of town. S: I have a 3 star hotel and a 4 star hotel both in the centre. Would you like to book one of them? U: Do you have anything that is 2 star rated in the centre? S: we got none. can i help you with anything else? U: That is all I need. S: I am not finding a 2 star in the centre. Are you sure there is not another type of hotel you would like? U: I do need a place to stay, so are there any 4 star hotels available? S: I have 2 options - one is cheap and one is expensive. Which price range would you prefer? U: cheap will work. can you book it for Wednesday? 1 person, 2 nights. I'll need the reference number too. S: I was able to book a room at Alexander bed and breakfast, your reference number is VWF48IZM. Is there anything else I can help with? U: Is the Alexander a soft sounding place? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: There are mixed reviews about the noise level at the Alexander. Most people thought it was a little too noisy. Other reviewers thought it was quiet.

src_text: FAQs of MAHARAJAH TANDOORI RESTAURANT: 1.Maharajah Tandoori Restaurant has a full bar with alcoholic drinks. reviews of MAHARAJAH TANDOORI RESTAURANT: 1.The price was a bit high, but worth it for the expertly-made traditional Indian drinks. 2.The drinks were just okay. 3.But, the food and drinks we had was amazing. 4.They had really good drinks with quality ingredients and the food was excellent. 5.The drinks are really good and worth coming for. 6.I'm glad they had alcoholic drinks available so I ordered a beer. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a place called maharajah tandoori restaurant. Do you know it? It's a restaurant. S: Yes, it's a luxurious place on the west side. Would you like the number, or a reservation? U: Would I be able to get a cocktail here? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, the Maharajah Tandoori serves alcoholic beverages with some really good reviews. Most customers said the drinks were really good, high-quality and worth coming for. There were some customers who felt the drinks were just okay. Would you like to know anything else about them?

src_text: reviews of SALA THONG: 1.The dish did not disappoint, although I found the beer to be overpriced although it was likely imported. 2.As good as the drinks were though, the selection was a bit small. 3.But we did enjoy their variety of drinks and gluten free dished, and the staff was super friendly. FAQs of SALA THONG: 1.Sala Thong serves alcohol. [SEP] U: I want a french restaurant on the west side please. S: I was unable to find any french places on the west part of town. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: No, apparently they have a very small selection of drinks to choose from. Would you like to find another restaurant?

src_text: reviews of MICHAELHOUSE CAFE: 1.I recently came back to visit the Michaelhouse Cafe with my family and loved the huge portion of food. 2.My only dislikes were the very small portion sizes of food, the expensive drinks, and the not so great tasting food. 3.While I loved the non-alcoholic drink choices on the menu, I thought the portion sizes of the foods were far too small. 4.I left full. 5.The food was better than we anticipate their portions were reasonable as well.. And my pricey drink was actually very good too. 6.For one, The portion size was large. [SEP] U: My car will be in the shop so I will need to take a train to work in cambridge that day. U: I will leave from Bishops Stortford. S: Train TR8192 leaves that day at 05:29 and arrives at 06:07. Would you like me to book anything for you? U: How much is the price for that? S: it costs 10.10 pounds.. U: Ok. Can you also recommend an expensive european restaurant? S: Do you have a specific area you'd like it to be in or would you like me to make a recommendation? U: you can pick for me. S: How about Michaelhouse Cafe in the centre area of town? U: Do they have nice food portions? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Views on the portion sizes at Michaelhouse Cafe are varied. They are described as everything from very small to large and huge.

src_text: reviews of HOBSONS HOUSE: 1.The view from the room was also breathtaking. 2.The view from the room was also amazing, and the cleanliness of the bathroom was top notch. [SEP] U: I am looking for a place to stay on my upcoming visit.  I can't wait to see some of your local tourist attractions. S: Can you tell what area you will be staying in? U: I am looking for a moderate priced 3 star hotel with free parking and free WiFi. S: I have found one in the south, the north and the west.  Do you have a preference?  They are all very comparable. U: Get me one in the West place S: The Hobsons House meets your criteria. Is there anything else I can do for you? U: Does the room have a great view? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: According to the reviews that I have on hand for this location, the view has been described as amazing and breathtaking.  Would you like for me to book you?

src_text: reviews of ASHLEY HOTEL: 1.I was overall quite pleased with the value for the money. 2.Great value. 3.The rooms are definitely overpriced and on the smaller side, but not too bad. 4.I was at Ashley hotel with my wife, and we were pleasantly surprised at the good quality, considering the price. 5.The room provided a pretty decent value for the price spent and there was a nice variety of breakfast options, including lots of fresh fruit and smoothies. [SEP] U: Hello can you help me find a place to stay, such as a hotel? Also it needs to be at a reasonable price with free parking. S: Yes, I can help with that! There are guesthouses and one hotel available with the amenities that you require. What area would you like to stay in? U: Do any of the options have two stars? S: Unfortunately none of the options has two stars, would you like to change the search criteria? U: Any star is fine. S: I would recommend the autumn house, a 4 star guesthouse in the east. Would you be interested in booking a room? U: Is that in the moderate price range? S: It is actually in the cheap price range. Would you like something in the moderate price range instead? U: Yes please.  I actually do need a 2 star rating too. S: Ok, the ashley hotel is in the north with a moderate price range. Two stars. Would you like me to book you rooms? U: Is the value of accommodation a good one for the price? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, I believe it is and other past customers agree that the rooms are nice, and there are a lot of amenities which bring up the value of this hotel.

src_text: reviews of AVALON: 1.I did enjoy the spacious room and the view was an unexpected plus. 2.However, the room in which I stayed felt cramped and small. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a 4 star hotel in the north. S: Are you looking for a specific hotel? Also what type of hotel are you looking for? U: Hm, maybe something moderately priced? With free wifi? S: The avolon would feet your needs. Would you like a reservation? U: I want a big room - does this hotel have that? S: <extra_id_0>

src_text: reviews of ASHLEY HOTEL: 1.This place definitely delivered in that regard. 2.There was no more than a few noises I heard during my entire stay, I was able to keep my head clear. 3.I stayed here with my family, and we were able to get a good night's rest, as it was very quiet. 4.I mean they are like home comfortable, and also it's very quiet so we didn't have to worry about any loud noises. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, the Ashley Hotel does seem to have a quiet atmosphere. Past guests have said that it was very quiet, with only a few noises heard during the stay.

src_text: reviews of CHIQUITO RESTAURANT BAR: 1.My waiter, Diego, was quite pleasant and offered friendly, world-class service. 2.Some people may find that they do have extensive options for vegetarians and the service was actually really good, so it wasn't all bad. 3.I had the Chilaquiles, she had the mole and we both agreed it was the some of the best Mexican food ever not to mention it was all very reasonably priced with superb service to go along with it. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a place to stay in the south of town. It doesn't need to have free parking. S: There are 4 hotels that are in the area you are looking for. Would you prefer a 3 or 4 star rated hotel? U: I don't care about the star rating as long as it's expensive. S: The Lensfield Hotel is the only expensive hotel in the south area. S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Although the reviews were mixed, the majority found their stay at the Lensfield Hotel to be quiet and peaceful.

src_text: reviews of THE CAMBRIDGE BELFRY: 1.One of the best things about the hotel is the view of the mountains from the balcony. 2.The staff was polite they took out luggage to our room, and our room had a spectacular view of the forest and nature. [SEP] U: I am looking for a place to stay in Cambridge. I prefer a cheap, 4 star hotel. S: I have he cambridge belfry in the west area. It is cheap and has 4 stars. Would you like me to book that for you? U: Does this place have free wifi? S: Yes, the cambridge belfry has internet.  Would you like me to book it for you? U: Yes, I would like to book it for 5 people for 5 nights, beginning on Friday. S: You are booked and your reference number is CK82ZWXD. Can I help with anything else? U: Does the room have a nice view? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Guests staying at The Cambridge Belfry are treated to a spectacular view of the surrounding forest and mountains.

src_text: reviews of ALI BABA: 1.Ali Baba has good Lebanese food in a nice location. 2.Can't beat the location, though they have a very limited selected of non-alcoholic drinks, and you're out of luck if you want something gluten free. 3.Ali Baba is a new Lebanese place that opened up near my house last year. 4.i found it easy to get to and they have parking. 5.The choices are few and the location is a bit hard to get to. [SEP] U: Hello! Can you please give me information about Ruskin Gallery? S: ruskin gallery is a museum in the centre. The entrance is free and they are located at anglia ruskin university, east road. Can I help with anything else? U: Could you provide me with the phone number? S: Sure, their phone number is 01245493131. Is there anything else I can help you with? U: Also looking for a restaurant that serves Lebanese food in the moderate price range. S: Ali baba is a lebanese restaurant with a moderate price range. Do you want to book it? U: I really prefer a nice location; can you make that happen? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Some previous guests say that the location can not be beat, but others have said that it is a bit hard to get to.

src_text: reviews of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.We stayed at the Acorn guest house and I loved the view. 2.Outside of the balcony of my room, I found that the exquisite view was unlike anything I've ever seen before. 3.The wi-fi was super fast though and the room provided a great view. 4.I also enjoyed the great view as that helped me take a moment to enjoy some peace and quiet. 5.We didn't care so much if it had other things, but a great view and good location, were not things we were going to give a little on. [SEP] U: I need a place to stay please. A guesthouse would be great. S: Acorn guest house has good ratings would you like to stay there? U: Is it in the north? I need to be in the north area of the city. S: Yes, Acorn Guest House is a 4 star guest house with free internet and free parking in the north part of town. Should I book it for you? U: Yes, please book starting Thursday for 4 people and for 4 nights. S: I'm sorry, there were no rooms available. Would you like to find another hotel? U: Could you try another hotel in the same price range and, if you make a reservation, give me the reference number? S: Will you be needing free parking? U: I do not need free parking. S: Acorn guest house is in the moderate price range, are you looking to book in that pricerange then? U: Yes, that would be fine, moderate price range. S: The Acorn is not available but I went ahead and booked the alpha-milton guest house. Your reference number is SJZ9ZJ8V. U: Is the view from the room okay? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Customers at The ACORN GUEST HOUSE have enjoyed the view, they said that it was great, and outright exquisite.

src_text: reviews of RAJMAHAL: 1.The portions were generous and the foods were high quality to boot. 2.Also the portion sizes are a bit small so order more. [SEP] U: Hello, I am looking for information regarding magdalene college. S: Sure, the address is magdalene street. The entrance is free, it's in the west area, and the phone number is 01223332138 U: Thank you so much S: Your Welcome have a great day. U: Could you also help me find a restaurant? I'm looking for something that's moderately priced that serves Indian food. S: You have four choices: Curry Prince or Rajmahal in the east, the nirala in the north, or maghna in the west. Do any of these sound good to you? U: Either Curry Prince or Rajmahal will do since they are located in the east. S: How about Rajmahal, then? src_text: reviews of SALA THONG: 1.The only thing that we disliked was the size of the entrees. 2.Portions are tiny and service was a little...how to say it...lacking. 3.The atmosphere itself could have been better but the food was great but left you hungry. 4.The portions are also massive, so I didn't leave hungry. 5.I would recommend ordering two entrees per person, as these were quite small. 6.Between us we ordered the Thai Fried Rice, Green Curry, Red Curry, and Tom Kha Kai, all of which were excellent, affordable and came in large portion sizes. [SEP] U: I want to get a train out of Cambridge that departs after 20:45 please. S: What is your destination and day of travel? U: I wish to go to New York City leaving this Friday. Can you pleas book it for me on the same day at about 13:15. S: How many people will be dining? U: I'll be dining alone. S: Unfortunately no table is available at that time do you have another time? U: Could you please check for a table at 12:15 and can I have the reference number? S: Alright, I have you booked at Sala Thong at 12:15. Reference number is: QIH3G407. src_text: reviews of LOCH FYNE: 1.I was there with coworkers and we enjoyed the meal and the affordable drinks. 2.And the drinks are priced right to go along with your meal. 3.In addition to amazingly fresh seafood that's top quality all-around, their menu is genuinely affordable, especially their various specialty cocktails. 4.However, the service was quick and prompt and the drinks were very affordable. src_text: reviews of KYMMOY: 1.We all raved about their hot pot, spring rolls, sweet and sour pork, and ma po tofu. 2.We ordered lots of great Asian food, including Yangzhou Fried Rice, Sweet and Sour Pork, Hot Pot and Chow Mein. 3.Sure, the place doesn't have a great view or amazing decor, but go for the food and you won't be disappointed! 4.Their Asian cuisine is to die for! 5.It was unanimously agreed that the cuisine was high-quality, using fresh ingredients, and was very delicious. 6.Kymmoy has good Asian oriental food. 7.Everything was well-prepared and arrived to our table piping hot, with really good portion sizes that were great for sharing. 8.The food was fresh and authentic. src_text: FAQs of LA MIMOSA: 1.La Mimosa does serve alcohol. reviews of LA MIMOSA: 1.They also have an extensive menu of non-alcoholic drink options to choose from, and those prices are much more wallet-friendly! 2.The drinks are reasonably priced, I drank a beer and they have a great selection of craft beers, that came cold and was $4 a pint for the citrus IPA. 3.Don't go to La Mimosa for the drinks, because your wallet will be much lighter when you leave! 4.The food was a bit pricey but the drink specials made up for that. [SEP] U: Hi there, can you help me find a park to visit please? S: We have 79 parks in the Cambridge area, what area of Cambridge would you like to go to a park in? U: Can you please provide me with the postcode, entrance fee and address of a park in the south? S: There are two parks in the south, The Wandlebury and Sheeps Green. Which are you more interested in? U: How about getting me the address and postcode and entrance fee for The Wandlebury. I also am looking for a restaurant called La Mimosa. S: Wandlebury's address is Wandlebury Ring, Gog Magog Hills, Babraham, postcode cb223ae. No entrance fee. La Mimosa is located in the city centre, address is Thompsons Lane Fen Dilton. Anything else? U: Do they have good priced beer? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Most of the reviews remark on the affordable drinks at La Mimosa. Would you like me to book a table for you?

src_text: reviews of PIZZA HUT CITY CENTRE: 1.We were seated by the window and had a great view of the downtown lights and the park. 2.When I first walked in the seating was wrapped in windows offering an amazing view where you sat. reviews of ZIZZI CAMBRIDGE: 1.Not the best view in this place, but the location itself is nice. 2.They have a gorgeous location right next to the water, and if you ask the wait staff nicely, you can get a table overlooking a spectacular view. reviews of ASK RESTAURANT: 1.There were not many tables that had access to a window but we could still see some of the downtown skyline from across the restaurant if we looked that way, but the main view that we had was of the doors leading to and from the kitchen. 2.So I'll give the place a mixed recommendation: go for the fabulous location, right in the heart of the city, and the really nice view from their bar - and then stay for the drinks only. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Pizza Hut City Centre has a view of the downtown lights and the park. Ask Restaurant has a view of the downtown skyline, if you have the right seat. Zizzi Cambridge has a location right next to the water.

src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.The location was extremely silent and I found that I was not disturbed during my time on this trip. 2.Our room was a bit noisy as we could hear the televisions nearby. 3.Also, due to the popularity of this place, it is quite noisy. 4.We didn't like how much traffic there was by the bed and breakfast. 5.We would consider staying there again on a less busy weekend in hopes that the traffic noise wouldn't be so bad. 6.The walls were also very thin and you could hear the people staying in the room next to you. 7.The B&B is pretty quiet and well appointed, and the staff goes out of their way to be friendly. 8.It was very noisy while we were trying to sleep. src_text: reviews of HAMILTON LODGE: 1.The location was difficult to find, not much around there and the room was on the small side, despite the perks 2.That being said, the room was spacious and the bed was very comfortable. 3.It would have been nice if the room was a bit bigger but the bathroom was nice and very clean. 4.The rooms in which we were provided were extremely large and comfortable. reviews of BRIDGE GUEST HOUSE: 1.The room was smaller than expected and I was surprised that they didn't have any luggage storage service for the amount we paid. 2.Our room was bright and cheerful with lots of space and a newly refurbished bathroom. reviews of HOBSONS HOUSE: 1.The rooms weren't big and quite tiny, to be honest. 2.While I was not pleased with the slow wi-fi and small room, I was content with their awesome breakfast options, friendly and engaging staff members and the best part! src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.The location was extremely silent and I found that I was not disturbed during my time on this trip. 2.Our room was a bit noisy as we could hear the televisions nearby. 3.Also, due to the popularity of this place, it is quite noisy. 4.We didn't like how much traffic there was by the bed and breakfast. 5.We would consider staying there again on a less busy weekend in hopes that the traffic noise wouldn't be so bad. 6.The walls were also very thin and you could hear the people staying in the room next to you. 7.The B&B is pretty quiet and well appointed, and the staff goes out of their way to be friendly. 8.It was very noisy while we were trying to sleep. src_text:
reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.The location was extremely silent and I found that I was not disturbed during my time on this trip. 2.Our room was a bit noisy as we could hear the televisions nearby. 3.Also, due to the popularity of this place, it is quite noisy. 4.We didn't like how much traffic there was by the bed and breakfast. 5.We would consider staying there again on a less busy weekend in hopes that the traffic noise wouldn't be so bad. 6.The walls were also very thin and you could hear the people staying in the room next to you. 7.The B&B is pretty quiet and well appointed, and the staff goes out of their way to be friendly. 8.It was very noisy while we were trying to sleep. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a cheap asian oriental restaurant. S: There are 5 Asian Oriental restaurants available. Are you interested in a particular area or price range? U: Is there one in the centre? S: Yes, 4 of them are in the Centre of town. Two of them are cheap, one moderate, and one expensively priced. Would you like to book one of them? U: Can you select one of the restaurants with the cheap price range in the center of town? S: The dojo noodle house would be an option for you U: book a table for 4 people at 17:00 on friday.
