Reference number is : K77JVT2U.  Can I help with anything else? U: I am also looking for a hotel in the same area as the restaurant. S: There are two guesthouses and three hotels in the centre of town. Perhaps we can narrow it down by price range. U: Same price range as the restaurant please S: I recommend alexander bed and breakfast, would you like more information or a booking. U: Would you know if they have a calm and peaceful environment? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Alexander Bed and Breakfast was really noisy for many guests. I would suggest a different place if you want peace and quiet.

src_text: reviews of SALA THONG: 1.The only thing that we disliked was the size of the entrees. 2.Portions are tiny and service was a little...how to say it...lacking. 3.The atmosphere itself could have been better but the food was great but left you hungry. 4.The portions are also massive, so I didn't leave hungry. 5.I would recommend ordering two entrees per person, as these were quite small. 6.Between us we ordered the Thai Fried Rice, Green Curry, Red Curry, and Tom Kha Kai, all of which were excellent, affordable and came in large portion sizes. [SEP] U: I am looking for a place to eat in the West, Thai food please. S: The Sala Thong serves Thai food.  It is expensive but good.  Can I reserve a table for you? U: Do they serve large portions here? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: I can't say for sure, some customers said that the portions were absolutely massive and others said that they were so small that you needed two entree's for one person.

src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.The location was extremely silent and I found that I was not disturbed during my time on this trip. 2.Our room was a bit noisy as we could hear the televisions nearby. 3.Also, due to the popularity of this place, it is quite noisy. 4.We didn't like how much traffic there was by the bed and breakfast. 5.We would consider staying there again on a less busy weekend in hopes that the traffic noise wouldn't be so bad. 6.The walls were also very thin and you could hear the people staying in the room next to you. 7.The B&B is pretty quiet and well appointed, and the staff goes out of their way to be friendly. 8.It was very noisy while we were trying to sleep. [SEP] U: I'm interested in 4 star hotels in the centre of town. S: I've located one 4 star hotel, University Arms Hotel located on Regent Street. It is an expensive hotel, but has internet and parking. Would you like to book a room? U: I would prefer a hotel in the moderate price range. S: There are no four star hotels in a moderate price range in that area.  Would you like me to search for a different area of town? U: How about the cheap price range? S: Alexander bed and breakfast is in the cheap price range in the centre area. Would you like to make a reservation? U: Could I enjoy a nice quiet stay there? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Although some reviewers found the Alexander Bed and Breakfast to be quiet, others found it to be noisy because of its location and popularity.

[SEP] U: I'm looking for a train leaving on friday going to cambridge. S: I can help with that. Where will you be departing from? U: I just want to arrive by 15:15. S: Well, there are 101 trains arriving before 15:15 on Friday. Is there are area you are coming from so I can narrow it down for you? U: I'll be leaving Norwich. There are 8 people traveling. S: Okay. We have you booked for 8 tickets on the TR3147. The total fee is 140.8 GBP which can be paid at the station. Your reference number is YRM9L6LV. U: Thank you. U: No thank you.  Can you please give me the address though? S: Sure.  The address is 53-57 lensfield road.  Is there anything else I can help you with? U: Are there some good views from that hotel's rooms? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, the views from the rooms at The Lensfield Hotel are beautiful as guests specifically mention the gorgeous scenery.

src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.The location was extremely silent and I found that I was not disturbed during my time on this trip. 2.Our room was a bit noisy as we could hear the televisions nearby. 3.Also, due to the popularity of this place, it is quite noisy. 4.We didn't like how much traffic there was by the bed and breakfast. 5.We would consider staying there again on a less busy weekend in hopes that the traffic noise wouldn't be so bad. 6.The walls were also very thin and you could hear the people staying in the room next to you. 7.The B&B is pretty quiet and well appointed, and the staff goes out of their way to be friendly. 8.It was very noisy while we were trying to sleep. [SEP] U: Im looking for a hotel with free parking and wifi please. S: I am happy to help you with that. We have many options that offer free parking and wifi. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Alexander Bed and Breakfast is quite noisy according to most guests, but a couple say that it was quiet for them.

src_text: reviews of CHIQUITO RESTAURANT BAR: 1.My waiter, Diego, was quite pleasant and offered friendly, world-class service. 2.Some people may find that they do have extensive options for vegetarians and the service was actually really good, so it wasn't all bad. 3.I had the Chilaquiles, she had the mole and we both agreed it was the some of the best Mexican food ever not to mention it was all very reasonably priced with superb service to go along with it. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Both La Raza and La Tasca have great reviews on their Fabada and other foods saying their fresh, superb quality, authentic, and delicious. However, La Raza did have one negative comments that said the food was horrible. Would you like to know more about either place?

src_text: reviews of ANATOLIA: 1.They have this Meze that was pretty decent, and the other foods I tried were just OK. Portions were tiny though, but it had a nice view in a good location. 2.The portions were kind of small but I guess that helps with portion control! 3.I was overall very impressed with both the quality and the portions, as I had enough for a full meal and was still able to take enough home for leftovers the next day. 4.But the portions were so stupidly small, and the quality was seriously mediocre. 5.Between us we ordered Gozleme, Baklava, Borek, and Ayran, all of which were of great quality and were in large portions. 6.The portions were generous and the prices were fair. 7.However, the portion sizes were quite small, and we were disappointed in the very limited selection of non-alcoholic drink options for the kids in our group. reviews of EFES RESTAURANT: 1.I had to ask for a to-go box, because I could not finish it, even though I really wanted to! 2.I ordered the Gozleme and they had it stacked so high it almost fell over on the plate. 3.All-in-all, a great dining experience: the portion sizes were very good, and the prices were reasonable (under $20 for each of us) for top-notch quality foods and drinks. 4.I was hungry so it was good that the food portions were big. src_text: reviews of SITAR TANDOORI: 1.Upon looking at the menu, I noticed this place was charging a lot more money for the same dishes you can get elsewhere for less of the price. 2.However, the drinks were not all that tasty, and the food was overpriced and not very tasty either. 3.Food quality is superb, and very reasonably priced. 4.I guess that's why their dinner menu is so expensive. 5.It made up for the price. 6.The food was also affordable, as were the drinks, so I was glad to be able to spend time out without breaking the bank. 7.I was especially happy that, since I'm on a budget, the foods were affordable. 8.So, I was able to enjoy a night out with my friends without breaking the bank. 9.The service was awesome and friendly, and for once the foods were affordable and not expensive like most Indian restaurants. reviews of YU GARDEN: 1.Yu Garden is an affordable place for Chinese with friends. 2.It was all good and at a great price. 3.There are two main reasons to come to Yu Garden, and they're awesome ones: the exceptional quality of the food, and the incredible value on both the dinner and drinks menus. 4.Portions were large and quite affordable. 5.Some things that really stood out was the high level of affordability for the drinks and the food. 6.I think that for the price, the portions were too small. reviews of PIPASHA RESTAURANT: 1.There's always good food at a great price and plenty of options for our vegetarian friends. 2.The food was high-quality and the portions were generous but you pay for what you get. 3.It was of very high quality and was down-right cheap given the large portions. 4.I looked at their menu and was pleasantly surprised at how affordable most everything was. 5.The location was appealing and I have to admit that the prices were pretty low. 6.I had a bit of sticker shock when the bill came. reviews of ROYAL STANDARD: 1.The only downside was that while the drinks were affordable, my meal itself was pretty overpriced. 2.The only good thing about the night is that the prices were affordable, so we didn't spend too much for our meal. 3.The food was fancy but I still thought it was overpriced for what you got. reviews of GRAFTON HOTEL RESTAURANT: 1.The food at the Grafton was authentic, affordable, delicious, and portioned on the bigger side. 2.If you are looking for decent food at a decent price, this is a good place to try. 3.As I was looking over the menu, I was a bit disappointed that they did not have gluten-free options but I was very impressed at the affordable prices for the foods. 4.However, we were happy to see that the restaurant was affordable and didn't break the bank. Portions were tiny though, but it had a nice view in a good location. 3.They have a nice view you can enjoy too. [SEP] U: Hello, I'm trying to find a restaurant called anatolia. src_text: reviews of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.We stayed at the Acorn guest house and I loved the view. 2.Outside of the balcony of my room, I found that the exquisite view was unlike anything I've ever seen before. 3.The wi-fi was super fast though and the room provided a great view. 4.I also enjoyed the great view as that helped me take a moment to enjoy some peace and quiet. 5.We didn't care so much if it had other things, but a great view and good location, were not things we were going to give a little on. [SEP] U: i want a place to stay in Cambridge the is moderate price no wifi S: Sure.  Would you like a particular area of town? U: An inexpensive area with free parking if possible. S: Okay, I recommend the Acorn Guest House. It's located in the north. Would you like me to book a reservation for you? U: Are the rooms nice and do they have great views? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes the do.  Previous guests left reviews stating that the views are nice, amazing, and wonderful.  The views really help you to relax and enjoy your experience.

src_text: reviews of GONVILLE HOTEL: 1.I stayed in a regular room but it was big and had a lot of space, the decoration in the room was catching to the eye, and the color that was used on the wall was fantastic. 2.I really enjoyed the big, spacious rooms. 3.The Gonville Hotel was one of those places that I've been t hat had bigger rooms than average. The hotels are The Gonville Hotel and the Lensfield Hotel. U: Do you know if the Gonville Hotel has big rooms? S: <extra_id_0>

src_text: reviews of EFES RESTAURANT: 1.The food was great and the drink options go on for days. 2.There are plenty of drink options too. reviews of ANATOLIA: 1.They have good food and drinks here but the drink menu is small. 2.My only critique is that the drink options on the menu were limited. 3.We thought a little alcohol might help, but while their prices on drinks are great, the drink options themselves were incredibly limited. src_text: reviews of ROSA'S BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.We also really enjoyed the pleasant views that they had in their rooms which was another enjoyable experience. 2.The view was breathtaking. 3.The B&B had a super convenient location, and my room had a wonderful view. 4.To have the big room and that gorgeous view together was absolutely worth it. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Lensfield Hotel has really nice views from their rooms. Guests have nothing but good things to say.

src_text: reviews of THE CAMBRIDGE BELFRY: 1.One of the best things about the hotel is the view of the mountains from the balcony. 2.The staff was polite they took out luggage to our room, and our room had a spectacular view of the forest and nature. [SEP] U: What have you got on the west side, in the way of places to stay offering free wifi? S: I have two guesthouses and two hotels. Any preference? U: That doesn't matter to me but I do want to make sure I stay somewhere with free parking. S: I would recommend the Cambridge Belfry Hotel.  It is 4 stars and has excellent ratings.  Would you like more information? U: Yes, could you tell me the postcode and the price range? S: The Cambridge Belfry post code is cb236bw and it is fairly cheap compared to other hotels in the area. U: And do you happen to know if their rooms are nice and offer a great view as well? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, the rooms have balconies and very nice views. Would you like me to check on availability for the days you're travelling?

src_text: reviews of GONVILLE HOTEL: 1.First of all, the 24 hour front desk was super convenient for my late arrival, and the location was really good, right off the highway exit. 2.It was a bit of a pain getting to my meetings, as the place is not strategically located. reviews of UNIVERSITY ARMS HOTEL: 1.I stayed at the University Arms alone and I liked the location because it was easy to find nearby eateries. 2.When we arrived, we both noticed how the location of this hotel was very accommodating to our hectic schedule. 3.The only two good points during my stay were the good location, which was near the home of a friend whom I was in town to visit, and the onsite restaurant. 4.The positives are that the location was great and so was the view. [SEP] U: Is it true Cambridge has the best attractions?  We are looking for something unusual to do in the centre. S: There is teh museum of archeology and anthropology in the centre that is free of charge U: That's perfect. Thanks so much for your help. S: You're welcome. Is there anything else I can assist you with? U: Yes can you help me find a place to eat too? S: I'd be happy to help with your request, what area and what type of cuisine are you looking for? U: I would like chinese. S: I'm afraid our restaurant system is currently down.  Can I help you with something else at this time? U: i would like to go site seeing S: Other than the museum previously mentioned, I also suggest checking out the Cambridge University Botanic Gardens on Bateman Street. U: Ok, I think we've already established the attraction in the town centre. The next thing I need is a HOTEL in the centre that includes free parking. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The university Arms Hotel is said to have a really good location according to most guests. Would you like to stay there?

src_text: reviews of J RESTAURANT: 1.Both meals were very high quality so it definitely made up for the view. 2.Everything we got tasted amazing and we were very happy to take the leftovers home for lunch another day. 3.However, the food was pretty good so it was worth it. 4.While the food itself was lacking, the place almost made up for it between the lovely atmosphere and beautiful view from our table. 5.Food was alright. 6.We tried tofu, spring rolls, scrambled eggs, and the hot pot and it was all very good. reviews of DOJO NOODLE BAR: 1.The food is made from good stuff but it won't break the bank. 2.The portion of food was great and tha food was high quality. 3.Their Ma Po Tofu is to die for and the Dumplings are tender and juicy and mouthwatering. 4.I was shocked with how high quality everything was. 5.If you like Asian cuisine you'll love Dojo noodle bar. [SEP] U: Hello, I'd like to have dinner in the centre, is there anywhere that serves Afghan food? S: There is none available, do you have another type of food? U: Not really- what about a cheap restaurant? What are my choices? S: I have 15 cheap places to dine. Another food preference perhaps? U: Yes, that would be a good idea. Can you search for one that serves asian oriental food for me? Thanks a lot S: You have two options. Dojo Noodle Bar and J Restaurant both fit your specifications. Which of these would you like me to make a reservation for you at? U: Which has top notch ma po tofu/ S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Dojo Noodle Bar offers great Ma Po Tofu while the J Restaurant has mixed reviews in terms of food quality.

src_text: reviews of AVALON: 1.This location was extremely convenient because I was able to conduct business extremely nearby the location of my room. 2.I will say that the location was great for my recent family trip, because it was quite close to the sightseeing destinations that we planned to visit. [SEP] U: Good evening. I'm kind of in a situation. The hotel I had planned to stay was overbooked and I need to find me a room pretty quickly. Can you help? S: There are many hotels available, do you have any preferences to price or area? U: Not really. But it should be in the North. S: There are two hotels on the north end, the Ashley Hotel and the Lovell Lodge. Which would you like? U: I would prefer a guesthouse thats 4 star rated. Do either of those fit the bill? S: No, I'm afraid they're both two stars.  Would you like to try one of them anyway? U: Do they have free wifi at either of them? S: Yes both have free internet. Which one do you prefer? U: I would really like a four star guesthouse in the north area, I don't need parking. S: Okay, I've found several place that meet those requirements. I suggest the Avalon. Would you like me to make a reservation for you? U: Can you tell me if the hotel is located near attractions in town? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, the Avalon's location is extremely convenient, as it's placed in close proximity to many sightseeing destinations.

src_text: reviews of AVALON: 1.The slow Wi-Fi and noisy room made work a bit difficult. 2.I stayed in my room sometimes to catch up on a few work projects and the internet speed was amazing. 3.The internet helped me catch up with some work, as it was fast. FAQs of AVALON: 1.You can use WiFi at 10 GBP per day here. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a hotel in the north part of town with free wifi. S: There are no hotels in that area with free wifi, can I look up a different area or guesthouse? U: Yes, I'd like a place in the north with a 4 star rating including free wifi please. S: I'm sorry that area doesn't have anything matching those criteria. May I try another area? U: Is there a guesthouse? S: Yes, the Avalon is exactly what you're looking for. It offers internet (but no parking). Would you like me to book a room for you? U: Can you first tell me whether the Avalon has excellent Wi-Fi? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, I can do that. Avalon offers Wi-Fi for 10 GBP per day. Two guests said it was fast enough to allow them to work. One said it was slow.

src_text: reviews of LIMEHOUSE: 1.Free parking was an amazing perk, and I think overall I got a great value for the money. 2.Limehouse is a VERY overpriced hotel, I'm sad to say. 3.For one solo person, the price was simply too high. 4.That said, I have to give it points for being a quiet hotel with comfy beds, but if you favor saving money, I would look elsewhere! [SEP] U: I am looking for some restaurant recommendations. S: Do you have a cuisine or area in mind? U: I would like some Middle Eastern food, preferably in the cheap price range. I'd also like to be in the Centre. S: I didn't find anything within that range.  Would you be willing to increase the price or go outside of the city centre? U: No, not really.  How about Indian food instead of Middle Eastern? S: There are three Indian food restaurants that fit your request. They are Kohinoor, The Gandhi, and Mahal of Cambridge. Would like to make a booking at one of them? U: No just the address, postcode and phone number of the one you recommend. S: I recommend the Gandhi whose phone number is 01223353942 and they are located at 72 Regent Street City Centre with post code cb21db. May I help you with anything else? U: I also need a place to stay. I need somewhere that is a guesthouse and includes free parking. S: There are 21 guest houses that meet your specifications. Tell me about some of your other preferences?  What area of town are you interested in? U: Area does not matter but something with 4 stars. S: How about the limehouse? U: Is this place a good value for the money? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: According to previous guests of the Limehouse, if you're looking to save money, they recommend booking elsewhere where the value is better.

src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.The location was extremely silent and I found that I was not disturbed during my time on this trip. 2.Our room was a bit noisy as we could hear the televisions nearby. 3.Also, due to the popularity of this place, it is quite noisy. 4.We didn't like how much traffic there was by the bed and breakfast. 5.We would consider staying there again on a less busy weekend in hopes that the traffic noise wouldn't be so bad. 6.The walls were also very thin and you could hear the people staying in the room next to you. 7.The B&B is pretty quiet and well appointed, and the staff goes out of their way to be friendly. 8.It was very noisy while we were trying to sleep. [SEP] U: I have a particular attraction I want to see, can you help? S: Yes can you give me the name of it? U: Milton Country Park S: It's a free park on the north side of town. You can find it at milton country park, milton. U: Could I get the phone number for that? S: the phone number is 01223420060. anything else? U: Can I get the address for Milton County Park and the entrance fee? I would also like to look for a cheap hotel in the centre with free wifi. S: There is no entrance fee to the park. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: While the Alexander Bed and Breakfast is generally regarded as silent, on occasion one can be disrupted by exterior noise.

src_text: reviews of HAMILTON LODGE: 1.The location was difficult to find, not much around there and the room was on the small side, despite the perks 2.Not it's fault about the location, but I'd love some luggage storage. 3.I was in town for a friend's wedding and the Hamilton Lodge was convenient enough but it is not near any public transportation. 4.I mean, the location was mediocre and there was no luggage storage, but whatever. 5.The price is steep and not good at all, but the location makes it very convenient and the views in the rooms were very nice. reviews of BRIDGE GUEST HOUSE: 1.While the location was kind of mediocre and not the best, the very friendly staff made up for it. 2.Easy access to everything. 3.I liked the location, which was super convenient to the highway. 4.It was a bit farther away from the attractions and public transportation than I liked. 5.We stayed here with our kids and one of the good things about this place is they are very kid friendly, and the location is very close to most of the things we needed nearby. 6.The location is convenient and the breakfast was good which was given as I arrived at morning. 7.Not crazy about the location though. 8.So it's in a good location. reviews of HOBSONS HOUSE: 1.Hobsons House did not disappoint in that aspect. 2.The location is exceptional and the breakfast options were fantastic. src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.The location was extremely silent and I found that I was not disturbed during my time on this trip. 2.Our room was a bit noisy as we could hear the televisions nearby. 3.Also, due to the popularity of this place, it is quite noisy. 4.We didn't like how much traffic there was by the bed and breakfast. 5.We would consider staying there again on a less busy weekend in hopes that the traffic noise wouldn't be so bad. 6.The walls were also very thin and you could hear the people staying in the room next to you. 7.The B&B is pretty quiet and well appointed, and the staff goes out of their way to be friendly. 8.It was very noisy while we were trying to sleep. U: Please make the reservation for 2 people at 8pm tonight. S: Okay, I can do that.  What day would you like it for? U: Tuedsday and book it for me please S: Booking was successful. The table will be reserved for 15 minutes.Reference number is : B7BI0QK1. U: That's great! Now I need info on a hotel called Avalon. S: Sure, that is a great 4 star guesthouse at 62 Gilbert Road.  Would you like me to make a reservation for you? U: I want to make sure the bathrooms there are clean. S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The bathroom are very clean upon check up and the room is also clean and it is definitely good value for your money.

src_text: reviews of THE NIRALA: 1.The location could not be better: right in the heart of the city with excellent views after the sun goes down. 2.They also have a modest drinks menu with some affordable prices, but I was more interested in the beautiful view from my window seat, which allowed me to watch the sun setting as I dined. 3.The only places they can use some improvement in is giving it all a better view which might also bring up the atmosphere as well 4.I have to say, the service was excellent, and the views from the restaurant can't be beat. [SEP] U: I am looking to stay at a 4 star rated place in the moderate price range. S: What area would you like it to be in? U: I don't have a preference for what area, I do however want free WiFi. I would also like to stay in a guesthouse. S: Then may I suggest the a and b guest house? U: yes can you book it for 7 people and 3 nights starting from thursday ? S: The guesthouse is located on the east side at 124 tenison road. I am trying to book it but the system must be busy. I'll try again in a minute. U: Please try again S: Booking was successful your ref number is 1R8GSLHI, anything else today? U: Yes, I'd like to find an Indian restaurant in the north please. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Not all seats have a view, but those that do have an amazing one. Shall I request a view table with your reservation?

src_text: reviews of LOVELL LODGE: 1.The view was amazing and I found myself feeling peaceful and relaxed despite being there on business. [SEP] U: Can you help me find a train for Wednesday, heading into Cambridge? S: I have five trains that meet your criteria. U: Oh wait, before booking I would like to know what the arrival time and travel time is on that train. S: It will arrive by 19:07.  Do you need tickets? U: I need to know the travel time before booking. S: the travel time is 88 minutes. U: Thanks, I actually don't want to book just yet. I do need a place to stay though. Would you like me to make reservations for one of these? U: I like the sound of the Lovell Lodge. S: Great, would you like me to book it for you? U: Does this hotel offer rooms with a good view? S: <extra_id_0>

src_text: reviews of AUTUMN HOUSE: 1.It was hidden in the edge of a quiet suburb and it was so peaceful we all loved it. 2.The room is big and nice and quiet. 3.It's a quiet area, but it's walking distance to the shops downtown and public transportation is super close. [SEP] U: Is there a place on the east side of town with free parking? S: There are 6 hotels on the east side with free parking. Do you have a price preference? U: I'd like it to be somewhere that's really cheap, and I'd really prefer a guesthouse if one is available. S: How about the Autumn House, it is a guesthouse that is cheap in the east? U: Is that a quiet location? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Autumn House establishment is located in a nice, quiet suburb which is within walking distance of the downtown area and public transportation.

src_text: reviews of DA VINCI PIZZERIA: 1.If you can get past the terrible location of Da Vinci Pizzeria, which feels like it's out in the middle of nowhere, it's a great place not only for pizza, but a really wide selection of Italian food options. 2.Da Vinci Pizzeria is one placed I checked out recently that has a nice view in a good location, not far from most attractions locally. 3.The food was of good quality ,service and portion, you had a nice view but i didn't like Mediocre location 4.Down side is my girlfriend would not like the place due to no vegetarian options and poor location with traffic piling up during peak hours. 5.Boy, was I impressed with the lovely views from my table and with the ideal, downtown location. [SEP] U: I am interested in a restaurant located in the north part of town that specializes in Indonesian food, please. S: There are no restaurants serving Indonesian food in the north part of town. Would you like me to look in another part of town? U: what about italian food? S: Da Vinci Pizzeria is a restaurant serving Italian food in the north part of town. Would you like any additional information? U: Can you let me know whether Da Vinci Pizzeria is close by to many other different things to do? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Many people complain about the location of Da Vinci Pizzeria, but others seem to like it, and say that it's not far from attractions.

src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.The location was extremely silent and I found that I was not disturbed during my time on this trip. 2.Our room was a bit noisy as we could hear the televisions nearby. 3.Also, due to the popularity of this place, it is quite noisy. 4.We didn't like how much traffic there was by the bed and breakfast. 5.We would consider staying there again on a less busy weekend in hopes that the traffic noise wouldn't be so bad. 6.The walls were also very thin and you could hear the people staying in the room next to you. 7.The B&B is pretty quiet and well appointed, and the staff goes out of their way to be friendly. 8.It was very noisy while we were trying to sleep. [SEP] U: I want to find a guesthouse with free parking included. Can you help? S: There are 21 guesthouses that have parking available. Is there a certain price range or part of the city you are interested in? U: I would really like something expensive. S: Unfortunately, I can't find any that are expensive. Let's try a different price range. U: Alright, let's try for a cheap hotel. S: Do you want a cheap hotel or a cheap guesthouse? U: I meant a cheap guesthouse with free wifi. S: How about Alexander Bed and Breakfast? U: Is it in a quiet location? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Most people that stay at Alexander Bed and Breakfast find it to be quite noisy, but a couple people said it was quiet for them. Would you like to book it anyway?

src_text: reviews of THE LENSFIELD HOTEL: 1.I was on business in the area, and it was great to have a nice place to sleep quietly at night. 2.My room was very quiet and I think the price was right. 3.The location and guests were just so noisy that it really ruined our stay. 4.It made sleeping very easy! 5.Also, it was very quiet and peaceful. 6.The place is very quiet which was good for me and my family, we dont like a lot of noise. 7.However, it was pretty hard to appreciate the great view with the constant noise. 8.Our stay was very quiet. S: TR3293 will arrive by 9:35. Would you like to book a seat? U: Can you book it for me and get a reference number ? S: How many tickets do you need? U: I need 3 tickets. S: Booking was successful, the total fee is 52.8 GBP payable at the station .Reference number is : 4CSMUT8M.what else do i do for you? U: Yes, I'd like to stay at The Lensfield Hotel once we get to town for 4 nights. S: What day would you like to begin your stay? And for how many guests? U: Is the Lensfield Hotel in a quiet place? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Most of the guests at the Lensfield hotel is quiet, but some other guests have said that the location is quite noisy.

src_text: reviews of CITYROOMZ: 1.When we first entered the room we were blown away by the views that can be seen, and the bathroom was especially clean. 2.I am actually really missing that view right about now. 3.We actually heard that the views were good, and we weren't disappointed. 4.It really does have a great view, and the staff made us feel very welcome. src_text: FAQs of LA MIMOSA: 1.La Mimosa does serve alcohol. reviews of LA MIMOSA: 1.They also have an extensive menu of non-alcoholic drink options to choose from, and those prices are much more wallet-friendly! 2.The drinks are reasonably priced, I drank a beer and they have a great selection of craft beers, that came cold and was $4 a pint for the citrus IPA. 3.Don't go to La Mimosa for the drinks, because your wallet will be much lighter when you leave! 4.The food was a bit pricey but the drink specials made up for that. [SEP] U: I would like a mediterranean restaurant, and I don't care what part of town it is in. S: Are you looking for something more or less expensive? U: The price range does not matter. S: la mimosa is a nice Mediterranean restaurant in the centre. U: Is the beer a good value? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: La Mimosa does serve alcoholic beverages. They have a selection of craft beers that are $4 a pint for the citrus IPA.

src_text: reviews of THE CAMBRIDGE BELFRY: 1.One of the best things about the hotel is the view of the mountains from the balcony. 2.The staff was polite they took out luggage to our room, and our room had a spectacular view of the forest and nature. src_text: reviews of BRIDGE GUEST HOUSE: 1.There isn't any concierge service or anything, and the staff was quite unprofessional when it came down to talking with them, but overall we had a good experience here. 2.While the location was kind of mediocre and not the best, the very friendly staff made up for it. 3.Still though, the staff was pretty darn friendly and I liked that it had free Wi-Fi so it wasn't too bad. 4.Immediately upon my arrival, I was treated disrespectfully by the staff. src_text: reviews of GONVILLE HOTEL: 1.I loved the 24 hour service at the front desk and the view was impeccable! 2.Our room had an excellent view of the surrounding sights and attractions. 3.It was a really stunning view to wake up to every morning, and romantic to look at in the evenings. [SEP] U: Hi, I'm looking for information about places to go in the centre of town. S: Okay! There are 44 attractions in the Centre part of town. What type of attraction would you like to visit? U: What do you recommend? I will need the address and attraction type of what you recommend. S: cambridge university botanic gardens is a park in the centre of town. Their address is bateman street U: What type of attraction is that? S: It is a park, with emphasis on plants.  There are many other types of attractions as well, such as museums. U: Okay, great. I'll also need a place to stay. I'd like for it to have free parking and be expensive. S: we have a variety, in what area do u prefer? U: I'm not familiar with the areas of town, but I'd really like a 3 star guesthouse. S: We have three 3-star guesthouses with free parking, but they're moderately priced and you wanted something a bit pricier. Do you think one of these would work? U: Are there any hotels with 3 stars, free wifi, free parking, and expensive? S: You might be interested in the Gonville Hotel in the centre of town.  It's address is Gonville Place.  Would you like me to reserve you a room? U: Does this place have a nice view? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Gonville Hotel provides an excellent view of the surrounding sights and attractions. Guests have called it "stunning" and "impeccable".

src_text: reviews of CHIQUITO RESTAURANT BAR: 1.My waiter, Diego, was quite pleasant and offered friendly, world-class service. 2.Some people may find that they do have extensive options for vegetarians and the service was actually really good, so it wasn't all bad. 3.I had the Chilaquiles, she had the mole and we both agreed it was the some of the best Mexican food ever not to mention it was all very reasonably priced with superb service to go along with it. src_text: reviews of CITY STOP RESTAURANT: 1.While the location is wonderful, right in the heart of the city, and their specialty drinks are well-prepared and tasty, those factors just cannot overcome the really mediocre quality of the food and how incredibly overpriced it is. 2.The drinks were tasty and a good value. 3.The one negative I'll give the place is that their interior decor doesn't match their vibe very well, and it was pretty bland and boring, but the food and drink quality more than made up for it. 4.The food and drinks were affordable. 5.Although we weren't planning on drinking, we were impressed by their drinks menu and we ended up trying a few different cocktails and lagers, which worked out well because their non-alcoholic drink menu is pretty limited. 6.I was however suprised about how low of quality the drinks were. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: According to the reviews that I have on hand for that location, they do serve alcohol. The quality has been rated anywhere from low to good, and the drinks were rated tasty, affordable and good value.

src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.The location was extremely silent and I found that I was not disturbed during my time on this trip. 2.Our room was a bit noisy as we could hear the televisions nearby. 3.Also, due to the popularity of this place, it is quite noisy. 4.We didn't like how much traffic there was by the bed and breakfast. 5.We would consider staying there again on a less busy weekend in hopes that the traffic noise wouldn't be so bad. 6.The walls were also very thin and you could hear the people staying in the room next to you. 7.The B&B is pretty quiet and well appointed, and the staff goes out of their way to be friendly. 8.It was very noisy while we were trying to sleep. src_text: reviews of GOLDEN HOUSE: 1.Truly, the only things that they have going for them are a fantastic location, which affords them a lot of foot traffic, and the wonderful views from their window seats. 2.The restaurant also has a nice view so you can enjoy yourself before your food is served. 3.We had a super good view from the place as well. 4.My only critiques are that there were no gluten free choices on the menu, and the view from our table was poor. reviews of RICE HOUSE: 1.I liked the location and the view. 2.We were able to have an excellent view of the business district. 3.The only downside is the pretty mediocre atmosphere of the restaurant, so don't go expecting to see great views or ambiance. 4.The view of the skyline was spectacular, as were the high quality food options. 5.The view from the restaurant was just mediocre. reviews of CHARLIE CHAN: 1.The only downside was the window by my table looked into the parking lot, which wasn't great. 2.The restaurant had a nice view that we enjoyed very much. 3.The view is mediocre due to the restaurant being located in a strip mall, but that is about the only bad thing I have to say about this restaurant. 4.Also, the view from inside is limited and not that attractive. 5.The only issues we had was that it was in a bad part of town, there wasn't any good parking nearby, and there wasn't any view to look at. 6.I disliked the Mediocre view and the food variety was a huge letdown. src_text: reviews of ANATOLIA: 1.They have this Meze that was pretty decent, and the other foods I tried were just OK. Portions were tiny though, but it had a nice view in a good location. 2.The portions were kind of small but I guess that helps with portion control! 3.I was overall very impressed with both the quality and the portions, as I had enough for a full meal and was still able to take enough home for leftovers the next day. 4.But the portions were so stupidly small, and the quality was seriously mediocre. 5.Between us we ordered Gozleme, Baklava, Borek, and Ayran, all of which were of great quality and were in large portions. 6.The portions were generous and the prices were fair. 7.However, the portion sizes were quite small, and we were disappointed in the very limited selection of non-alcoholic drink options for the kids in our group. reviews of EFES RESTAURANT: 1.I had to ask for a to-go box, because I could not finish it, even though I really wanted to! 2.I ordered the Gozleme and they had it stacked so high it almost fell over on the plate. 3.All-in-all, a great dining experience: the portion sizes were very good, and the prices were reasonable (under $20 for each of us) for top-notch quality foods and drinks. 4.I was hungry so it was good that the food portions were big. src_text: reviews of AUTUMN HOUSE: 1.It's a quiet area, but it's walking distance to the shops downtown and public transportation is super close. 2.The room is big and nice and quiet. 3.It was hidden in the edge of a quiet suburb and it was so peaceful we all loved it. reviews of LEVERTON HOUSE: 1.Upon arrival, it was extremely disruptive to have a lot of loud noises going on throughout the building all throughout our trip. 2.So, I guess I don't mind the location since the tradeoff was less noise. 3.My family stayed at the Leverton House recently and it was so noisy. 4.Between the noise from other guests and construction outside, we could barely even hear the television when we watched movies at night. 5.That being said, the location and the building was very quiet. 6.My kids make enough of it, but this place made my family sound like quiet little mice. 7.It was quiet, had a comfortable bed... and a good location. src_text: reviews of THE CAMBRIDGE BELFRY: 1.One of the best things about the hotel is the view of the mountains from the balcony. 2.The staff was polite they took out luggage to our room, and our room had a spectacular view of the forest and nature. [SEP] U: I am looking for a place that has multiple sports in the centre of town. Do you have any suggestions? S: So sorry we have no multiple sports in the centre of town. U: That sounds good, I need the address, phone number and postcode. S: The address is regent street postcode cb21dq and the phone is 01223334860. U: Great, that's helpful, thanks. src_text: reviews of NANDOS: 1.I got a very affordable beer which was of high quality. 2.Very affordable too. 3.First of all, the food and drinks weren't that good at all, and the drinks were expensive. 4.Each of us also ordered a drink, because their non-alcoholic drink options are very limited, and while they were well-prepared and tasty, we thought that they were overpriced and we wouldn't bother getting drinks there again. 5.We shared some wine and it costs more than the food, which itself is reasonable. FAQs of NANDOS: 1.Nando's has alcohol drinks. [SEP] U: i'm looking for rosa's bed and breakfast S: Rosa's Bed and Breakfast is a cheap 4 star guesthouse in the South area of town. Would you like any more information? U: No, that's great, thank you. Could you reserve rooms there for 3 people for 3 nights starting Thursday? S: Let me look and see if I can find you a room for three people for three nights starting on Thursday. U: If that doesn't work, please try for Sunday. S: You are all booked. Reference number is 69V5E4KX. U: Are you aware of any Scottish restaurants in the south? S: No I am sorry there no Scottish restaurants available in the South.  Would like to try another area? U: No, what type of cheap restaurants are there? S: In the south there are 2 cheap restaurants. One is Chinese and the othe is Portuguese. U: I prefer the portuguese restaurant. S: Nandos is a very popular restaurant serving portuguese food in the south area of town in the cheap price range. Would you like more information or to book? U: is the place with good beer for the price? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The reviews are mixed, some people said that the beer was high-quality, some people said that they were affordable, and other people said that the drinks were not good and they were expensive.

src_text: FAQs of CITY CENTRE NORTH B AND B: 1.The cost to use WiFi at City Centre North B and B is 8 GBP per day. reviews of CITY CENTRE NORTH B AND B: 1.The provided Internet connection was extremely fast and stable. FAQs of EL SHADDAI: 1.WiFi is 10 GBP/Day at El Shaddai. reviews of EL SHADDAI: 1.As I needed to take care of some business well at this location, the provided Internet was more than adequate. 2.I was able to use my laptop with the fast Wi-Fi. S: The only option we have is the TR6595 which leaves at 19:00. Does thatwork for you? U: Yes, please book it for 5 people. S: Your reference number is STVHW0DA. S: It appears they about the same price. U: Which one has a better hi-speed Wi-Fi connectivity ? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Both the El Shaddai and the City Centre North B and B have very good stable connection that is fast. The El Shaddai charges 10 GBP/Day and the City Centre charges 8 GBP/day.

src_text: reviews of COCUM: 1.When arriving I was promptly seated and given a menu. 2.The only downside was the poor service time. 3.Cocum had great service which was really important to me as I was dining with the family in tow. 4.Only complaints are that the service was a bit lacking, and they don't have any gluten-free options. 5.The staff is fantastic and they always greet you with a smile. [SEP] U: I'm looking for an Indian restaurant in the west end of Cambridge. S: There are 6 results for Indian restaurants in the west, what price range are you looking for? U: I do not have a preference, so surprise me! S: I recommend cocum as they are good. U: I need a place with great service. S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Guests had differing experiences with the service. Some praised it and said it was great, but others said that the service was a downside.

src_text: reviews of UNIVERSITY ARMS HOTEL: 1.The negatives is that the bathroom wasn't that clean when we first arrived and that the beds could've been more comfortable. 2.The view from my room was really picturesque, and the bed offered a really comfortable night of sleep. [SEP] U: Hi, can you help me with some place to visit while I am in town?  I am in the planning stages, so I don't know what is available. S: We have 79 attractions in the area, any preferences on type or location? U: I need something in the west. S: i have booked you  clare hall U: what? that's not what i wanted. S: We can cancel that no worries.  What type of attraction would you like? U: Any attraction in the west is fine.  Im new to the area, so anything that you recommend.  I'll need to phoen and address of whatever you select. S: I'd like to suggest Whale of a Time, a wonderful entertainment venue. The phone number is, 01954781018, the address is, unit 8, viking way, bar hill. U: I need to book a 5 stars hotel with free wifi. If there is not 5 stars, a hotel of 4 starts is ok. S: I am sorry, there are no 5 star hotels available but may I recommend University Arms Hotel which is 4 stars and located in the centre of town? U: If it has free wifi, then that is great. You can give me their phone number. S: Yes, university arms hotel does include internet. Their phone number is 01223351241. Is there anything else I can do for your? U: Does the place have a comftorable bed? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The University Arms Hotel offers beds that have mixed reviews by its guests with views ranging from comfortable to unappealing.

src_text: reviews of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.We stayed at the Acorn guest house and I loved the view. 2.Outside of the balcony of my room, I found that the exquisite view was unlike anything I've ever seen before. 3.The wi-fi was super fast though and the room provided a great view. 4.I also enjoyed the great view as that helped me take a moment to enjoy some peace and quiet. 5.We didn't care so much if it had other things, but a great view and good location, were not things we were going to give a little on. [SEP] U: I would like to stay in a guesthouse that has free parking while I'm in Cambridge. Thanks. S: I have 21 options for you. What area would you like to stay in? U: It can be anywhere as long as it has a 4 star rating. S: That narrows it down to 16. Do you care about the price? U: I would like a moderate price range. S: There are nine guesthouses what part of town would you like U: I'm not concerned with the area - can you recommend a nice place that fits with what I'm looking for? S: I think you would like the acorn guesthouse.  Would you like me to book a room? U: Do the rooms there have good views? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, the rooms at the Acorn Guest House agree that the views from the balcony are exquisite and worth the cost.

src_text: reviews of GRAFFITI: 1.The other upside is the interior decor. [SEP] U: Hi, I am traveling to Cambridge and am excited to see some local tourist attractions.  I really need help with a restaurant though. S: We have more than 100 restaurants all over town. May I ask if you have a certain price range you prefer to stay within? U: Yes, I in am interested in an expensive restaurant. Thanks! S: Is there a certain area you would like? U: Are there any restaurants serving South African cuisine? trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Graffiti's interior decor is considered to be an upside to the restaurant. Do you want to make a reservation?

src_text: reviews of ERAINA: 1.The restaurant is in a really nice location, which makes it wonderful for a date night out on the town. 2.Great view from the downtown location though, so all-in-all it made for a great date night. 3.On the other hand, it's in a great spot in my favorite part of town and the service was fast and friendly. 4.The location of the restaurant could be better, because it's kind of in the middle of nowhere, but that's a small gripe. [SEP] U: need a place to eat european food, expensive too. S: We have several options that would meet your criteria, is there a specific area you are looking for? U: Yes, the centre of town please. S: Okay, I'd recommend eraina. It's a fantastic place at Free School Lane City Centre. Would you like to try it? U: Is the location nice? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The location has just a few mixed reviews, but most consider it to be located in a nice part of downtown.

src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.The location was extremely silent and I found that I was not disturbed during my time on this trip. 2.Our room was a bit noisy as we could hear the televisions nearby. 3.Also, due to the popularity of this place, it is quite noisy. 4.We didn't like how much traffic there was by the bed and breakfast. 5.We would consider staying there again on a less busy weekend in hopes that the traffic noise wouldn't be so bad. 6.The walls were also very thin and you could hear the people staying in the room next to you. 7.The B&B is pretty quiet and well appointed, and the staff goes out of their way to be friendly. 8.It was very noisy while we were trying to sleep. [SEP] U: i am looking for a place to stay. The hotel doesn't need to include internet and should include free parking. S: Do you have any other constraints, such as location or price range? U: The location and price range don't matter to me. I want a guesthouse with 4 stars. S: We still have a lot of great options to choose from. Can I recommend the Alexander Bed and Breakfast in the centre of town? U: Is this a quiet and peaceful location?  That's what I like. S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: It depends on the dates and days of the visits. It's a popular place and can get really noisy with all the guests and traffic. Most guests don't like the noisiness while others said their stay was quiet and relaxing. Would you like to know more about them?

src_text: reviews of WARKWORTH HOUSE: 1.The room and hotel had a fast wifi which was useful and not aggravatingly slow like we've all seen, the room was large and I liked that too. 2.When I needed to use the Internet, I found that the wireless Internet was extremely quick and more than enough for my business needs. 3.The Warkworth House has good Wi-Fi which I used a lot because I travelled alone. 4.My work called me up and needed me to go on a business trip, so I went here, and oh boy I must say they have really good breakfast options and the WiFi was super fast. FAQs of WARKWORTH HOUSE: 1.There is wifi at Warkworth House. 2.Warkworth House offers free WiFi. [SEP] U: Hi.  Have you heard of a hotel called Warkworth House? S: Yes ma'am. I have the Warkworth House guesthouse on Warkworth Terrace, with is the east section of the city. Can I help book a reservation for you? U: Can I get the price range on it? S: Warkworth House falls in the moderate price range. Would you like me to book a room for you? U: Is the internet connection reliable? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, the internet is apparently quite fast and guests found it to be good. It is also included with your room.

src_text: reviews of ALLENBELL: 1.The facilities, especially the bathroom were super-clean and sanitary. 2.During my recent stay at ALLENBELL with your family, I was impressed by the big room with a clean bathroom. [SEP] U: I am looking for information in Cambridge.  I need a place to dine. S: Sure, do you have a type of food you are wanting? U: Crossover food would be perfect. S: Unfortunately, there aren't any crossover restaurants in Cambridge. Is there something else you'd like to try? U: Is there a gastropub in Centre? S: Yes, I have two that are expensive and one that is moderately priced. Do you have a preference? U: Let's go with the moderately priced option. Can I please have the phone number? S: In the moderate price range, I have one place. It's called the Cow Pizza Kitchen and Bar. It's located on Corn Exchange Street. Do you need a reservation? U: Not right now, but I am looking for a place to stay. Are there any 5-star accommodations in Cambridge? S: I'm sorry, there are no 5-star accommodations anywhere in Cambridge.  There are many 4-star options.  Would you like to try one of those? U: Do you have one with free parking S: Yes the allenbell does. U: Is the allenbell a guesthouse? S: Yes, it is a guesthouse.  It's located at 517a Coldham Lane.  Would you like me to book this for you? U: Does this place have clean bathrooms in it? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, the Allenbell does a great job maintaining its rooms and bathrooms. Can I check on room availability for you?

src_text: reviews of TRAVELLERS REST: 1.The service was definitely also lacking with staff chatting away and ignoring us when we needed something. 2.They were rude and took their time to come over when you needed them to fill a drink or the order was wrong sometimes. 3.Service was spectacular. 4.The waitress we had was awesome and served us quickly. 5.They do give you good sized food dishes but the service itself was not great. 6.My family and I enjoyed our meal and the server was very helpful and kind. reviews of GRAFFITI: 1.Their beers were ok too and service was super friendly and nice. 2.The price and quality of food were off the charts, and service was great as well. 3.Initially I was put off by the high prices on the menu but the great service made up for it. 4.I enjoyed my time here just for the service and atmosphere. [SEP] U: Can you help me find a expensive restaurant in the west? S: Sure, what type of food are you hoping for? U: It's our anniversary and my wife loves british food. I want it to be special, so maybe something expensive. S: You have two choices:the Graffiti or the Travellers Rest. Shall I book a table at one of them for you? U: Which one is known more for having the best of excellent service? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The service at the Graffiti is seen as being great, while that provided at the Travellers Rest was equally spectacular with few exceptions.

src_text: reviews of FITZBILLIES RESTAURANT: 1.The service was mindblowingly good with a supreme example of some of the best high quality food. 2.We seated ourselves in the busy dining room, as there was no host. 3.Despite the great spot, the service was very slow and the drinks were average at best. 4.But when our food came to the table - which was delivered by a server who seemed like she'd rather be anywhere else than the restaurant - we all found it to be bland and uninspiring in quality. 5.It was a really pleasant place for a date since the service was great. 6.You'll always be greeted by a friendly staff and a wide variety of drink options as well as the best British cuisine on offer. 7.I don't know if I'd come here again because of the lousy service. 8.The only problem was how small the portions were and I had to ask for my server several times before she would come bring me condiments. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a restaurant that serves canapes food. Expensive range should do it. S: Unfortunately there are no canapes restaurants. U: hmmm. Can you check again? it should be in the centre. S: I am sorry but there are no restaurants that fit that criteria in the centre. U: Could you try a restaurant that serves british food instead? S: Yes, we have three British restaurants in the central area.  Might I recommend fitzbillies restaurant? U: Are they known for having great service? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Some customers have really liked and enjoyed the service that they recieved at Fitzbillies Restaurant, however there are some customers who think that the service is terrible and that the servers act like they do not want to be there and have to be asked for things multiple times.

src_text: reviews of CLOWNS CAFE: 1.Additionally, I was happy to see that their menu offers a wide range of vegetarian-friendly options, and in addition to the usual wines and specialty drinks you find at Italian restaurants, they also have a generous non-alcoholic drink menu as well. 2.Once I was seated I saw that there was a pretty decent soft drink menu with all the Pepsi products I could think of. src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.The location was extremely silent and I found that I was not disturbed during my time on this trip. 2.Our room was a bit noisy as we could hear the televisions nearby. 3.Also, due to the popularity of this place, it is quite noisy. 4.We didn't like how much traffic there was by the bed and breakfast. 5.We would consider staying there again on a less busy weekend in hopes that the traffic noise wouldn't be so bad. 6.The walls were also very thin and you could hear the people staying in the room next to you. 7.The B&B is pretty quiet and well appointed, and the staff goes out of their way to be friendly. 8.It was very noisy while we were trying to sleep. src_text: reviews of RESTAURANT ALIMENTUM: 1.The food did come in big portions so I was able to eat leftovers for days. 2.I had it with some naan and rice, and there was plenty of food even for two. 3.I only wish each portion had been bigger! 4.It was the size of a large plate and came with fresh fruit and other toppings so I could choose what I wanted on it. 5.You get a large portion and the food is good. 6.I paired the quiche with their waffle was gigantic. 7.We also liked the complimentary salads, which turned out to be necessary because the portion sizes are a little small. src_text: reviews of RESTAURANT TWO TWO: 1.The view is good and we enjoyed the drink menu. 2.We were also amazed to find that the drinks were not as pricey as some other restaurants in the area. 3.Compared to the price of the food I thought the drinks should have been similarly priced. 4.The quality of the food is impeccable, and the wine tastes sublime. 5.The only flaw was that the drinks cost too much. 6.You simply MUST try the Escargots de Bourgogne with the house Chardonnay, because they will blow your mind. 7.For drinkers we settled on Sauvignon Blanc. 8.My husband and I were excited to see that they had a great drink menu available. 9.The food had good quality and good drink price and Various gluten-free options, but i disliked your Mediocre indoor d√©cor Mediocre view FAQs of RESTAURANT TWO TWO: 1.Yes, this restaurant has a Wine and Drinks List. src_text: reviews of BACKSTREET BISTRO: 1.It's a nice location and they a terrific variety of drink options. 2.The restaurant has a nice location and it is close to the main streets. 3.The restaurant is in a good location so they just have to improve their food quality. 4.Lots of drinks to choose from, but it's out of the way from most places so you kind of just...have to drive there, if that makes sense. reviews of THE SLUG AND LETTUCE: 1.It was in a great location and right away we were greeted by a friendly host, who welcomed us to our seat. 2.I'd probably come back again to try their drinks, because their drink menu seemed to be pretty extensive, and I like how convenient the location is to my home. src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.The location was extremely silent and I found that I was not disturbed during my time on this trip. 2.Our room was a bit noisy as we could hear the televisions nearby. 3.Also, due to the popularity of this place, it is quite noisy. 4.We didn't like how much traffic there was by the bed and breakfast. 5.We would consider staying there again on a less busy weekend in hopes that the traffic noise wouldn't be so bad. 6.The walls were also very thin and you could hear the people staying in the room next to you. 7.The B&B is pretty quiet and well appointed, and the staff goes out of their way to be friendly. 8.It was very noisy while we were trying to sleep. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Alexander Bed and Breakfast is in a high traffic area so at times it is very busy and noisy. The slower times it is very peaceful and quiet and the staff go out of their way to assist you with your needs.

src_text: reviews of STAZIONE RESTAURANT AND COFFEE BAR: 1.I like the location as it is convenient and the view is nice. 2.It was also a nice place to be because we could just chat while enjoying the view. 3.It did have a good view though so we felt comfortable. reviews of CLOWNS CAFE: 1.Luckily the view was amazing. 2.The views from the restaurant are nothing to speak of, because they don't have many windows and there's not much to see, but the quality of their food is stellar and that more than makes up for it. 3.The views they offer are also unmatched. reviews of CAFFE UNO: 1.My family and I also had a great night just talking since the view was nice and the atmosphere was pleasant. 2.The restaurant does have a great view, so that helped provide some romantic ambiance, and the outdoor dining option was great because it gave us some privacy away from the crowd. 3.Things I really liked about the restaurant was the view, great service and the portion size. 4.The drinks are cheap during happy hour though and the view from the patio is refreshing. reviews of DON PASQUALE PIZZERIA: 1.This wouldn't be a nice place for a date because of terrible service and the terrible view of the parking lot. 2.It was also pretty romantic since the view was nice. 3.Don Pasquale Pizzeria has a lovely view of the river, and I thought it would make for a very romantic date night spot with my boyfriend. 4.While I do like the location, there isn't much of a view. 5.We both agree that the location is great, only 10 minutes from our home, but in my opinion the place doesn't have great views at all, so dining outside is a lackluster experience. [SEP] U: I would like to go to an expensive Italian restaurant for dinner. S: which area of town are you interested in dining in? U: The centre is my preference.  Thank you. S: Sure, stazione restaurant and coffee bar, clowns cafe, don pasquale pizzeria, cafe uno. U: Which one of them would have the nicest view? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Both Stazione Restaurant and Caffe Uno seem to have nice views. Opinions on the views at Clowns Cafe and Don Pasquale Pizzeria are more mixed.

src_text: reviews of ASK RESTAURANT: 1.If you visit Ask Restaurant, don't plan to "Ask" your server for anything special like a drink refill or extra cutlery, because they won't go out of their way to be friendly or helpful when attending to your table. 2.Honestly, I would recommend getting take out from Ask Restaurant, that way you get all the benefits of a delicious meal without the subpar service. 3.We all liked the service and portions given to us. 4.The service was great and so were the drinks. 5.The prices were a little higher than I would like for the portion sizes, and I feel like the server got too much into schmoozing with the people a few tables over to give us the attention we needed, so that could be worked on. 6.I was seen right away. 7.Some things I enjoyed was the spectacular service. 8.But if you can get past the mediocre service, this place offers some really high quality dishes with a beautiful atmosphere featuring upscale decor. [SEP] U: I would like a cheap restaurant. S: There are ten cheap restaurants in the city; do you have a preference of area or type of cuisine? U: I don't care. S: Ask is a nice place, that is in the cheap price range. Is there anything else I can help you with? U: Do they have friendly and responsive staff members? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: It seems that the staff quality can vary from night to night, unfortunately. Would you like me to find another option?

src_text: reviews of THE GOLDEN CURRY: 1.They have good sizes for what you pay, and food is good. 2.I got a decent amount of both - four pastries, and a very good portion of rice. 3.I ordered the Vindaloo, which came to me in a large portion. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a place to dine in the centre that serves jamaican food. S: I'm sorry, I'm not finding any place that serves Jamaican food in the centre of town.  Would you like to try another area? U: That is fine, how about a place that serves Indian food? S: There are several of those.  Do you have a price range you are looking for? U: I have no preference in price range. S: I have 9 different indian restaurants in the centre of town. If you are looking for a truly authentic experience, might I suggest The Golden Curry. They are expensive. U: That sounds perfect. Can you book a table for me for tuesday? S: Sure. How many people will be dining on Tuesday? U: I need the reservation for 2 people for 14:30 for Tuesday. S: Okay, your table is booked for the Golden Curry and your reference number is SYL7B9MN. U: Are the portions big? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Golden Curry offers large portion sizes, including their highly regarded Vindaloo. Is there anything else that I can do for you at this time?

src_text: reviews of AVALON: 1.I did enjoy the spacious room and the view was an unexpected plus. 2.However, the room in which I stayed felt cramped and small. [SEP] U: I am looking for somewhere to dine during my trip to Cambridge. S: There are plenty of restaurants in Cambridge, are you looking for anything in particular? U: I'd like one that is cheap and in the city center. S: Did you have a certain food type you wanted? I have chinese, asian, oriental, italian, spanish  and several other types. U: I don't have a type preference. S: would you be interested in dojo noodle bar? U: Yes, that sounds interesting.  Can you also please find the hotel avalon.  Please let me know their address and whether they have free parking. S: The Avalon address is 62 Gilbert Road and they do not have free parking.  Would you like me to book you a reservation at the restaurant? U: Does it have a lot of space? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The guests that have stayed at the Avalon have been split in terms of the room size, with some saying that they were cramped, and others spacious.

src_text: reviews of EXPRESS BY HOLIDAY INN CAMBRIDGE: 1.We were all thrilled with the great view from the hotel. 2.It was very beautiful. 3.While the noise issue was frustrating, I did like the great view from my hotel room, and I took advantage of the really wonderful spa facility that was available. 4.The only two good points were the great view and that the hotel was generally pretty quiet. [SEP] U: I am looking for a place to stay. The hotel should include free wifi and should be in the type of hotel S: There are quite a few hotels that fit that description. Do you have a preference as to area or price range? U: I would like something in the east with 2 stars. S: It looks like the Express by Holiday Inn Cambridge will work well for you. Would you like me to book that? U: Does it have free parking? Can you provide me with the contact details of this hotel? S: Yes, it offers free parking. The phone number is 01223866800. U: Is the view a nice one? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Express By Holiday Inn Cambridge has great and beautiful views. Would you like me to book that for you?

src_text: reviews of LIMEHOUSE: 1.Free parking was an amazing perk, and I think overall I got a great value for the money. 2.Limehouse is a VERY overpriced hotel, I'm sad to say. 3.For one solo person, the price was simply too high. 4.That said, I have to give it points for being a quiet hotel with comfy beds, but if you favor saving money, I would look elsewhere! [SEP] U: Can you help me find a hotel called Limehouse? Thanks. S: Limehouse phone number is 01223300552. Would like you to make a reservation? U: Do you get a decent value for your money there? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The majority of reviewers thought that the hotel was overpriced. Only one person thought that it was a good value.

src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.The location was extremely silent and I found that I was not disturbed during my time on this trip. 2.Our room was a bit noisy as we could hear the televisions nearby. 3.Also, due to the popularity of this place, it is quite noisy. 4.We didn't like how much traffic there was by the bed and breakfast. 5.We would consider staying there again on a less busy weekend in hopes that the traffic noise wouldn't be so bad. 6.The walls were also very thin and you could hear the people staying in the room next to you. 7.The B&B is pretty quiet and well appointed, and the staff goes out of their way to be friendly. 8.It was very noisy while we were trying to sleep. [SEP] U: I am looking for a museum to visit in the centre of town S: There are many museums in the centre of town, but I would recommend Broughton House Gallery. Could I be of further assistance? U: Yes, can you give me the postcode and entrance fee for that museum? S: Absolutely. There is no entrance fee for the Broughton House Gallery and the postcode is cb11ln. U: Thank you! Are there any guesthouses nearby? S: The Alexander bed and breakfast is located in the centre area. May I book this for you? U: Is it in a quiet area? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The majority opinion from reviews is that the location is quite noisy from nearby traffic and thin walls which allows in noises and conversations from other rooms. Could I be of further assistance?

src_text: reviews of ASHLEY HOTEL: 1.This place definitely delivered in that regard. 2.There was no more than a few noises I heard during my entire stay, I was able to keep my head clear. 3.I stayed here with my family, and we were able to get a good night's rest, as it was very quiet. 4.I mean they are like home comfortable, and also it's very quiet so we didn't have to worry about any loud noises. U: No but I would like it to be a 2 star place. S: There are 3 hotels: The Ashely Hotel, Express by Holiday Inn Cambridge, and Lovell Lodge. They all have free wifi and parking. src_text: reviews of CAFFE UNO: 1.My family and I also had a great night just talking since the view was nice and the atmosphere was pleasant. 2.The drinks are cheap during happy hour though and the view from the patio is refreshing. 3.Things I really liked about the restaurant was the view, great service and the portion size. 4.The restaurant does have a great view, so that helped provide some romantic ambiance, and the outdoor dining option was great because it gave us some privacy away from the crowd. src_text: reviews of CURRY PRINCE: 1.Their korma is truly excellent, and the wait staff is both knowledgeable and really inviting, making you feel very much at home. 2.The place is well-decorated, clean and they were very attentive. 3.It all came out very fast as we were delighted by this. 4.We were promptly seated by a kind waitress. 5.While the portion sizes for food are generous the food is nothing special and the service not very enthusiastic. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a 4 star hotel. S: I've found 21 4 star hotels. Is there a certain area you want to stay in? U: Yes, in the east, please. S: I have found several hotels. Do you have any preference towards price? U: I would not mind finding one with free wifi. S: Unfortunately, we don't have any hotels with those preference in the area, but we do have 6 guesthouses available. Would a guesthouse be okay? U: A guesthouse is fine. Which one would you recommend? S: I recommend the Leverton House. It's a cheap guesthouse, but still a 4-star establishment. U: That sounds good.  Can you give me the address and postcode for Leverton House? S: They are located at 732-734 newmarket road, and postcode is cb58rs U: Thank you. I'm also looking for a venetian restaurant on the east side as well. S: I'm sorry there are no Venetian restaurants. Are there any cuisines I can look for? S: Alright, I have you booked at Curry Prince. Your reference number is: 55UNFF8Z. Anything else I can do for you today? U: Can you assure me that the restaurant has good service? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Most people agree that the service is good and attentive, but there are comments about it not being very enthusiastic.

src_text: reviews of AVALON: 1.I got everything from pancakes to sushi. 2.In the morning, I did not need to go anywhere else for breakfast because of the wide variety of delicious foods available. 3.The breakfast was good too. 4.I mean the food was delicious and they had everything you can ask for. 5.I was very happy with the good breakfast options provided. 6.I had scrambled eggs and they had great toppings like cheese. reviews of ARCHWAY HOUSE: 1.In the morning they generously offered a wide variety of delicious breakfast options. 2.There were some pretty nice breakfast options available, too, so I started each day with some great food in my stomach. 3.The breakfast wasn't that great and I had to grab something to eat when I went out. FAQs of ARCHWAY HOUSE: 1.Breakfast is included at Archway House. 2.A Full English is included, and can do a lighter breakfast if arrangements are made in advance. FAQs of AVALON: 1.The Avalon provides several breakfast options including full English breakfast but there is a charge. [SEP] U: I sure hope so. U: Price is not of any concern, just so it has a 4 star rating. S: What dates would you like to stay? U: Oh, I think I forgot to mention that it needs to be a 4 star guesthouse. I want to book Saturday for 7 people 2 nights. S: All the 8 hotels are 4 star hotels. I recommend the Avalon or the Archway House. Should I book one of those for you and your party? U: Which of them has better breakfast options? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: All of the reviews for the Avalon mention great breakfast options, and most of the Archway House reviews are positive as well.

src_text: reviews of ALLENBELL: 1.The facilities, especially the bathroom were super-clean and sanitary. 2.During my recent stay at ALLENBELL with your family, I was impressed by the big room with a clean bathroom. U: Stars dont matter. Can please book this for 5 people, 3 nights starting Friday. S: Okay, I've set you up at bridge guest house. Your reference number is SU0WE1LI. U: Great.  I'm also looking for a train from cambridge going to peterborough.  Can you help with that? S: I have several options. What day and time would you like to travel? U: I'd like to leave on Monday and arrive by 15:45, please. S: There are several trains that would get you there in time, are you wanting to leave in the morning, or the afternoon? U: I would like to leave in the afternoon. S: I don't have any leaving in the afternoon. How about the morning? U: I want to arrive as clsoe to 15:45 as possible on monday. I need the travel time and the price please? S: Of course - sorry, our automated "afternoon" constraint is buggy. I think TR7786 is most suitable, leaving Cambridge on Monday at 14:34 and arriving in Peterborough at 15:24. Would that work? U: Can you let me know what the trip duration is for that train, please, and how much it costs? Oh, almost forgot. Does the Bridge Guest House include free parking? S: The duration is 50 minutes and the price is 16.50 pounds. U: Does the hotel have a solid internet connection, it is important. S: <extra_id_0>

src_text: reviews of STAZIONE RESTAURANT AND COFFEE BAR: 1.I like the location as it is convenient and the view is nice. 2.It was also a nice place to be because we could just chat while enjoying the view. 3.It did have a good view though so we felt comfortable. reviews of CLOWNS CAFE: 1.Luckily the view was amazing. 2.The views from the restaurant are nothing to speak of, because they don't have many windows and there's not much to see, but the quality of their food is stellar and that more than makes up for it. 3.The views they offer are also unmatched. reviews of CAFFE UNO: 1.My family and I also had a great night just talking since the view was nice and the atmosphere was pleasant. 2.The restaurant does have a great view, so that helped provide some romantic ambiance, and the outdoor dining option was great because it gave us some privacy away from the crowd. 3.Things I really liked about the restaurant was the view, great service and the portion size. 4.The drinks are cheap during happy hour though and the view from the patio is refreshing. reviews of DON PASQUALE PIZZERIA: 1.This wouldn't be a nice place for a date because of terrible service and the terrible view of the parking lot. 2.It was also pretty romantic since the view was nice. 3.Don Pasquale Pizzeria has a lovely view of the river, and I thought it would make for a very romantic date night spot with my boyfriend. 4.While I do like the location, there isn't much of a view. 5.We both agree that the location is great, only 10 minutes from our home, but in my opinion the place doesn't have great views at all, so dining outside is a lackluster experience. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Stazione and Caffe Uno both seem to have nice views that past guests have talked about. Opinions of the views of Clowns Cafe and Don Pasquale Pizzeria are more mixed.
