src_text: reviews of CITY STOP RESTAURANT: 1.While the location is wonderful, right in the heart of the city, and their specialty drinks are well-prepared and tasty, those factors just cannot overcome the really mediocre quality of the food and how incredibly overpriced it is. 2.The drinks were tasty and a good value. 3.The one negative I'll give the place is that their interior decor doesn't match their vibe very well, and it was pretty bland and boring, but the food and drink quality more than made up for it. 4.The food and drinks were affordable. 5.Although we weren't planning on drinking, we were impressed by their drinks menu and we ended up trying a few different cocktails and lagers, which worked out well because their non-alcoholic drink menu is pretty limited. 6.I was however suprised about how low of quality the drinks were. src_text: reviews of STAZIONE RESTAURANT AND COFFEE BAR: 1.We had to wait a while before we were seated. 2.However, the service offered left a lot to be desired. 3.The good things about this place was the wonderful indoor decor and great service. 4.The drinks were affordable and our waiter suggested the perfect pairings for each of the dishes my colleagues and I ordered - lasgna, meatballs and spaghetti, risotto, and bolognese. 5.We wanted a booth, but there were none available for a party of four. 6.If I had to take one star off my review, I'd say that the service wasn't the best, but my server may just have been having an off night. 7.The wait staff were prompt with the drinks and someone was always around to attend to our needs. 8.Our server was friendly and affable. src_text: reviews of JINLING NOODLE BAR: 1.The only issue was that each mixed drink was $15 which I found to be very expensive. 2.I wouldn't recommend ordering from the alcoholic drink menu at Jinling, because their specialty drinks are way overpriced for what you get. 3.You could tell they have a good bartender as the drinks weren't too powerful but they had the right amount of alcohol taste. 4.Their drinks were really good, though expensive, and lacking in non-alcoholic options. 5.The food just tastes bland and inauthentic, and if you try to jazz it up with a stiff drink, you find out that their drink menu is super limited as well. 6.Not only that but the food as well as the drinks was priced well within our budget. 7.Some of us also ordered drinks, and while they were really enjoyable and high in quality, we thought they were pretty overpriced for what we got. src_text: reviews of THE LENSFIELD HOTEL: 1.I was on business in the area, and it was great to have a nice place to sleep quietly at night. 2.My room was very quiet and I think the price was right. 3.The location and guests were just so noisy that it really ruined our stay. 4.It made sleeping very easy! 5.Also, it was very quiet and peaceful. 6.The place is very quiet which was good for me and my family, we dont like a lot of noise. 7.However, it was pretty hard to appreciate the great view with the constant noise. 8.Our stay was very quiet. U: The price range is on the expensive side and I would like if they provide free wifi and parking. I want the hotel to be located on the north side. src_text:
reviews of KOHINOOR: 1.We were thinking about leaving and going elsewhere because the service was very lackluster. 2.I will say the food and drinks made up for the lackluster service we've received. 3.When the host sat us at our table it took a good 15 minutes for our waiter to introduce themselves. reviews of ROYAL SPICE: 1.The staff was super friendly and the decor was refined yet cozy. 2.in the recently outing for royal spice in ordered for Tandoori chicken its very good tasty and good service then good price its on my family so very happy 3.My only complaints are that the service could have been a little better and all the drinks were expensive. 4.The location is convinient and the staff is friendly. 5.What you liked:
I was thoroughly impressed
The taste was exceptional
Excellent food and service
What you disliked:
I feel like price is just high reviews of MAHAL OF CAMBRIDGE: 1.The weather was wonderful, so we asked to be seated outside, and the staff was nice enough to seat us in a quaint little outdoor area overlooking the city. 2.The servers were very fast, understanding and not too much in-your-face, which we all appreciated a lot! reviews of THE GANDHI: 1.The service was very welcoming and made me feel comfortable. 2.That said, the view isn't very good, and the service could be improved substantially. src_text: reviews of THE LUCKY STAR: 1.There's a great view and the staff is dynamite. 2.It really is a great view to look at while you are enjoying your dinner. 3.It has a good view outside the windows, but it fell short when it come to paying the bill, which was too much. 4.We enjoyed the view from the patio and the location is charming. 5.The view is superb. 6.Before I get into how the food was, I just want to comment on the view. reviews of NANDOS: 1.But with high quality food and really nice views from this rooftop restaurant, we'll gladly make it one of our date night spots! 2.The place is in a good location in town, but it's tucked right behind a big warehouse, so there aren't any good views. 3.The view was average though quite frankly. 4.The view was perfect for setting a romantic mood and they had plenty of drink options even in nonalcoholic varieties. src_text: reviews of THE LENSFIELD HOTEL: 1.First off the room had a very beautiful view! 2.He specifically selected this hotel because of the gorgeous views. 3.I took about fifty pictures out of my window during my stay, I just couldn't get enough of it! src_text: reviews of THE NIRALA: 1.The location could not be better: right in the heart of the city with excellent views after the sun goes down. 2.They also have a modest drinks menu with some affordable prices, but I was more interested in the beautiful view from my window seat, which allowed me to watch the sun setting as I dined. 3.The only places they can use some improvement in is giving it all a better view which might also bring up the atmosphere as well 4.I have to say, the service was excellent, and the views from the restaurant can't be beat. src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.The location was extremely silent and I found that I was not disturbed during my time on this trip. 2.Our room was a bit noisy as we could hear the televisions nearby. 3.Also, due to the popularity of this place, it is quite noisy. 4.We didn't like how much traffic there was by the bed and breakfast. 5.We would consider staying there again on a less busy weekend in hopes that the traffic noise wouldn't be so bad. 6.The walls were also very thin and you could hear the people staying in the room next to you. 7.The B&B is pretty quiet and well appointed, and the staff goes out of their way to be friendly. 8.It was very noisy while we were trying to sleep. [SEP] U: Hi. I'm looking for a place to spend the night, and I want somewhere without any hidden fees for parking or wifi. S: There are 29 choices. Do you have a preference in the area of town and price range? U: I want a cheap price range, please. S: There is the Alexander Bed and Breakfast thich is 4 star and has free parking and wifi. U: Is there too much noise near the hotel? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Some people found it quiet, but many others thought it was a bit noisy, both from outside traffic, and from other rooms.

src_text: reviews of SALA THONG: 1.The only thing that we disliked was the size of the entrees. 2.Portions are tiny and service was a little...how to say it...lacking. 3.The atmosphere itself could have been better but the food was great but left you hungry. 4.The portions are also massive, so I didn't leave hungry. 5.I would recommend ordering two entrees per person, as these were quite small. 6.Between us we ordered the Thai Fried Rice, Green Curry, Red Curry, and Tom Kha Kai, all of which were excellent, affordable and came in large portion sizes. [SEP] U: I'm looking for an expensive restaurant that serves Thai food, please. S: There is one in the west and one in the centre of town. Do you have a preference in area? S: I booked you a table at the sala thong in the west area for 12:30 Saturday. U: Do they serve large portions here? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The portions at the Sala Thong Restaurant are  small according to a majority of guests, but some still said they were huge. I guess it depends on what you are used to.

src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.The location was extremely silent and I found that I was not disturbed during my time on this trip. 2.Our room was a bit noisy as we could hear the televisions nearby. 3.Also, due to the popularity of this place, it is quite noisy. 4.We didn't like how much traffic there was by the bed and breakfast. 5.We would consider staying there again on a less busy weekend in hopes that the traffic noise wouldn't be so bad. 6.The walls were also very thin and you could hear the people staying in the room next to you. 7.The B&B is pretty quiet and well appointed, and the staff goes out of their way to be friendly. 8.It was very noisy while we were trying to sleep. U: I am open to any price range, but am looking for somewhere located in the centre area of town. S: I would recommend cotto, they are moderately priced, would you like more info on them? U: Yes can I please get more info. S: their phone number is 01223302010 U: May I also get the address for the restaurant? S: Absolutely, there address is 183 East Road City Centre cb11bg. Is there anything else I may help you with today? U: Yes I need to find a place to stay in the centre area. It should be a 4 star guesthouse with free wifi. S: Do you know of any hotels in the area that meet my standards? U: You're the help desk, please tell me what you find. S: alexander bed and breakfast is the only matching all your requirements. Can I book it for you? U: Is it located in the quiet part of town? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: No, the guests that have stayed at the Alexander Bed and Breakfast have experienced both loud and quiet environments at the location.

Which price range do you want? U: I would prefer a moderately priced one. S: Prezzo restaurant is moderately priced. Would you like me to make a reservation for you? U: Yes I would like the reservation for 1 person friday at 13:45. S: Okay, will you be needing a reference number? U: Yes you should not have to ask and always provide the reference number. S: I am required to ask by management. U: You really should be giving me the reference number now. S: Your reference number is : 8XWH8Q5E. U: I am also looking for a hotel that is 4 stars and has free wifi. I need it in the same part of town as the restaurant. S: There are two hotels in the same area as the restaurant and meet your requirements.  What is the price range you are looking for? U: I am looking for price range that is not cheap or expensive. Do you want to book? U: Is this considered a good value for my money? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: There is a fee to use the spa. One guest felt the fees to stay at the Cambridge Belfry were higher than normal. Another felt that this place offered the best value for their budget.

src_text: reviews of EXPRESS BY HOLIDAY INN CAMBRIDGE: 1.We were all thrilled with the great view from the hotel. 2.It was very beautiful. 3.While the noise issue was frustrating, I did like the great view from my hotel room, and I took advantage of the really wonderful spa facility that was available. 4.The only two good points were the great view and that the hotel was generally pretty quiet. src_text: FAQs of MEZE BAR: 1.Meze Bar serves alcohol. reviews of MEZE BAR: 1.The service is great and they have a nice drink selection. 2.The food was good but they really didn't give me much and there were no gluten free options available but the nice location of the restaurant and the various drink options didn't make up for that. 3.I was disappointed in my beer as there were only mediocre choices for drinks. 4.The establishment has many drink options, vegetarian options, and the food prices were highly affordable. src_text: reviews of THE VARSITY RESTAURANT: 1.The service was slow, and not many of the windows in the restaurant face anything worth looking out for. 2.It was beside the bay so we had a great view of the ocean from where we were siting. 3.It would have been pretty romantic because it was a nice view, but the indoor decor was kind of tacky. 4.The things we wish were better were the service and the view. 5.The only thing is I would've wished for a better view. 6.The restaurant has a nice view. reviews of BLOOMSBURY RESTAURANT: 1.I really loved the beautiful spot it was at in the city, as well as the awesome view we had from our window. 2.The only bad thing was the view. 3.The restaurant offers a very pretty, picturesque view which gave it a really romantic atmosphere. 4.The food was of good quality, you had a nice view and location but i didn't like the No gluten-free option and Mediocre atmosphere 5.The view wasn't good though. 6.However, the food was just okay and the view was also mediocre. src_text:
reviews of TANDOORI PALACE: 1.Their Vindaloo was enough to feed three people and their naan was the size of dinner plates. 2.The atmosphere in the restaurant is mediocre, but the good portion sizes make up for it. 3.After visiting Tandoori Palace, what impressed me most was the great food quality, while still maintaining large portions. 4.I thought that the Mediocre location was a huge letdown and the portion sizes were quite small and I left hungry. 5.But that's where the bad points end, because Tandoori Palace has exceptional menu prices for their entrees, the portion sizes are really generous, and the quality of the food is unmatched. 6.The Good:
- High-quality, delicious food
- Affordably priced drinks
- Generous food portions
The Bad:
- Mediocre drinks
- Slow service 7.We were surely stuffed, but it was a matter of quantity over quality. [SEP] U: I need to find an expensive restaurant in the west. S: We have quite a few spots. Do you have a specific type of food you'd like to eat? U: No, I don't really care.  Can you suggest one? S: Tandoori Palace is an Indian restaurant. Their food is lovely. U: Do they offer large portion sizes? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The portion sizes at Tandoori Palace were great according to the majority of customers. Only a couple say that the portion sizes were small.

src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.The location was extremely silent and I found that I was not disturbed during my time on this trip. 2.Our room was a bit noisy as we could hear the televisions nearby. 3.Also, due to the popularity of this place, it is quite noisy. 4.We didn't like how much traffic there was by the bed and breakfast. 5.We would consider staying there again on a less busy weekend in hopes that the traffic noise wouldn't be so bad. 6.The walls were also very thin and you could hear the people staying in the room next to you. 7.The B&B is pretty quiet and well appointed, and the staff goes out of their way to be friendly. 8.It was very noisy while we were trying to sleep. [SEP] U: I'm looking for cheap lodgings. S: Alexander Bed and Breakfast is an option. It is located at 56 Saint Barnabas Road. U: What's it's star rating? S: It has a 4 star rating. Would you like me to book a room for you? U: Is it a quiet place? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The level of noise at the Alexander Bed and Breakfast varies greatly, ranging from extremely silent to high traffic and loud.

src_text: reviews of ANATOLIA: 1.They have this Meze that was pretty decent, and the other foods I tried were just OK. Portions were tiny though, but it had a nice view in a good location. 2.The portions were kind of small but I guess that helps with portion control! 3.I was overall very impressed with both the quality and the portions, as I had enough for a full meal and was still able to take enough home for leftovers the next day. 4.But the portions were so stupidly small, and the quality was seriously mediocre. 5.Between us we ordered Gozleme, Baklava, Borek, and Ayran, all of which were of great quality and were in large portions. 6.The portions were generous and the prices were fair. 7.However, the portion sizes were quite small, and we were disappointed in the very limited selection of non-alcoholic drink options for the kids in our group. reviews of EFES RESTAURANT: 1.I had to ask for a to-go box, because I could not finish it, even though I really wanted to! 2.I ordered the Gozleme and they had it stacked so high it almost fell over on the plate. 3.All-in-all, a great dining experience: the portion sizes were very good, and the prices were reasonable (under $20 for each of us) for top-notch quality foods and drinks. 4.I was hungry so it was good that the food portions were big. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a moderately priced turkish restaurant. S: Alright how about either the anatolia or efes restaurant? U: Which offers good portions of food? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The portions at Efes seem to be very large and generous, but views are mixed on the portion sizes at Anatolia.

src_text: reviews of EL SHADDAI: 1.I would expect to pay a lot more considering where the hotel is located. 2.The hotel is a great value for money. 3.Given the location of the hotel, the value of money was good, too. reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.But to be honest, the lack of concierge service and other small issues made this place feel quite overpriced for what I got. 2.First, I have to say that this placve was great value for the money! 3.However, the room was extremely cheap and offered acceptable value for the price. src_text: reviews of NANDOS: 1.The only thing we did not like was the poor part of town the restaurant was in. 2.However, the location was mediocre and it was hard to find parking. 3.The place is in a good location in town, but it's tucked right behind a big warehouse, so there aren't any good views. 4.They had loads of options to choose from and the location is easy to get to, not too far from everything else you'd expect near a restaurant. 5.Food is always fantastic, as is the service, and it's located right in the best part of town, walking distance from all the major attractions. reviews of THE LUCKY STAR: 1.The location of the place is fantastic as it's in a village and there is many places you can go before or after you eat for entertainment purposes. 2.We enjoyed the view from the patio and the location is charming. [SEP] U: I am looking for a place to dine in the south it needs to be cheap as well. S: I have 2 different options that are cheap and in the south. The Lucky Star has great chinese food. Or, there is Nando's that offers wonderful portuguese food. U: I want the one with the best location, something in a really nice area. S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Lucky Star is in a good location in the village and Nandos is not in a bad location but is next to a warehouse. Would you like some more information about either restaurant?

src_text: reviews of THE LENSFIELD HOTEL: 1.I was on business in the area, and it was great to have a nice place to sleep quietly at night. 2.My room was very quiet and I think the price was right. 3.The location and guests were just so noisy that it really ruined our stay. 4.It made sleeping very easy! 5.Also, it was very quiet and peaceful. 6.The place is very quiet which was good for me and my family, we dont like a lot of noise. 7.However, it was pretty hard to appreciate the great view with the constant noise. 8.Our stay was very quiet. src_text: reviews of WARKWORTH HOUSE: 1.The room and hotel had a fast wifi which was useful and not aggravatingly slow like we've all seen, the room was large and I liked that too. 2.When I needed to use the Internet, I found that the wireless Internet was extremely quick and more than enough for my business needs. 3.The Warkworth House has good Wi-Fi which I used a lot because I travelled alone. 4.My work called me up and needed me to go on a business trip, so I went here, and oh boy I must say they have really good breakfast options and the WiFi was super fast. FAQs of WARKWORTH HOUSE: 1.There is wifi at Warkworth House. 2.Warkworth House offers free WiFi. U: I think I want somewhere in the east S: We have two places to pick from, I recommend the warkworth house, shall I book you? U: Is there a reliable internet connection? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes the wifi is super fast and very useful. It has the quickness to satisfy all your business and consumer needs.

src_text: reviews of TRAVELLERS REST: 1.Our meal was expensive for the portion sizes but the food was good. 2.The food was to die for, and the portions were rather hefty, in a good way. 3.They do give you good sized food dishes but the service itself was not great. 4.The foods were overpriced but I guess you get what you pay for, since they were high quality and came in large portions. 5.The Cornish Pasty and Roast Dinners had generous portions and were made from high-quality ingredients. [SEP] U: Hi, Can you help me locate a restaurant named Travellers Rest? S: It is located at Huntingdon Road City Centre. U: What kind of food do they serve? trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Well the Travellers Rest restaurant is known to serve their quality food portions in comprehensive sizes.

src_text: reviews of COCUM: 1.The indoor decor was mediocre but I guess it did not matter since I didn't have to impress anyone. 2.The decor inside is not very fancy but it is alright. reviews of MAHARAJAH TANDOORI RESTAURANT: 1.I absolutely loved that I felt like I wasn't in my own backyard. 2.First thing is first, the d√©cor in the restaurant really transport you to India. reviews of INDIA HOUSE: 1.However, what they lack in interior design, they make up for in the quality of their food! 2.The first thing we noticed is that the inside looked kind of like a doctor's office. 3.I would definitely recommend stopping in here if you are interested in some fine Indian cuisine and are not looking to be dazzled with the interior decor, but would rather be impressed with the food. 4.Striped wallpaper and a few framed photos of the Taj Mahal. reviews of RICE BOAT: 1.The decor has recently been renovated and the atmosphere is warm and welcoming. 2.It looks like they've remodeled it recently. 3.The d√©cor is not too fancy but is is alright. reviews of TANDOORI PALACE: 1.So I'll get the negatives out of the way first: their drink menu is way overpriced, and the inside of the place has really bland decor for an Indian restaurant; you won't find interesting signs of cultural heritage here. [SEP] U: I need a hotel in Cambridge that is a 4 star and has WiFi S: Based on your request I found the University Arms Hotel is available. U: Is that located in the west? I also need free parking. S: It is in the west and it does include parking. How many days would you like to stay? U: I would like to stay for 2 nights starting from saturday. Also book it for 5 people. S: I have booked the hotel starting Saturday for 5 people for 2 days.  The reference number is 18OADQCC. Is there anything else I can do for you? U: Can you also find me an expensive indian restaurant? S: The curry garden is an expensive restaurant located in the centre of town. Do you want me to book a table? U: Actually I would like a place in the same area as the hotel, if possible. S: There are 5 expensive indian restaurants in the west, tandoori place, cocom, rice boat, maharajah tandoori restaurant and india house, do you have a preference? U: Which area has the calmest inside area? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The interior decor at Tandoori Palace, India House and Cocum are lackluster and bland while those of Rice Boat and Maharajah Tandoori Restaurant are more appealing overall.

src_text: reviews of THE COPPER KETTLE: 1.So they have a nice outdoor area for dining, some vegetarian options and the service was really good. reviews of THE OAK BISTRO: 1.They have a pleasant outdoors area for eating which we all enjoyed and many of their drinks are non-alcoholic which suited some of the members of our party. [SEP] U: Hi, I am looking for a British-themed restaurant in the centre. S: I found several restaurants to fit your needs. Do you prefer moderate or expensively priced? U: I would like a moderately priced restaurant. S: Wonderful! There are 4 in the centre of town: Restaurant One Seven, The Oak Bistro, The Copper Kettle, and the Cotto. Would you like for me to book one of these for you? U: Do they have nice outdoor dining areas? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Both the Copper Kettle and the Oak Bistro offer very pleasant outdoor areas to enjoy your meal. The Restaurant One Seven does not have that information available.

src_text: reviews of FRANKIE AND BENNYS: 1.Our waiter was also slow to bring the drinks back and take out order. 2.We were further disappointed with the mediocre service, and we felt that our waiter could have done a better job of working with us and the kitchen to find something suitable for my wife to eat. 3.I'll admit, the foods were affordable, and the service was great, but the food tasted terrible. 4.It's too bad the food isn't good because the service is really great. 5.So we had to flag someone down after waiting 15 minutes. 6.Food prices were very affordable and the service was great. 7.The night didn't start off well because of there not being anyone at the door to bring us to a table. 8.The drinks were at least very good so that made up for how long it took for them. 9.On the plus side, they had affordable prices, great quality foods, great drinks, and the service was great. reviews of PIZZA HUT CHERRY HINTON: 1.They also offer really great service with a smile, and the folks working here seem to genuinely enjoy what they do. 2.The staff was friendly at least and the drink menu had plenty on offer in alcoholic and non-alcoholic form. 3.And I did not like the service of the waiters who were not attentive enough. 4.She went above and beyond for me. 5.First and foremost, I want to say my waiter, Suzy was AMAZING. 6.Service was a bit slow. 7.She made sure I was comfortable, that I didn't have sun in my face and that I was able to partake in this amazing view that the restaurant has. [SEP] U: I am looking for Italian food on the south side of the city. S: Do you prefer moderately priced or expensive? U: No preference, please. S: I have Pizza Hut Cherry Hinton which is in the moderate price range and Frankie and Bennys which is in the more expensive price range. Which would you prefer? U: Is the service great? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Both the Pizza Hut and Frankie and Bennys have mixed reviews about their service. Some people love their service and others find their service very lacking. Would you like to know more about either place?

trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Nirala and the Golden Wok offer high quality meals that are affordable for their guests to enjoy.

src_text: reviews of SALA THONG: 1.The only thing that we disliked was the size of the entrees. 2.Portions are tiny and service was a little...how to say it...lacking. 3.The atmosphere itself could have been better but the food was great but left you hungry. 4.The portions are also massive, so I didn't leave hungry. 5.I would recommend ordering two entrees per person, as these were quite small. 6.Between us we ordered the Thai Fried Rice, Green Curry, Red Curry, and Tom Kha Kai, all of which were excellent, affordable and came in large portion sizes. src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.The location was extremely silent and I found that I was not disturbed during my time on this trip. 2.Our room was a bit noisy as we could hear the televisions nearby. 3.Also, due to the popularity of this place, it is quite noisy. 4.We didn't like how much traffic there was by the bed and breakfast. 5.We would consider staying there again on a less busy weekend in hopes that the traffic noise wouldn't be so bad. 6.The walls were also very thin and you could hear the people staying in the room next to you. 7.The B&B is pretty quiet and well appointed, and the staff goes out of their way to be friendly. 8.It was very noisy while we were trying to sleep. src_text: reviews of CITYROOMZ: 1.When we first entered the room we were blown away by the views that can be seen, and the bathroom was especially clean. 2.I am actually really missing that view right about now. 3.We actually heard that the views were good, and we weren't disappointed. 4.It really does have a great view, and the staff made us feel very welcome. [SEP] U: Hi, I'm looking for a place to go see architecture in the centre of town. S: There are 4 churches and an old schools. All are free except for great saint mary's church which has an entrance fee of 2 pounds. Which do you prefer? U: Just give me the information for the first one that is free in the centre, like their phone number and postcode please. S: holy trinity church, phone number is 01223355397, postcode is cb23nz. Is there anything else you need? U: I actually would like to find a place to stay that is in the centre of town also. S: We have 5 potential options available to you. Is there a particular lodging type or price range you are interested in the most? U: No particular pricerange, but I want it to be a type of hotel. It doesn't need to include internet. S: I think citycroomz would work well. Would you like more information? U: Does it have a good view? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Those that have previously stayed at the Cityroomz location were blown away by the scenery and views available.

src_text: reviews of ARBURY LODGE GUESTHOUSE: 1.I was super happy with the large size of the room, which had a great view and super fast Wi-Fi. 2.The room had a great view and was in a good location. 3.The views from the lodge were also amazing which will lead to fond memories. 4.The view was amazing and private at the same time. 5.The view is nice, especially at night. [SEP] U: I am looking for a hotel that include free parking and has a 1 star rating. S: There are no hotels that meet that criteria. Would you like me to expand the search a bit? S: There are no cottages. U: Could you please try guesthouse, with free parking and a 4 star then? S: I have 16 entries matching that criteria.  What part of town and price range would you prefer? U: Could find one in a moderate or cheap price range? S: Sure, there are a few.  Can I book you a room at one of them?  How about The Acorn Guest House? U: Yes go ahead and try that please. S: I have the arbury lodge guesthouse in the same area and price range,would you like me to book that one? U: Do you know if the Arbury Lodge Guesthouse offers pleasant sights from its rooms? S: <extra_id_0>

U: Do you get a big room there? S: <extra_id_0>

src_text: FAQs of MEZE BAR: 1.Meze Bar serves alcohol. reviews of MEZE BAR: 1.The service is great and they have a nice drink selection. 2.The food was good but they really didn't give me much and there were no gluten free options available but the nice location of the restaurant and the various drink options didn't make up for that. 3.I was disappointed in my beer as there were only mediocre choices for drinks. 4.The establishment has many drink options, vegetarian options, and the food prices were highly affordable. [SEP] U: I need to find a restaurant in the center of town. A place offering Vietnamese food, if possible. S: There are no vietnamese locations in the centre of town. src_text: reviews of GONVILLE HOTEL: 1.I loved the 24 hour service at the front desk and the view was impeccable! 2.Our room had an excellent view of the surrounding sights and attractions. 3.It was a really stunning view to wake up to every morning, and romantic to look at in the evenings. [SEP] U: i'm looking for adc theatre S: You will want to go to the centre part of Cambridge, it is on park street, postal code cb58as.  Can I help with anything else? Their phone number is 01223300085. Can I help you with anything else? U: Yes, I need information about the Gonville Hotel, please. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Gonville hotel is known for its spectacular morning and evening views of the surrounding sights and attractions.

src_text: reviews of LEVERTON HOUSE: 1.Also, the cleanliness of the bathroom was a huge pro. 2.I was with my family at this place, and we were happy to see the bathrooms were sparkling clean. 3.During my recent stay at LEVERTON HOUSE with your family, I was very happy with the clean room especially the bathroom. 4.You can tell the cleaning staff takes pride in their jobs. reviews of AUTUMN HOUSE: 1.The bathroom was nice and clean, and there were fresh towels and complimentary bottles of shampoo, conditioner, and soap. reviews of ALLENBELL: 1.The facilities, especially the bathroom were super-clean and sanitary. 2.During my recent stay at ALLENBELL with your family, I was impressed by the big room with a clean bathroom. [SEP] U: Hi, I'll be visiting soon and can't wait to try local restaurants. I need a cheap place to stay and would like to try a guesthouse. Any recommendations? S: Great! There are 9 guesthouses in Cambridge that are cheap. Is there a certain area you prefer? U: I would prefer to stay on the East side, with free parking available. S: That narrows it down to three: the Allenbell, Autumn House, and Leverton House. Do any of these sound good to you? U: Do they have clean bathrooms? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Allenbell have impressive big room with a thoroughly well clean bathroom .All the facilities have  been hygienically been cleaned.

Portions were tiny though, but it had a nice view in a good location. 3.They have a nice view you can enjoy too. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a place to go in the east. S: Is there a certain type of attraction you'd like to see? U: I actually haven't been to Cambridge before. Can you tell me a few types that might be in that area? S: sure thing! We have museums, entertainment and a boat. Anything there catch your fancy? U: You pick something in the east for me.  I'll need the address, postcode and entrance fee.  I'm also wanting information on Anatolia.  Thank you! S: Lets start with the attraction information first. Cherry Hinton Water Play is a free park located at cherry hinton hall, cherry hinton road and the postcode is cb18dw. U: Great, thank you. S: You're very welcome. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, the Anatolia does offer nice views. Past customers have talked about the view overlooking Main Street.

src_text: reviews of AVALON: 1.I did enjoy the spacious room and the view was an unexpected plus. 2.However, the room in which I stayed felt cramped and small. src_text: reviews of LOCH FYNE: 1.I was there with coworkers and we enjoyed the meal and the affordable drinks. 2.And the drinks are priced right to go along with your meal. 3.In addition to amazingly fresh seafood that's top quality all-around, their menu is genuinely affordable, especially their various specialty cocktails. 4.However, the service was quick and prompt and the drinks were very affordable. src_text: reviews of ERAINA: 1.The restaurant is in a really nice location, which makes it wonderful for a date night out on the town. 2.Great view from the downtown location though, so all-in-all it made for a great date night. 3.On the other hand, it's in a great spot in my favorite part of town and the service was fast and friendly. 4.The location of the restaurant could be better, because it's kind of in the middle of nowhere, but that's a small gripe. [SEP] U: I am looking for a restaurant in the center of town that serves European food. S: eraina would fit the bill. U: What is the address, phone number, and price range? S: It's pretty expensive. It's at Free School Lane City Centre, and you can call them at 01223 368786. Anything else I can help you with? U: Is that location considered a good one? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: While some thought the location could be better, most enjoy the part of town in which Eraina is situated.

src_text: reviews of THE CAMBRIDGE BELFRY: 1.This hotel offered the best place for our limited budget. 2.But the fee to use the spa was too high. 3.The only downside was the price of our stay, which was a bit more than normal. [SEP] U: Can you please help me find a cheap hotel to stay in that includes free wifi? S: The Cambridge Belfry is the only cheap hotel in town that has free wifi. It's in the west side of town at back lane, cambourne. Do you want a reservation? U: I would like a little more information about the Belfry hotel. does it have a 4 star rating? S: Yes, it does have a four star rating. Would you like to book a room? U: Are there a lot of amenities offered? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The customers that stayed at the Cambridge Belfry mentioned that there was a spa, but other than that, I am not sure about the amenities. Would you like to book a room?

src_text: reviews of HOBSONS HOUSE: 1.I also like tidy spaces, so it was great to have a clean room to sleep. [SEP] U: I am looking for a hotel called Hobsons House. S: Hobsons House is a moderately priced 3-star guesthouse on the west side. Their address is 96 Barton Road, cb39lh. Their phone is 01223304906. They offer free wifi and free parking. U: Is the hotel very clean? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Patrons that have previously stayed at the Hobsons House were happy to find clean rooms in which to sleep.

src_text: reviews of ASHLEY HOTEL: 1.The room was large and had central heat and air, had two beds and a separate area with a couch and television. 2.The rooms are definitely overpriced and on the smaller side, but not too bad. 3.The room and bed were ample and comfortable. 4.The Ashley Hotel has big rooms, and really comfortable beds. [SEP] U: I'm looking for places to go see good architecture in the centre of the city. S: There are 4 churches and a school with excellent architecture. Any preference? U: Can you recommend one? I'd like the entrance fee and the phone number, please. S: Old schools is nice. The phone number is 01223332320 and it's free to get it. U: I am also looking for a place to stay in the north? Can you tell me some hotels in the north? S: There are two hotels in the north end. Ashley Hotel and Lovell Lodge. U: What is the cost per night? S: They are both in the moderate price range. U: If there are not any cheap hotels in that location then one of the moderately priced hotels will be fine. S: There are two cheap guesthouses in the north, if you would prefer a guesthouse to a hotel. Otherwise, which of the two hotels would you like to reserve? U: I need a hotel, so I will go with Ashley Hotel if it is in the moderate price range. I need to book for 5 nights. S: Okay, how many people will be in your group, and which day would you like to begin your stay? U: I will have 4 people. I want 5 nights starting from Sunday please. S: I'm sorry, those days are unavailable. Can you perhaps shorten your stay or change the day? U: How about 2 nights instead? S: I've made a successful reservation for two nights at the Ashley Hotel. The reference number is GGM7TFLP. U: Are the rooms really big? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Most guests indicate that the rooms are spacious but there is one report of a small room.  It's possible that they have different sized room available would you like for me to try to get more information about that?

src_text: reviews of ROSA'S BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.We also really enjoyed the pleasant views that they had in their rooms which was another enjoyable experience. 2.The view was breathtaking. 3.The B&B had a super convenient location, and my room had a wonderful view. 4.To have the big room and that gorgeous view together was absolutely worth it. src_text: reviews of EL SHADDAI: 1.I would expect to pay a lot more considering where the hotel is located. 2.The hotel is a great value for money. 3.Given the location of the hotel, the value of money was good, too. reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.But to be honest, the lack of concierge service and other small issues made this place feel quite overpriced for what I got. 2.First, I have to say that this placve was great value for the money! 3.However, the room was extremely cheap and offered acceptable value for the price. src_text: reviews of THE CAMBRIDGE BELFRY: 1.One of the best things about the hotel is the view of the mountains from the balcony. 2.The staff was polite they took out luggage to our room, and our room had a spectacular view of the forest and nature. It'll be for 3 people and 4 nights starting Wednesday. S: Okay. We have you booked at the Cambridge Belfry. The reference number is Y8Y2HVXE. U: How is the view from my room? S: <extra_id_0>

src_text: reviews of THE VARSITY RESTAURANT: 1.The service was slow, and not many of the windows in the restaurant face anything worth looking out for. 2.It was beside the bay so we had a great view of the ocean from where we were siting. 3.It would have been pretty romantic because it was a nice view, but the indoor decor was kind of tacky. 4.The things we wish were better were the service and the view. 5.The only thing is I would've wished for a better view. 6.The restaurant has a nice view. reviews of BLOOMSBURY RESTAURANT: 1.I really loved the beautiful spot it was at in the city, as well as the awesome view we had from our window. 2.The only bad thing was the view. 3.The restaurant offers a very pretty, picturesque view which gave it a really romantic atmosphere. 4.The food was of good quality, you had a nice view and location but i didn't like the No gluten-free option and Mediocre atmosphere 5.The view wasn't good though. 6.However, the food was just okay and the view was also mediocre. src_text: reviews of RESTAURANT ALIMENTUM: 1.The food did come in big portions so I was able to eat leftovers for days. 2.I had it with some naan and rice, and there was plenty of food even for two. 3.I only wish each portion had been bigger! 4.It was the size of a large plate and came with fresh fruit and other toppings so I could choose what I wanted on it. 5.You get a large portion and the food is good. 6.I paired the quiche with their waffle was gigantic. 7.We also liked the complimentary salads, which turned out to be necessary because the portion sizes are a little small. src_text: reviews of LA MARGHERITA: 1.It's comfortable and well decorated. 2.Who ever was in charge of decorating this place did an amazing job. 3.It really made me feel like I was in Italy. U: Is the inside nicely decorated? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, it's very nice inside and has reminded guests of being in Italy itself. Would you like me to book you a table?

src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.The location was extremely silent and I found that I was not disturbed during my time on this trip. 2.Our room was a bit noisy as we could hear the televisions nearby. 3.Also, due to the popularity of this place, it is quite noisy. 4.We didn't like how much traffic there was by the bed and breakfast. 5.We would consider staying there again on a less busy weekend in hopes that the traffic noise wouldn't be so bad. 6.The walls were also very thin and you could hear the people staying in the room next to you. 7.The B&B is pretty quiet and well appointed, and the staff goes out of their way to be friendly. 8.It was very noisy while we were trying to sleep. src_text: reviews of CHIQUITO RESTAURANT BAR: 1.My waiter, Diego, was quite pleasant and offered friendly, world-class service. 2.Some people may find that they do have extensive options for vegetarians and the service was actually really good, so it wasn't all bad. 3.I had the Chilaquiles, she had the mole and we both agreed it was the some of the best Mexican food ever not to mention it was all very reasonably priced with superb service to go along with it. src_text: reviews of STAZIONE RESTAURANT AND COFFEE BAR: 1.We had to wait a while before we were seated. 2.However, the service offered left a lot to be desired. 3.The good things about this place was the wonderful indoor decor and great service. 4.The drinks were affordable and our waiter suggested the perfect pairings for each of the dishes my colleagues and I ordered - lasgna, meatballs and spaghetti, risotto, and bolognese. 5.We wanted a booth, but there were none available for a party of four. 6.If I had to take one star off my review, I'd say that the service wasn't the best, but my server may just have been having an off night. 7.The wait staff were prompt with the drinks and someone was always around to attend to our needs. 8.Our server was friendly and affable. src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.The location was extremely silent and I found that I was not disturbed during my time on this trip. 2.Our room was a bit noisy as we could hear the televisions nearby. 3.Also, due to the popularity of this place, it is quite noisy. 4.We didn't like how much traffic there was by the bed and breakfast. 5.We would consider staying there again on a less busy weekend in hopes that the traffic noise wouldn't be so bad. 6.The walls were also very thin and you could hear the people staying in the room next to you. 7.The B&B is pretty quiet and well appointed, and the staff goes out of their way to be friendly. 8.It was very noisy while we were trying to sleep. src_text: reviews of ASK RESTAURANT: 1.But if you dine in, expect to leave with a full belly and a smile! 2.The lasagna was delectable and the meatballs not only were the size of baseballs, but they had a great flavor of onion and garlic in them and they were just amazing. 3.I'm so bummed out that Ask Restaurant isn't generous with their portion sizes, because everything else about the place is terrific! 4.That's not to say that their food isn't high quality, because it absolutely is, but it just doesn't feel like a good value because of their portions. 5.We all liked the service and portions given to us. 6.The portions were massive, which could explain why they cost as much as they did. 7.Their specialty menu of alcoholic drinks is extensive and surprisingly affordable, and you'll get to enjoy the ambiance without being disappointed with the size of their entrees. 8.The prices were a little higher than I would like for the portion sizes, and I feel like the server got too much into schmoozing with the people a few tables over to give us the attention we needed, so that could be worked on. 9.Portion sizes are really generous for the price, so sharing is encouraged. 10.The food is great and you get a lot of it, but bring your wallet, it gets pricey. 11.The portions were great and everything was at a decent price point. 12.When they brought the plates out I was surprised only one person could carry it. reviews of PIZZA HUT CITY CENTRE: 1.Pizza Hut City Centre has some good food portion sizes. 2.Food obviously isn't the best and it's on the pricey size, but it'll fill ya up quick. 3.The inside is nice and you get a lot of food for the money. 4.The foods were delicious and the food portions were good. [SEP] U: I want to find a brazilian restaurant that is cheap. S: I'm very sorry, there are no results for cheap Brazilian restaurants. Would you like to try for a different type of cuisine? U: Do you have any restaurants in the centre? S: I have 5 different cheap restaurants in the centre. Three are chinese restaurants, and the other two serve asian oriental. Do you have a preference? U: How about a Italian restaurant located in the centre S: There are three in that area. Pizza Hut City Centre, Ask, and Zizzi Cambridge. Is there any more information you'd like about any of them? U: How generous are their portions? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Both Pizza Hut and Ask have really good reviews on their portion sizes with customers thrilled at the generous amounts. Would you like to know more about them?

trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Past customers seem to differ in their opinion of the food portions. Some people describe them as big, leading to leftovers, but others say they are a little small.

src_text: reviews of SESAME RESTAURANT AND BAR: 1.I wish the portions were bigger though. 2.The bar is located in a very good spot by the lakeside, and they definitely offer generous portions of good. 3.I wished the portions were bigger. 4.It is a smaller portion size but it is authentic and fresh. 5.Also, please give us more food portions! reviews of TANG CHINESE: 1.The food isn't to rave about but the portions are huge and I always have leftovers. 2.The portions were excellent and the food was of high quality for sure. 3.The food was also very very good, but the portions could've bigger. 4.The portions are huge so no complaint there. 5.The portions were perfect and I feel like I got my money's worth. reviews of UGLY DUCKLING: 1.You get a lot of food and drinks are priced good. 2.Everything was really affordable and the portions were big. 3.The portion sizes were tremendous and the food was clearly of great quality. 4.Ugly Duckling is a Chinese restaurant that makes for a good date night experience, but only if your date has a small appetite. 5.I also liked the stunning view and how cheap and filling the food was. 6.The quality of food was good and the portions were also good. 7.Thankfully, Ugly Duckling is an affordable restaurant so you can always get extra dishes to share, but it's disappointing to see a small plate arrive to your table when you're feeling really hungry. 8.I liked the fact that the portion of the food were quite generous. 9.My wife and I loved our dumplings and scrambled eggs with tomatoes; we thought that both dishes tasted really authentic and were nicely prepared, but the portion sizes were just so small! reviews of HK FUSION: 1.We were all disappointed in what they considered to be a normal portion, as it stated it could feed 4-6 people, but you'd be lucky to feed 2 people. 2.The serving sizes were quite large, which was a plus as we came hungry, and we also decided to add the Scrambled Eggs with Tomatoes as it sounded so appealing. 3.The meal portions were just right. 4.However, they really make the portions incredibly small. [SEP] U: I'm trying to see if they serve drinks on the Riverboat Georgina S: Unfortunately, I do not know if they serve drinks on the Riverboat Georgina. Would you like their phone number? U: Actually, that's ok. I can find out later. But can you tell me what attraction type they are? S: Riverboat georgina is a boat. U: Can you tell me what area they are in and what their postcode is please? S: They are in the north and their postcode is cb43ax U: I bet I'll be hungry after visiting the Georgina so can you please find me a  chinese restaurant in the centre? S: sure! i have 10 options for you in that area. U: Thank you, the restaurant should be in the expensive price range. S: I have 4 listings that meet your criteria. Ugly Duckling, Tang Chinese, HK Fusion, and Sesame Restaurant and Bar. Would you like more information on one of these? U: What are the portion sizes like at these restaurants? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The portion sizes at HK Fusion and Sesame Restaurant and Bar are considered a bit small, while those at Tang Chinese and Ugly Duckling are on the larger side.

src_text: reviews of CITYROOMZ: 1.When we first entered the room we were blown away by the views that can be seen, and the bathroom was especially clean. 2.I am actually really missing that view right about now. 3.We actually heard that the views were good, and we weren't disappointed. 4.It really does have a great view, and the staff made us feel very welcome. [SEP] U: I need a place to stay in Cambridge that includes free wifi. I don't need free parking. S: Would you like to try cityroomz?  I can book it for you? src_text: reviews of GONVILLE HOTEL: 1.I loved the 24 hour service at the front desk and the view was impeccable! 2.Our room had an excellent view of the surrounding sights and attractions. 3.It was a really stunning view to wake up to every morning, and romantic to look at in the evenings. [SEP] U: Could you provide me with information about the Huntingdon Marriott hotel? S: The huntingdon marriott hotel is an expensive hotel in the west with a 4 star rating. Would you like to make a booking? U: Yes. I want to book it for 7 people. We will be staying for 4 nights starting from Monday. S: I'm sorry, that isn't available.  Can I find a different hotel for you today? U: Yes lets look  for a 3 star rating hotel,please. S: I was able to get a room for you at gonville hotel for monday. Your reference number is 96GT1K88. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, guests all rave about the impeccable views of the surrounding sights and attractions at the Gonville Hotel.

src_text: reviews of FINCHES BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.Unfortunately the room wasn't too clean. 2.The bathroom was clean but the rest of the room wasn't. 3.But where the room amenities are concerned, I was happy with the size and cleanliness of the room, and the bed was super comfortable. src_text:
reviews of THE CAMBRIDGE BELFRY: 1.The room was clean, not a spot anywhere. 2.On the other hand the room wasn't very clean and I felt uncomfortable sitting in the chairs or using the bathroom for fear of germs. 3.We enjoyed our stay the bed were comfortable and the room was clean. [SEP] U: I'm going to Cambridge and interested in trying some restaurants. Can you recommend one that serves traditional food? S: can please provide more information to help us serve you better. U: Just someting in the moderate price range is all I care about really. S: My apologies.  There is nothing in the moderate price range that is traditional.  Would you like to try a different type of restaurant? U: How about modern European food? S: How does the riverside brasserie sound? It's at the Doubletree. U: Sounds good can you make a booking for 7 people at 16:45 on saturday. S: Booking was successful. The table will be reserved for 15 minutes.
Reference number is : RB2JTPWC.  Can I help with anything else today? U: I also need to get some information about The Cambridge Belfry hotel. Can you give me the price range and how many stars it has? S: The hotel is on the west side and has 4 stars. It is a cheap hotel. Would you like to make a booking? U: Does this place have clean rooms? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Most guests have found their rooms to be spotless, but there is one negative comment about cleanliness.  It seems like the staff does a very good job for the most part though.

src_text: reviews of GONVILLE HOTEL: 1.Room service was available, and the food was very unique and delicious, and the staff that brought it to us were always super friendly and professional. 2.Also the staffs were well trained, they helped me with the things that I needed and were polite at all times asking me what they could do more for me. reviews of UNIVERSITY ARMS HOTEL: 1.I did not find the staff very responsive or helpful. 2.When attempting to troubleshoot my issue with staff, they were disrespectful and rude. 3.Another added merit was that the hotel staff was very friendly and polite. [SEP] U: I am trying to find out about trains that arrive in Cambridge S: There are quite a few trains coming into Cambridge. Where will you be departing from? U: I want to arrive by 16:15 S: Okay. First, let's find out you're departing from. U: I will be departing from stevenage and going to cambridge. S: There's a train running every day leaving at 13:54 and arriving at 14:43. Did you have a particular day in mind? U: I am looking to travel on Monday. S: The latest train arrives by 14:43 would you like me to book that for you? U: That should work! I will also need a place to stay. I am looking for a guesthouse in the centre of town, in the expensive range. It should include free wifi as well. S: I am terribly sorry no guesthouses are available, how about a hotel stay instead? U: Sure, let's look at hotels instead, then. S: I found two hotels do you want the detail information for the hotels? U: Do either of them have free parking included? S: Yes, they both offer free parking. U: Could you provide the details? S: The Gonville Hotel is on Gonville Place and is rated 3 stars. The University Arms Hotel is 4 stars and it's on Regent Street. Would you like to book a room? U: Before I do, does either hotel offer friendly staff? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: For the most part, Gonville Hotel had better staff representation. Friendly, polite, and were professional and helped assist. The University Arms Hotel said only one thought staff was helpful while others said rude.

src_text: reviews of THE NIRALA: 1.The location could not be better: right in the heart of the city with excellent views after the sun goes down. 2.They also have a modest drinks menu with some affordable prices, but I was more interested in the beautiful view from my window seat, which allowed me to watch the sun setting as I dined. 3.The only places they can use some improvement in is giving it all a better view which might also bring up the atmosphere as well 4.I have to say, the service was excellent, and the views from the restaurant can't be beat. Would you like to book here? U: Does it mention anything about a comfortable bed? S: <extra_id_0>

src_text: reviews of ALLENBELL: 1.The facilities, especially the bathroom were super-clean and sanitary. 2.During my recent stay at ALLENBELL with your family, I was impressed by the big room with a clean bathroom. [SEP] U: I'm coming to town for an overdue visit with my relatives. Can you help me find a place to stay? S: I can definitely help with that. Are you leaning toward a guesthouse or hotel? U: I prefer a guesthouse with free WiFi. S: Acorn Guest House is available. U: I really want to stay in the east and be 4-star rated. Does the Acorn fit that? S: Sorry, it doesn't. However there are 6 guesthouses that do. Would you prefer something cheap? U: The price range doesn't matter. I need to book a room for Monday. S: Could you tell me how many nights are you wanting to stay, and with how many people, so I can see what is available? U: 2 people, for 4 nights. S: I was able to book the Allenbell for 2 people for 4 nights. Would that work for you? U: Are their restrooms sanitized and pristine? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: According to the reviews that I have on hand for that location, the bathrooms there are sanitary and impressively clean!

src_text: reviews of THE CAMBRIDGE BELFRY: 1.One of the best things about the hotel is the view of the mountains from the balcony. 2.The staff was polite they took out luggage to our room, and our room had a spectacular view of the forest and nature. [SEP] U: Hi I need to find a place to stay with a 3 star rating with free parking S: There are 6 four star hotels in Cambridge. Do you have a preferred price range? trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Cambridge Belfry has a spectacular view of the mountains, the forest and all nature has to offer from your balcony room. The staff is great and very helpful with getting your luggage to your room.

src_text: reviews of WARKWORTH HOUSE: 1.The room and hotel had a fast wifi which was useful and not aggravatingly slow like we've all seen, the room was large and I liked that too. 2.When I needed to use the Internet, I found that the wireless Internet was extremely quick and more than enough for my business needs. 3.The Warkworth House has good Wi-Fi which I used a lot because I travelled alone. 4.My work called me up and needed me to go on a business trip, so I went here, and oh boy I must say they have really good breakfast options and the WiFi was super fast. FAQs of WARKWORTH HOUSE: 1.There is wifi at Warkworth House. 2.Warkworth House offers free WiFi. [SEP] U: Good morning. I am planning a visit to Cambridge and need some help with details. I hear there are a lot of places to see. S: There are plenty of attractions. What area of town are you interested in? U: I am interested in the east part of town. S: There are 10 different attractions on the east side. There's a boat, a couple of entertainment venues, a few museums, a multiple sports complex, a park, and a swimming pool. U: Great!   What I really need is a guesthouse in the East,  What do you have available? S: There are 6 guesthouses in the east area. What price range are you looking for? U: Price does not matter but it needs to have free parking. S: 5 places offer, I recommend warkworth house, would you like me to book you? U: Is their internet connectin strong? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Those with previous experience staying at the Warkworth House commentated that their internet connection was fast and reliable.

Can I get the phone number for the Gonville Hotel? S: Sure thing. Their phone number is 	01223366611 . Is there anything else I can help you with? U: I am looking for a restaurant that is in the centre of city and is expensive. Can you help me with that? S: I sure can.  If there is a specific type of food you are interested in that would help to narrow down the possibilities. U: I don't really care. It's for a business meeting so just need to make sure it's expensive so it's nice. S: The Cambridge Chop House would be my recommendation, would you like me to book it for you? src_text: FAQs of HK FUSION: 1.HK Fusion offers outdoor seating options. reviews of HK FUSION: 1.We were immediately seated on the rooftop which allowed for an close and intimate dinner and a wonderful time people watching. 2.I chose outdoor seating because I wanted some fresh air. 3.I liked the dining area since they had a nice outdoor dining area. 4.I visited this restaurant with my friends and we were all very please with the nice outdoor seating area. 5.On top of that, while the restaurant had a nice outdoor seating area, it's in the middle of a strip mall so there's literally no view to speak of. 6.The outdoor dining area felt inviting, serene and comfortable. trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, HK fusion offers a very nice outdoor seating area that customers seem to really enjoy. Do you want to know anything else?

src_text: reviews of LA RAZA: 1.I was hungry for some great Spanish food and La Raza didn't disappoint at all. 2.She seemed to really enjoy it, I had paella and liked that too. 3.The Paella I ordered was delicious, with high-qualify seafood like fresh clams and shrimp, and the Tortilla Espanola I ordered with it was thick, filling and made with the finest potatoes. reviews of LA TASCA: 1.We tried the gazpacho, paella, leche frita, and fabada and it was all good. 2.There is a lot of authentic spanish cuisine to choose from.
