src_text:
reviews of THE CAMBRIDGE BELFRY: 1.Also, the location itself was extremely loud and made our experience difficult to enjoy. [SEP] U: I would like to find some place to go in town where I can look at architecture. Can you help? S: There are five architecture attractions, all located in the center of town. There are four churches and one school. U: Awesome, tell me more about the church closest to me right now and get me their phone number please S: All saints church is located at jesus lane and has free entrance. Their phone number is 01223452587. Can I be of any further assistance? U: Ya I am also looking for a hotel to stay.  Would prefer one that doesn't have wifi if possible. S: Unfortunately, all the hotels in town have internet available.  Is there a particular price range your looking at? U: Wifi will be fine then.  Just something cheap and basic will be good. Do you know of such a place? S: How about the cambridge belfry located at back lane cambourne? U: I appreciate you finding wifi for me! S: Did you need me to book a room at the Cambridge Belfry for you? U: Yes, please. I need a reservation for Saturday, 4 nights and 2 people. S: Booking was successful.
Reference number is : 3U32C59A. Can I help with anything else? U: Is this place quiet? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The place is said to be extremely loud to the point that it makes it very hard for people  to even enjoy it.

src_text: reviews of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.We stayed at the Acorn guest house and I loved the view. 2.Outside of the balcony of my room, I found that the exquisite view was unlike anything I've ever seen before. 3.The wi-fi was super fast though and the room provided a great view. 4.I also enjoyed the great view as that helped me take a moment to enjoy some peace and quiet. 5.We didn't care so much if it had other things, but a great view and good location, were not things we were going to give a little on. [SEP] U: I am looking for a moderate priced place to stay. S: Yes, let me help you with that. In what area of town would you like to stay? U: I would like a place in the centre with free parking. S: I do not have anything like that, perhaps another criteria for you? U: Sure, let's try the north instead please S: There are several options in the north, would you like me to recommend one? U: Yes and book it for 3 people and 3 nights starting from wednesday. S: Okay I have booked The Acorn Guest House for Wednesday for 3 people and for 3 days. Your reference number is F821XS1G. Is there anything else I can help with? U: Yes, can you tell me if the room you booked has a good view? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Universally previous guests have complimented themviews offered at The Acorn Guesthouse. They said that the views were beautiful, unlike anything they had ever seen, and help some guests relax.

src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.The location was extremely silent and I found that I was not disturbed during my time on this trip. 2.Our room was a bit noisy as we could hear the televisions nearby. 3.Also, due to the popularity of this place, it is quite noisy. 4.We didn't like how much traffic there was by the bed and breakfast. 5.We would consider staying there again on a less busy weekend in hopes that the traffic noise wouldn't be so bad. 6.The walls were also very thin and you could hear the people staying in the room next to you. 7.The B&B is pretty quiet and well appointed, and the staff goes out of their way to be friendly. 8.It was very noisy while we were trying to sleep. [SEP] U: i'm looking for a place called kambar S: Sure, I found it!  It's located at 1 Wheeler Street.  It's a nightclub in the city's centre and it has a 5 pounds entrance fee. U: Please give me their postcode S: The postcode for Kambar is CB23QB. U: I also need a place to stay, a hotel with free parking and in the center of town. S: I have 2 hotels in the expensive price range and 2 guesthouses in the cheap price range. Do you have a preference? U: I would prefer a guesthouse S: I have two to choose from. May I recommend The Alexander Bed and Breakfast? U: Is the room quiet there? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: I've seen a lot of reviews stating it's quite noisy inside and out, due to traffic. Would you like me to find another place with better reviews on quietness?

src_text: FAQs of CITYROOMZ: 1.The Wifi service is 5 GBP/Day at Cityroomz. reviews of CITYROOMZ: 1.The only two good points were honestly the lack of fees for parking and Wi-Fi. [SEP] U: I'm looking for the cambridge and county folk museum. S: the cambridge and county folk museum is located 2-3 castle street U: Thanks, can you also give me the entrance fee, phone number, and postcode? S: The fee is 3.5 pounds, the number is 01223355159, and the code is cb30aq. U: I also need a place to stay. S: Okay. Would you like to narrow it down by the area, price range, or type? U: Do you have any 0 star places? S: I have 2 guesthouses and 1 hotel that are 0 stars, do you have a preference or want a particular area of town? U: Is there one in the moderate price range? S: Yes, Cityroomz is in the moderate price range. Would you like to make a reservation? U: Yes, that would be great. There will be 7 of us. S: I'd be happy to make a reservation for the 7 of you.  I will need to know what day to start your reservation and for how many nights, please. U: I'd like to start on Friday please and stay for 3 nights.  I will also need the reference number. S: Your reservation for 7 people at Cityroomz this friday for 4 days 3 nights was successful. Your Reference number is : SOF4G9MY. Anything else I can do for you? U: Is there a fee to use the hotel's WiFi? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: One past guest of Cityroomz says that the wifi is free while another said that there was a charge of 5 pounds.

src_text: FAQs of BRIDGE GUEST HOUSE: 1.Breakfast is continental and full English/Irish. reviews of BRIDGE GUEST HOUSE: 1.The location is convenient and the breakfast was good which was given as I arrived at morning. 2.In the morning, the breakfast also had pretty good options. 3.Also, I found that the provided morning food options were abundant and delicious. [SEP] U: Hello, I am planing to visit Cambridge and I am looking for a swimmingpool. S: Okay, there are four places in town. Do you prefer a particular area? U: It doesn't matter. I will need the address, phone number, and area of town. S: Ok, I recommend parkside pools in the centre of town, they are located on gonville place and are reachable at 01223446100. U: That's great thanks. Also I need a hotel in the south. S: I have 4 different options for you. 3 guesthouses and 1 hotel. The hotel is expensive, whereas the others are moderate or cheap. Do you have a preferred price range? U: Not really, just get me one with 3 stars please S: There are 2, The Bridge a moderately priced and the Lensfeild inthe expensive price range.  Both are in the South and offer free parking and internet. U: The Bridge is fine, please. S: Would you like to book the Bridge Guest House? U: Do they offer an American breakfast? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: No, the breakfast they provide is said to be fully English or Irish. do you want to look elsewhere or is that ok?

src_text: reviews of THE CAMBRIDGE BELFRY: 1.The room was clean, not a spot anywhere. 2.On the other hand the room wasn't very clean and I felt uncomfortable sitting in the chairs or using the bathroom for fear of germs. 3.We enjoyed our stay the bed were comfortable and the room was clean. [SEP] U: i am looking for a hotel in Cambridge called the cambridge belfry S: That hotel is in the West and listed as cheap, but still has 4-stars. They provide free parking and internet. Would you like to make a reservation? U: How clean are the rooms? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: All the customers who spoke up stated that the rooms at the THE CAMBRIDGE BELFRY are clean, spotless in fact.

src_text: reviews of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.We stayed at the Acorn guest house and I loved the view. 2.Outside of the balcony of my room, I found that the exquisite view was unlike anything I've ever seen before. 3.The wi-fi was super fast though and the room provided a great view. 4.I also enjoyed the great view as that helped me take a moment to enjoy some peace and quiet. 5.We didn't care so much if it had other things, but a great view and good location, were not things we were going to give a little on. [SEP] U: I'm looking a train that is leaving on Thursday but will arrive by 09:30 to Cambridge. S: Okay, and where are you leaving from? U: i will depart from birmingham new street S: TR3736 arrives in Cambridge at 09:23. U: That would be great. Please book tickets for 7 people. I'll also need a reference number, if possible. S: Okay I booked it for you and your reference number is 0LYL0J3V. U: Thank you. I will also need a place to stay in the north. I'd like something that includes free parking. S: Okay and what is your price range? U: It doesn't really matter as long as the parking is free. I don't even need internet. S: when is your stay? U: Let's go with Thursday. S: Ok great. I highly suggest the Acorn Guest House. Would you like for me to book a room? U: yeah book it for the same group of people please S: Booking for 1 night at acorn guest house was successful. Reference number VO8YM3X4. The address is 154 chesterton road, phone 01223353888, postcode cb41da. Will you need anything else? U: Will I enjoy the view from my room here? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The rooms at the Acorn Guest House are equipped with beautiful views. Would you like to know anything else?

src_text: FAQs of MEZE BAR: 1.Meze Bar serves alcohol. reviews of MEZE BAR: 1.The service is great and they have a nice drink selection. 2.The food was good but they really didn't give me much and there were no gluten free options available but the nice location of the restaurant and the various drink options didn't make up for that. 3.I was disappointed in my beer as there were only mediocre choices for drinks. 4.The establishment has many drink options, vegetarian options, and the food prices were highly affordable. [SEP] U: I'm looking for an attraction called Christ's college. S: Christ's College is located on Saint Andrew's Street in the centre area of the city.  Would you like the phone number? U: What is the attraction type? S: It is a college attraction.  Is there anything else you need to know? U: I need a restaurant that serves scandinavian food please. S: I'm sorry, there are not Scandinavian places in Cambridge. U: how about turkish food? S: There are 3 turkish restaurants in the centre. Do you have a price range in mind? U: I'd like to impress my colleagues, so something expensive please. S: I'd recommend Meze Bar Restaurant at 196 Mill Road City Center. Would you like a reservation? U: Does it have many beer options? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Unfortunately, some customers that have dined at the Meze Bar were disappointed in the mediocre choice of beer, although some would disagree.

src_text: reviews of HOBSONS HOUSE: 1.The view from the room was also breathtaking. 2.The view from the room was also amazing, and the cleanliness of the bathroom was top notch. [SEP] U: Are there any trains on Monday? S: Yes, there are 404 of them. Where are you heading? U: I'm heading to cambridge from peterborough. S: What day and time would you like to leave? U: I want to arrive at 19:45. I would like a ticket for 1 person. S: I have several trains available arriving by that time.  What time would you like to leave? U: It doesn't matter what time I leave as long as I arrive by 19:45. After you book me a ticket can you provide me with the reference number please. S: I have booked train TR7917 and it leaves at 18:48. The reference number is 78GFL146. U: I also need a 3 star guesthouse to stay at. Internet and parking are not important to me. S: Well I have several options that are all moderately priced. What area of town would you like to stay in? U: ANy area is fine, I'll go with what you recommend. S: I found you the hobsons house in the west side of town. Would you like me to book a room for you? U: Do rooms at hobsons house have a good view of the surrounding area? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: According to the reviews that I have on hand for this location, the view has been described as breathtaking and amazing!  Sounds good, right?

src_text: reviews of UNIVERSITY ARMS HOTEL: 1.The negatives is that the bathroom wasn't that clean when we first arrived and that the beds could've been more comfortable. 2.The place had everything we needed, a large big room that never felt cramp, a nice clean bathroom, and a very kid-friendly atmosphere. 3.When we went to use the facilities at this hotel, we both noticed how the bathrooms had been cleaned and they were pristine in quality. reviews of GONVILLE HOTEL: 1.They have room service which was nice, and the bathroom was super clean. 2.Having a very clean bathroom upon arrival made it more comfortable right away. [SEP] U: I am looking for a hotel near the mall. The hotel should has free indoor parking, even it doesn't include internet. S: Ok. There are several hotels with parking available. What specific area of town are you wanting? U: I want to be in the area with the mall. Which hotel is the closest to the mall? S: That would be in the centre of town. I have two options for you. Gonville Hotel and University Arms Hotel. Would you like more info on one of those? U: Do either of those hotels have free wifi? S: Both the Gonville and the University Arms have free wifi and free parking. Would you like to make a reservation at one of those? U: Which one provides its customers with a clean bathroom? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Gonville hotel has better reviews for their bathroom cleanliness than the university aren't Hotel. Would you like to make a reservation there?

src_text: reviews of AVALON: 1.I did enjoy the spacious room and the view was an unexpected plus. 2.However, the room in which I stayed felt cramped and small. [SEP] U: i need a place to stay S: Okay! What part of town would you like to stay in? U: I'd prefer something in the North, a 4 star hotel with free wifi if possible. S: There are no 4 start hotels in the north with free wifi. U: would you like to book something without free wifi, or in another area. S: There are no 4 star hotels in the north are with free internet. Is there anything else I can help you with? U: What about a guesthouse with 4 stars in the north? S: Yes, I see several guesthouses available! They are all in the moderate price range; does parking matter to you? U: The parking does not matter. S: Yes, I would recommend Avalon.  It is at 62 Gilbert Road, postcode cb43pd. U: How much space do the rooms have? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: People disagree about the amount of space in the rooms. Some found them to be spacious, but others found them small and cramped.

src_text: reviews of THE LENSFIELD HOTEL: 1.The spa was not worth the price though, and the room could have been a lot bigger. 2.The big negative was how small the room was. 3.We were pretty cramped during our stay. 4.It did not seem so tiny online. 5.The room was a little small for my tastes, and I did feel a little cramped even though I was by myself. [SEP] U: Could you tell me if there are any corsica restaurants in the south side? S: There aren't any corsica restaurants located in the south side. U: That's fine, how about Chinese in the same area? S: Yes, there are three Chinese restaurants in the South. Would you prefer cheap or expensive? U: I am not bothered about the price. Why don't you select one and provide me with their telephone number and price range? S: the good luck chinese food takeaway	is expensive and the postcode is cb17ag U: What is its phone number S: Their phone number is 01223244149.  Would like to book a table? U: Yes can you please? S: Yes, I can. How many people will be with you, on what day and at what time would you like your reservation? U: Actually, that is all the information I need.  I do need a place to stay in the same area. S: There are 3 guesthouses and 1 hotel in the south. Do you have a certain price range you are looking for? U: I would like a 3 star expensive place please. S: I found The Lensfield Hotel located at 53-57 lensfield road.  Would you like me to book that for you now? U: Can you tell me if they have a large room? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Guests were dissatisfied with the room size calling it small and cramped. Do you have any other questions about The Lensfield Hotel?

src_text: reviews of EXPRESS BY HOLIDAY INN CAMBRIDGE: 1.We were all thrilled with the great view from the hotel. 2.It was very beautiful. 3.While the noise issue was frustrating, I did like the great view from my hotel room, and I took advantage of the really wonderful spa facility that was available. 4.The only two good points were the great view and that the hotel was generally pretty quiet. [SEP] U: Are there any accommodations in the east part of town that off free parking? S: I have 6 places. Would you prefer a guesthouse or a hotel? U: I want it to be a hotel and also include free wifi. S: I have the express by holiday inn cambridge. Would you like me to book it for you? U: Does it have a good view? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: One of the best points of the hotel according to previous guests is that views were really nice, and that the hotel had some great views from the rooms.

src_text: reviews of GONVILLE HOTEL: 1.I loved the 24 hour service at the front desk and the view was impeccable! 2.Our room had an excellent view of the surrounding sights and attractions. 3.It was a really stunning view to wake up to every morning, and romantic to look at in the evenings. [SEP] U: I need to go to broxbourne on monday S: Okay, not  problem. Would you like to travel by train or taxi? Where are you departing from? U: Train, Monday, to Broxbourne from Cambridge. S: Is there a time you need to leave or arrive by? U: I need to leave Cambridge after 21:15 S: There are two trains you can take on Monday, either the 22:01 (arrive 23:01) or the 23:01 (arrive 24:01). Which train do you prefer? U: Thank you that will work fine for me and my husband S: Would you like me to book the 22:01? U: Yes that would be great, and it'll just be me. Could you also find me a place to stay? S: The booking was successful your reference number is UNUTWNQN and the total is 17.89 GBA. I can is do you have a price range and what area? U: I'd like to stay in an expensive three star place with free parking. Is there anything like that? S: I have 2 options  - I would like to suggest the gonville hotel at gonville place. Is there anything else I could help you with? U: The Gonville Hotel sounds ok can you provide the the telephone number and do they have internet? S: The Gonville does offer both free parking and free internet. You can reach them at 01223366611. Is there anything else I can help with? U: Does it have a good view from the room? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Gonville Hotel offers rooms which have an incredible  stunning view which is beautiful especially in the mornings.

src_text: reviews of HOBSONS HOUSE: 1.I also like tidy spaces, so it was great to have a clean room to sleep. [SEP] U: I am planning a trip in Cambridge S: Great - how can I help you? U: I am looking for a moderately price place to stay while i'm there. S: Do you have an area you prefer? U: I would like to be in the west. S: hobsons house meets your needs. Would you like to make a reservation? U: Are the rooms super clean? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes, the room is pleasing to people who like tidy spaces. Should I book you a room at Hobsons House for your Cambridge visit?

src_text: reviews of UNIVERSITY ARMS HOTEL: 1.The view from my room was really picturesque, and the bed offered a really comfortable night of sleep. 2.Staying at this place was great, as I was able to enjoy the view with my girlfriend. 3.The positives are that the location was great and so was the view. reviews of GONVILLE HOTEL: 1.I loved the 24 hour service at the front desk and the view was impeccable! 2.It was a really stunning view to wake up to every morning, and romantic to look at in the evenings. 3.Our room had an excellent view of the surrounding sights and attractions. [SEP] U: Hello, can you recommend an expensive restaurant in Cambridge? S: We have a lot of them. Any specific location? U: I was hoping to find a place that serves Indian food. S: I have 14 restaurants that serve expensive indian food. Is there area of town you would like? U: I'm looking for a restaurant in the center of town. S: I am unable to find any Indian restaraunts in the the center of town.  Can you narrow down your preferred area please? U: An expensive Indian restaurant in the centre, I will require the address and phone number please. S: I'm not getting any results for those specific, do you want to try something else? U: I'm really looking for an Indian restaurant in the expensive price range in the town centre.  What can you recommend? S: I would recommend The Curry Garden in the city center. U: I need an address and phone number for the restaurant. S: Their address is 106 Regent Street City Centre and phone is 01223302330.  Is there anything else you require? U: I am also looking for a place to stay in the same area and same price range. S: I have two hotel in the Centre, shall I book one? U: Does one not have free internet? S: Both Gonville Hotel and University Arms Hotel have free wifi and are expensive options in the centre of town. U: Can I get a room with a good view? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Both Glonville Hotel and University Arms Hotel have been complimented for the views from the hotel. Noting that the views are impeccable, and romantic.

src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.For what it is, it's got a great little view, and the location is very accessible to many other things. 2.The visuals of the location were stunning and I found that the places outside of the location had much to offer as well. 3.Especially with the wonderful view of the ocean. 4.I was looking for a room with a great view and that's the primary reason why I booked my stay at the Alexander Bed and Breakfast. [SEP] U: Hello! I'm lookng for someplace to go in the centre. S: I have many attractions in the center of town. Do you have a specific type in mind? U: I would like to visit a museum. S: There are 11 museums in the centre what type of museum would you like to visit? U: Well I also will be needing somewhere to stay. Is there a museum located close to a hotel? S: There are several hotel options in the centre if you are interested in staying that part of town. U: First let's work out what attraction I'll choose. Can you pick me your favorite in the centre and tell me their address and entrance fee, please? S: The Primavera is a nice museum with free entrance and is located at 10 king s parade, postcode cb21sj.  Is there anything else I can help you with? U: Can you recommend me a hotel with free wifi in the same area? S: I have 5 different places that ranges from cheap to expensive. Do you have a preferred price range? U: Something cheap with free wifi would be perfect, I'm trying to keep this trip from busting my budget. S: I suggest Alexander Bed and Breakfast. It is cheap and has 4 stars. Would you like me to make a reservation for you? U: Can you tell me if they have nice views from the rooms? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Past guests of the Alexander Bed and Breakfast seemed thoroughly impressed by the view of the ocean.

src_text: reviews of HOBSONS HOUSE: 1.The view from the room was also breathtaking. 2.The view from the room was also amazing, and the cleanliness of the bathroom was top notch. [SEP] U: I need information for a train from cambridge to norwich. S: There are several trains departing from Cambridge arriving in Norwich at a price of 17.60 pounds.  What day are you looking to travel? U: I am looking to travel on Sunday, and leave after 21:30 S: I have train TR7767 leaving at 21:36 and arriving by 22:55. Would that be something that would work for you? U: Yes please book for 1 person and send the reference number. S: Okay, I've done that for you. Your reference number is 0TDRHZKN. U: Thank you. I also need a place to stay. Can you find me a three star guesthouse? S: Sure, what area of town are you interested in? U: In the centre I guess.  I do need free parking. S: I'm sorry, there aren't any 3 star guesthouses in the centre, would you like to try another level? U: No, can you check for a 3 star guesthouse in the west? S: Yes, there is the hobsons house. Shall I go ahead and book that for you? U: Not yet, could you first let me know whether Hobsons House offers good views from the rooms? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Yes there are good views at Hobsons House. Former guests describe the views as amazing and breathtaking.

src_text: reviews of LOVELL LODGE: 1.It was clean and we enjoyed the comfortable bed. 2.The clean room was very welcoming and I thought it was good value, considering what I had paid for it. 3.The Lovell Lodge was really nice, with clean rooms. 4.The room was clean though and the bed was probably more comfortable than the one I have at home. [SEP] U: I'm looking for some kind of specific places to go later today. S: There is so much to do here, what part of town are you in? U: I'm in the centre.  How about something architecture? S: We have 5 options for you. Great Saint Mary's Church is 2 pounds and located on Market Square. I also have All Saints Church on Jesus Lane with free admission. U: All saints church would be nice. Could I get a phone number for them? S: Sure. Their phone number is 01223452587. U: Can you locate me an Irish restaurant near the church? S: I am not able to access that information, is there anything else I can help with? U: Yes, I am looking for a particular hotel, lovell lodge. S: It's a 2 star moderately priced hotel in the north. Would you like the address and a room? U: Does the lovell lodge have clean rooms to stay in? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: According to the reviews I have on hand for this location, the rooms here are really nice and clean!  Sound good to you?

src_text: reviews of ASHLEY HOTEL: 1.The room was large and had central heat and air, had two beds and a separate area with a couch and television. 2.The rooms are definitely overpriced and on the smaller side, but not too bad. 3.The room and bed were ample and comfortable. 4.The Ashley Hotel has big rooms, and really comfortable beds. [SEP] U: I am looking for information in Cambridge. S: What sort of information are you looking for? U: Can I have some information about the Ashley hotel? Does it have internet? S: Yes, Ashley Hotel has internet and free parking. It is located in the north and is on 74 Chesterton Road. Would you like me to book a room? U: Does the Ashley Hotel have larger sized rooms? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The rooms are large and spacious making them very comfortable. They also offer free parking and internet connection.

src_text: reviews of EL SHADDAI: 1.I would expect to pay a lot more considering where the hotel is located. 2.The hotel is a great value for money. 3.Given the location of the hotel, the value of money was good, too. reviews of CITY CENTRE NORTH B AND B: 1.Considering the place is a bit overpriced, we expected more. 2.The room was very fairly priced considering how nice it was and all of the amenities provided. 3.Overall, I feel like I got a good value for the money, but the lack of concierge services was a really disappointment. [SEP] U: Could you help me find a 0 star lodging with free parking? S: Certainly, we have City Centre North B&B in the north and El Shaddai in the centre, both very affordable. Would you like to book one? U: I want to make sure also, that it is a hotel and includes free wifi S: Both City Centre North B and B and El Shaddai have free wifi. Would you like to book one of these? U: Which one of them has the best value for the price? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Moat customers agree that compared to City Center, the El Shaddai have better prices for rooms, and have a better value as well.

src_text: reviews of NANDOS CITY CENTRE: 1.Both food and drinks were reasonably priced, and you get a lot of food for your money. 2.The drinks were decent priced as well even though I didn't drink any alcohol. 3.The dishes were cooked perfectly and we were able to order a lot as the prices for the dishes and the beer were very reasonable. 4.The drinks were very cheap for what I got. FAQs of NANDOS CITY CENTRE: 1.Nandos City Centre serves alcohol. [SEP] U: I'm looking for a restaurant called nandos city centre S: Yes, it is located at 33-34 Saint Andrews Street cb23ar. U: Do the reviews mention the beer being a good value for the price? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Reviews by those with experience dining at the Nandos City Centre regard the drinks to be reasonably priced.

src_text: reviews of INDIA HOUSE: 1.But that's fine because the service we got while dining here was impeccable. 2.The service could be better though. 3.I am not too familiar with Indian food so I asked the waiter for some suggestions, and I settled on the butter chicken and dosa. 4.The food just like the service was impeccable. [SEP] U: Hello, I'm looking for a hotel in the north, and I'd like the more expensive range please. S: I'm sorry, but there are no expensive hotels in the north area. Could I check for one in the moderate price range for you? U: I'm sorry not hotels, guesthouses please. S: There are no guesthouses in the expensive range in the north area.  There are five options, in the moderate range, any other preferences? U: Yes, please check one in the moderate range. S: I have many listings,could I get what star rating to would preferred? U: Honestly, I would prefer if you could suggest one as long as its moderately priced. S: Alright. Does the acorn guest house sound okay? It's 4 stars with free internet and parking. U: That would be fine. Could you also find out some information about the india house restaurant? S: The india house is in the expensive price range and located at 31 Newnham Road Newnham. src_text: reviews of THE VARSITY RESTAURANT: 1.The service was slow, and not many of the windows in the restaurant face anything worth looking out for. 2.It was beside the bay so we had a great view of the ocean from where we were siting. 3.It would have been pretty romantic because it was a nice view, but the indoor decor was kind of tacky. 4.The things we wish were better were the service and the view. 5.The only thing is I would've wished for a better view. 6.The restaurant has a nice view. reviews of BLOOMSBURY RESTAURANT: 1.I really loved the beautiful spot it was at in the city, as well as the awesome view we had from our window. 2.The only bad thing was the view. 3.The restaurant offers a very pretty, picturesque view which gave it a really romantic atmosphere. 4.The food was of good quality, you had a nice view and location but i didn't like the No gluten-free option and Mediocre atmosphere 5.The view wasn't good though. 6.However, the food was just okay and the view was also mediocre. src_text: reviews of ALEXANDER BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.The location was extremely silent and I found that I was not disturbed during my time on this trip. 2.Our room was a bit noisy as we could hear the televisions nearby. 3.Also, due to the popularity of this place, it is quite noisy. 4.We didn't like how much traffic there was by the bed and breakfast. 5.We would consider staying there again on a less busy weekend in hopes that the traffic noise wouldn't be so bad. 6.The walls were also very thin and you could hear the people staying in the room next to you. 7.The B&B is pretty quiet and well appointed, and the staff goes out of their way to be friendly. 8.It was very noisy while we were trying to sleep. [SEP] U: Hi, I'm looking for an attraction in the center of town to visit. S: We have quite a few interesting attractions in the center of town.  Is there anything in particular you would like to see? U: I have no preference, I just need the address, postcode, and entrance fee. S: There are 44 different attractions here in cambridge.  Would you like me to pick one of them for you? U: As long as it is in the centre of town, yes. S: There is the All Saints Church at Jesus Lane. U: Can I get the adress, postcode, and entrance fee? S: No problem. The address is Jesus Lane, postcode cb58bs and the entrance fee is free. What else can I help you with? U: I would like to book the Alexander Bed and Breakfast, for three people and 2 nights starting on Thursday. S: That booking wasn't successful.  Would you like to try a different hotel? U: Can you try for 1 night instead? S: Yes, I was able to book it for one night. your reference number is U4CZ92U1. Is there anything else I can help you with? U: Could you confirm that the Alexander Bed and Breakfast is a soft sounding place to stay? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Because of its popularity and location near the road, the Alexander Bed and Breakfast cannot be considered as being a quiet place to stay.

src_text: reviews of THE GARDENIA: 1.We did not like, however, the few drink options that were offered. 2.The beer were not that great though but there's lots to choose from. 3.The only downside was they didn't have many drinks in general other then some domestic beers and a few wine choices. 4.Only a few cocktails were on the menu. 5.They have lots of choices to choose when it comes to drinks and the drinks were very good, and cheap too. FAQs of THE GARDENIA: 1.The Gardenia serves alcohol. [SEP] U: I need a train to Broxbourne, that arrives by 20:30. S: Certainly. Can I assume you're leaving from Cambridge? U: Yes, that is correct. S: There is a train leaving at 5:01, would you like a seat? U: Is that leaving on Sunday? S: I have the TR8991 leaving at 19:01 and arriving by 20:01. Would you like me to book that for you? U: Not yet but I also need a restaurant that serve mediterranean food and should be in the centre of town. S: I have a few restaurants that fit your criteria. The Gardenia, La Mimosa, and Shiraz Restaurant. Which one are you interested in hearing about? U: Tell me about The Gardenia. S: It's a cheap restaurant located at 2 Rose Crescent City Centre. Phone number and postcode are 01223356354 and cb23ll. Do you need anything else? U: Do they have a good selection of beer? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Gardenia does have alcohol available for diners to drink. They have domestic beers and a few wine choices. There are a lot of beers to choose from.

src_text: reviews of ALLENBELL: 1.The free Internet provided at this location was extremely fast and the connection quality was superb. 2.I also really appreciated the free parking and fast, reliable, free Wi-Fi. FAQs of ALLENBELL: 1.Free WiFi is available at Allenbell. 2.There is free Wifi at Allenbell. [SEP] U: Can you locate me a hotel on the east side with free parking. Please provide me with the reference number. S: We have listings for 5 hotels and 1 guesthouse on the east side with free parking. Do you have a price range in mind so we can narrow it down? U: I would like one with four star. I don't care about the price. S: I have 5 guesthouses that meet that star requirement. The Allenbell, Autumn House, and Leverton House are all cheap. Carolina B&B and Warkworth House are moderate. Do you have a preference? U: Let's try the Allenbell. Could you make a reservation for 1 person, for 5 nights starting Wednesday? S: No problem.  Your reference number is GWQNWQXD.  Anything else? U: I need to be sure that the wifi on site is fast and reliable as my stay will be spent working from my room, can you verify they'll be able to handle my workload? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: I found two reviews that said that the Wi-Fi was reliable or fast. It is also free and included with your room. Do you want to make a reservation?

src_text: reviews of HOBSONS HOUSE: 1.I also saw some hairs in the bathroom, which was evidently not well cleaned. 2.Upon using the bathroom facilities, we all saw that they were pristine and it looks like they had been recently cleaned. 3.The view from the room was also amazing, and the cleanliness of the bathroom was top notch. [SEP] U: I need a place to stay, ideally it should be 3 stars and moderately priced. S: Sure, there are some nice guesthouses to choose from.  Would you like to stay in the north, south, or west of town? U: Centre, please! Thanks! S: Unfortunately there aren't any hotels available in the area that are moderately priced.  Would you like me to look in a different area? U: Ok that's fine, let's try something in the west then please, I really need a room S: There is Hobsons House located in the West that meets your needs. Would you like to book a room now? U: Are their bathrooms pretty nicely kept up? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The majority of guests say their bathroom were very clean, even pristine. However, there was a complaint about the bathroom not being well-cleaned. Would you like to look at some other places or find out more about Hobsons House?

src_text: reviews of THE CAMBRIDGE CHOP HOUSE: 1.We enjoyed some lager that was a bit expensive. FAQs of THE CAMBRIDGE CHOP HOUSE: 1.The Cambridge Chop House serves a full range of alcohol drinks. [SEP] U: Can you tell me what sorts of entertainment are offered in the city center? S: I'm afraid we don't have any entertainment attractions in the city centre. Can I help you find anything else? U: What about a museum? S: Yes, there are 11 museums available in that area. Would you like me to list several of them out so you can choose? U: Never mind. How about colleges? S: I show 13 colleges in the centre area. Would you like one that is free or has an entrance fee? U: what are the ones with an entrance fee? S: Corpus Christi, Saint John's College, and Trinity College have an entrance fee. U: How much is it to get into Trinity College? S: The entrance fee is 1 pound. U: I'm also looking for an expensive restaurant in that area.  I would like to book for 6 people, at 12:00 on Thursday. Can you help me? S: What sort of food would you like it to be? U: You choose. Book me a table for 6 people at 12:00 on Thursday. S: Sounds good. I have booked a table for 6 at the cambridge chop house on Thursday at 12:00. Can I help with anything else? U: Do they have a reasonably priced selection of wines? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: I'm not sure what their wine is like, but one customer said the lager that they got was pretty expensive. Do you want to look somewhere else?

src_text: reviews of FRANKIE AND BENNYS: 1.It was still very good, but I just expected more food than I was given. 2.You do get a lot of food though. 3.It was because the portion sizes were small compared to what I was used to. 4.We got a pizza to share, along with risotto, calzones, and a big portion of meatballs, and everything was well-prepared, arrived hot to our table, and tasted delicious. 5.If you're starving it might be a good option since you get good portions. 6.So it was primarily my kids who ate, and we had leftovers to take home due to the generous portion sizes. reviews of PIZZA HUT CHERRY HINTON: 1.In addition, the portions of foods were generous. 2.I ate more when I got home...Other than that the food wasn't expensive and tasted yummy. 3.Portions are huge. 4.It was delicious but I left still hungry because the portions were so small. [SEP] U: I am looking for Italian food on the south side of the city. S: Do you prefer moderately priced or expensive? U: No preference, please. S: I have Pizza Hut Cherry Hinton which is in the moderate price range and Frankie and Bennys which is in the more expensive price range. Which would you prefer? U: Do they serve large portions here? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The portions at Pizza Hut Cherry Hinton are generally considered generous while those at Frankie and Bennys are varied from large to small.

src_text: reviews of GALLERIA: 1.The atmosphere and decor of the resraurant was a bit boring, with no scenic vistas  to be seen out of its windows. 2.I felt like I was in Tuscany with the warm colors that surrounded the room. 3.The indoor decor was dull and not appealing. 4.The restaurant was nice and had a favorable Italian theme with murals of Italy's countryside. [SEP] U: I would like to find a European in the moderate price range. S: We have 5 European restaurants. In what area of town would you like to dine? U: I don't mind but I would like the place to be moderately priced. S: Ok, I am going to recommend the galleria restaurant in the centre, would you like me to reserve a table for you? U: How do they rank on interior decoration? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Most customers who have dined there say that the indoor decor is nice and made them feel like they was in Tuscany.  Other customers have said that the decor was dull, not appealing and honestly a bit boring.

src_text: reviews of ACORN GUEST HOUSE: 1.I also enjoyed the great view as that helped me take a moment to enjoy some peace and quiet. 2.The place was quiet so we could hear ourselves talk and just relax because we were there to get away from our hectic schedules. 3.I noticed that throughout my stay I was not disturbed by any loud or disruptive patrons. [SEP] U: I am looking for a place to stay in the moderate price range that includes free parking. S: In which area would you prefer? U: Cambridge. It needs to have free parking and moderately priced. S: Acorn guest house is a guesthouse in the north area with free parking and internet. Would you like to make a reservation? U: Is it nice and quiet there? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Acorn Guest House prides itself on being a quiet and relaxing space for guests. Can I answer anything else for you?

src_text: FAQs of ASK RESTAURANT: 1.There is no outdoor seating. [SEP] U: Can you help me find a cheap restaurant in the centre? S: Sure! There are 15 cheap restaurants in the centre. Is there a certain type of food you're looking for? U: Oh, yes! Italian, please. S: I can recommend Ask restaurant. Would you like me to make a reservation? U: Do they have a nice outdoor place for dining? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: No, according to customers that have previously dined at the Ask Restaurant, the location lacks outdoor seating.

src_text: FAQs of SALA THONG: 1.Sala Thong serves alcohol. reviews of SALA THONG: 1.However, the price of the drinks are outrageous so I wouldn't order too many from here. 2.I also ordered a beer, but that was not nearly as well priced and was quite expensive. 3.Not only were the drinks excellent, but pretty cheap as well. 4.The dish did not disappoint, although I found the beer to be overpriced although it was likely imported. [SEP] U: I am looking for the address and phone number of an expensive restaurant serving Thai food. S: there are two Thai locations. Would you prefer a restaurant in the centre or west part of town? U: I don't care. S: Sala Thong is an expensive Thai restaurant in the west. Would you like their information? U: Is their beer a good value for the money? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: Sala Thong offers beer as well as other alcoholic beverages. Three guests found the prices unreasonable. What is your price point?

src_text: reviews of THE NIRALA: 1.It was at the most wonderfully scenic location. 2.The location is easy to get to after work. 3.The location could not be better: right in the heart of the city with excellent views after the sun goes down. 4.It's in a great location. reviews of ROYAL SPICE: 1.I made the 20 mile round trip to the Royal Spice yesterday and it was worth the drive. 2.The location is convinient and the staff is friendly. 3.It was really high-quality cuisine and the location was really nice! 4.The restaurant is in a nice part of town and they give you plenty of food. [SEP] U: Can you help me find a place in the north where I can stay? S: Sure I have 5 guest houses all in the moderate price range. When is your stay? U: Do any of them have a four star rating? S: Yes, actually they all have 4 star ratings, do you need parking? U: Yes, I'd like to book one that offers parking please. S: Kirkwood House is a lovely place I would recommend. What day will you be checking in, how long will you be staying, and how many people will it be for? U: I actually just need information on the kirkwood house.  What is the postcode and phone number please? S: Okay, the postcode is cb41da and the phone number is 01223306283. U: i am also looking for a restaurant to book for friday S: I have 5 different restaurants I can give you some information for. They are all pretty good. U: I am looking to eat Indian. S: There are more than five restaurants in cambridge, lol.  Disregard my last statement.  There are 22 indian restaurants any preference on price or area? U: I would like it to be in the North as well. S: How about the royal spice restaurant or the nirala, which both are located in the north. U: Is the location nice? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Royal Spice is worth the drive, despite it's distance, while the Nirala restaurant is also in a scenic location offering excellent views.

src_text: reviews of THE CAMBRIDGE CHOP HOUSE: 1.They do, however, have wine and a nice decor inside. 2.The indoor decor was nice, which is good since they had a poor view. U: I would like a restaurant in the centre. S: I recommend The Cambridge Chop House. Excellent food in a great location. I can book a table there, if you like. U: Does it have nice indoor decor? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The inside decor is amazing and beautiful which is nice the view isn't that nice but they also have incredible wine.

src_text: reviews of WAGAMAMA: 1.Same has to be said about the drinks options they offer and their quality - only top notch brews and bottles, very very nice. 2.I did like that there were lots of drinks to choose from. src_text: reviews of GOLDEN WOK: 1.They have a good area outside for when the weather is nice. 2.I enjoyed sitting out there as I was eating alone. 3.Outdoor dining was nicely decorated and comfortable. FAQs of THE NIRALA: 1.The Nirala has no outdoor seating. FAQs of GOLDEN WOK: 1.Golden Wok does have outdoor seating. [SEP] U: I am looking for hotel with 3 star and free parking in Cambridge. S: Great, there are five such places. Did you have an area of town in mind? U: I didn't. Are any of them in the moderate price range? S: I have 3 guesthouses available. The Bridge Guest House is in the south. The Hamilton Lodge is in the north. And the Hobsons House is in the west. U: I need one with free parking and free wifi. S: All the places mentioned have free wifi and free parking. U: Can you book one of them for 8 people, starting from thursday for 3 nights? S: I wasn't able to book a guest house with that criteria.  Would you like to try a hotel? U: How about 2 nights ? And needs to start on Thursday ? S: I have successfully booked your guesthouse at the Hamilton Lodge for two nights for 8 people, reference number 1TVIC54F. Is there anything else I can help you with? U: Yes, I'm sure we'll be hungry so could you help me find an appropriate dining establishment in the north? Same price range as our hotel, please. S: I have located 2 restaurants in the area the Golden Wok and the Nirala. Do either of these suit your taste? Would you like me to reserve you a table? U: Which has a nicer outdoor dining area? S: <extra_id_0>
trg_text: <extra_id_0> S: The Golden Wok has a very nice, comfortable outdoor dining area while The Nirala does not offer outdoor dining. Would you like to know more about the Golden Wok?

src_text: reviews of ROSA'S BED AND BREAKFAST: 1.We also really enjoyed the pleasant views that they had in their rooms which was another enjoyable experience. 2.The view was breathtaking. 3.The B&B had a super convenient location, and my room had a wonderful view. 4.To have the big room and that gorgeous view together was absolutely worth it. S: Yes, rosa's bed and breakfast is in the cheap price range. Would you like to book a room? U: Yes please. I need 3 nights starting on friday for 1. S: All right, I've reserved your room. The reference number is TH1IW110. Is there anything else I can do for you? U: Do I get a good view here? S: <extra_id_0>
